2a1('bum): bam po dang de'o// sang sa rgyas dang byang chub sems pa
2b1('bum): dgod 'phung rgyas pa la tshedaga' slong rdo kyi lnga stong tsam gyi
3a1('bum): mongs pa med pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ sems shinang tu rnam par grol
3a2('bum): shes rab shin nubya tu rnam par grol ba/ tsAng shwedz+ra kye sa pa glang
3a3('bum): chen po bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rang
3b1('bum): tu thob pa/ srid pa kun sbyor ba/ yongs su zad par bka' yang dag pas
3b2('bum): sems shin tu rnam par grol nga/ sems kyi dbang thams cad la pha rolang tu
3b3('bum): phyi nad pa'i mchog thob pa sha stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa
4a1('bum): slong ma grags 'dzin dang / skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa lnga brgya tsam dang / dge' bsnyen pa dang / dge'
4a2('bum): bsnyen ma shin tu mang ba kun kyang / chos mthong ba sha stag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa thams
4a3('bum): cad kyang gzungs rab tu thob pa ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ stong pa nyid kyis rje rnam par spyod pa/ mtshan ma med pa'i spyod
4a4('bum): yul can/ rtog pa med pa'i smon la ma dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa rab tu thob pa
4a5('bum): chags pa med pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa/ thogs pa med pa'i slebs pa dang ldan pa/ bstan pa zad ma shes pa la/ so so yang dag par
4a6('bum): rig pa'i tshug khong du chud pa mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par 'artse'adzin mngon par shes pa shin tu ma nyams pa mnyan par 'os pa
4b1('bum): tshig dang ldan pa/ le lo med ming 'artson 'grus brtsams pa/ lus dang srog la mi lnga ba/ tshul 'chos pa med pa/ kha gsag med pa dang / 
4b2('bum): bkur bsti'i sems med pa zang zing med pa'i chos ston pa/ ches zab mo'i bzod pa rtogs par khong du chung ba/ mi 'jigs pa chen po thob pa/ 
4b3('bum): yongs su zhum pa med pa/ bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'das pams kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad pa las dang / nyon mongs pa dang / phyir
4b4('bum): dgol ba rab tu bcom pa/ pa ril po'i dgol ba thams cad dril gyis mi non pa thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs pa
4b5('bum): kA nga/ nos rab tu rtogs pas rna ches par dbye zhing bsnyen pa la mabyas / sa pa grangs med pa nas spen lam shin tu 'jams
4b6('bum): bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa/ sngon du smra ba/ khro gnyer med cing / snyan cing 'jam pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/ pha rol la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs su brjod
4b7('bum): po la mkhas pa/ zhum pa'i sems dang bral ba/ spobs pa mi chod pa/ 'khor mtha' yas pa/ zil gyis gnon pa/ mi 'jigs pa dang / ldan pa
5a1('bum): bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas par bstan pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ba la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad sbrum dang / smyig rgyu dang / mur+b+ba dang / rmi lam dang / 
5a2('bum): brnyan dang / mig yor dang / nam mkha' dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / stsal pa dang / gzugs brnyan lta bur khong du chud gro/ sems yongs su zhum pa myed pa/ skyes
5a3('bum): can thams cad kyi rgyud dang / gos pa bro ba dang / spyod pa dang / mos pa khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas ba/ sems can thams cad la sdang ba med pa'i sems
5a4('bum): dang ldan pa/ bzod pa brlabs po che dang ldan pa/ cho sa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par bya ba'i ye/ ye shes la mkhas pa/ chos nyid zab mo dang ldan pas
5a5('bum): rting dpag dka' ba/ rang gi sems su dbang rab tu thob po/ ches thams cad la dbang shin tu mob pa/ las dang nyon mongs pa dang lta ba'i sgrib pa thams cad las ma
5a6('bum): grol ba brten pa rtogs par bstan pa la mkhas pa// rten cing 'brel bur 'byung ba'i tshul zad mi shes byas zhugs pa'i// rdza lta ba dang bag la nyal pa dang / kun nas
5a7('bum): ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba cu kun tu sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa las dung nyin mongs po thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa bden pa rtogs par bya ba'i sgo / 
5b1('bum): kha mkhas pa/ chos thams cad smra brnyan dang 'dra bar rtag tu rgyuni mi 'chad par mos pa chos kyi tshul bstan pa tshad med pa la 'jigs pa med pa bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du
5b2('bum): khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par rnam par bkod pa'i smon lam gyis 'gro ba yongs su zin pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa na bzhugs
5b3('bum): bya'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag tu rgyun mi 'tshed par mngon tu gyur po/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad du nye bar 'gro ba la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas dpag tu med
5b4('bum): la gsol pa gdab par bya ba la mo 'isnga ba/ sems can gyi lha bu sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskyed pa'i nyon mongs pazhi bar bya ba la mkhas pang ting nge 'dzin
5b5('bum): brgya stong mngon par bsgrub pa la rnam par rtse ba'i ye shes rtogs par bye bi la mkhas pa/ yon tan brjod bskal pa mtha' yas par mi zad pa dang ldan pa sha stag
5b6('bum): dang thabs gcig ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang / rin chen 'byung gnas dang / rin chen snying po dang / rin chen byin pa dang / de dpon
5b7('bum): dam pa dang / skyes bus byin dang / skyeb sbed dang / chu bdag lha dang / dbang pos byin dang / bzang po'i stobs dang / blo gros dam pa dang / 'phags pa'i blo gros dang / blo grom
6a1('bum): 'phel ba dang / blo gros mtha' yas dang / don yod mthong ba dang / sgrib med klo gros dang / rab tu zhugs pa dang / mthu' dam pas rnam par gnon pa dang / bcom
6a2('bum): 'gyuHsa mtha' yas dang / rtag tu brtson pa dang / rtag tu sbyor ba dang / mi gtong brtson pa dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / zla ba'i snying po dang / blo gros dpa' med dang / spyan ras
6a3('bum): gzigs kyi dbang po dang / mthu' chen po thob pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / bdud kyi stobs rab tu 'joms pa dang / rdo rje kle gos dang / lag na rin
6a4('bum): chen phyag brgya dang / rtag tu lag brkyang dang / snying rje cher sems dang / rgyan chen po dang / rnam pa/ ra bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / ri bI'i zom dang / byang
6a5('bum): chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang de dag la sogs pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma
6a6('bum): dag dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis/ bdan seng ge'i khri bshams nas/ sku drang por bsrang ste/ dgongs pa mngon
6a7('bum): tu bzhag nas/ dkyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so// der zhugs nas ting nge 'dzin gang du/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'du ba dang / khongs su chud pa dang / rjes su 'bras
6a8('bum): ba dang / 'du bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba la mnyam par gzhag go// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing / yang dag par mkhyen pas
6b1('bum): ting nge 'dzin de la sna gzhengs te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di la rnam par gzigs so// de ltar gzigs nas/ sku thams cad nas 'od zer rab tu bkye ste
6b2('bum): de'i zhabs kyi 'thil gnyis kyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang / ldan pa gnyis las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // zhabs kyi ser mo bcu las kyang 'od
6b3('bum): zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // zhabs long bu gnyis dang / zhabs byin po gnyis dang / zhabs pus mi gnyis dang / zhabs rla gnyis dang / sku sta zur
6b4('bum): gnyis dang / sku lte ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / sku rtsib logs gnyis dang / thugs ka'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dpal gyi be'u las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug
6b5('bum): cu drug cu byung ngo // phyag gi sor mo bcu las kyang 'di ge zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // de bzhin du phyag lag ngar gnyis dang / sku 'phrog pa
6b6('bum): gnyis dang / 'gur dang / tshems mche' ba bzhid nga/ tshems bzhi bcu dang / spyan gnyis dang / snyan gnyis dang / shangs kyi sbubs gnyis dang / smin
6b7('bum): mtshams kyi mdzod spu dang / steng gi spyi gtsug dang / zhal gyi sgo nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug
6b8('bum): cu po de dag thams cad kyis/ stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par byas te/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
7a1('bum): khrims gang gA'i klung gri bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// lce dang nub dang // byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs mchis
7a2('bum): dang / rje 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// sems can gang gis 'od zer de mtheng
7a3('bum): nas 'od des gang la rig par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ ba spu'i bu gi
7a4('bum): sgo thams cad nas 'od zer tu bkye ba mdzad de/ 'od/ des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// shar phyogs su 'jig
7a5('bum): rkyen gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba che na pas khyab par byas so// lho dang nga nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lha dang / lho nub dang / nub byung / 
7a6('bum): gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang stong glu phyegs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA 'i klung gi bye ma snyed sdang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// soso
7a7('bum): can de dag gis 'od de mthong ba dang / 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// de nas yang
7a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad de/ shar phyogasu
7b1('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams glang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'di sna ta ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs
7b2('bum): mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzod do// sems can gang gis 'od
7b3('bum): de mthong ba dang / 'od des gang khe 'ug por gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi
7b4('bum): dbang po bkram ste/ stong gsum gyi steng rten po'i da 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad ljags kyi dang nga pos khyab par mdzad nas/ nal 'dzum pa mdzad do// lhag
7b5('bum): kyi dbang po de las kyang 'od zer khyi ges tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mthon te/ 'od zer de dag rna thams cad la pad+ma ma mang po/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung
7b6('bum): ba gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab mo stong dang ldan pa/ sna tshogs su 'dug pa lta na stug pa/ yid du 'ong bya/ kha tog bzang ba/ dri zhim pa 'jam pa/ ka tsa lin da ka ltar re/ 
7b7('bum): na byedre' bar gyur pa shi brag/ gyun nas gnas par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos
7b8('bum): stan po 'di nyid ston pa mdzad do// de dag sher phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing / de dag tu byan nas 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug pa/ 
8a1('bum): ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston to// de dag lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang stong
8a2('bum): gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas kyang 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa
8a3('bum): 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// sems can gang gis chos de dag thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nyes par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan
8a4('bum): 'das kyis bdan seng ge'i khri lnga bzhugs bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi ting 'dzin seng ge'i khri rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i la mnyam par gzhag ste/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdza
8a5('bum): rdzu 'phrul de mngon par 'du mdzad de/ stong gsum gyi sto nga chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yo/ sa so// rab tu g.yos so// kun tu g.yos so// 'gul lo// 
8a6('bum): rab tu 'gul lo/ kun tu 'gul lo// ldeg go/ rabatu ldeg go// kun tu ldeg go/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur
8a7('bum): shur/ kun tu 'ur 'ur ro// shig shig/ rab tu shig/ kun tu shig go// mtha' mtho' na ni dbus dma'/ dbus mtho' na ni mtha' dma' ste/ dal bus pags kyis nyams su bdes
8a8('bum): bar sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bdel ba skyed par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems
8b1('bum): can dmyal ba 'am/ byel song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi dang / mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / leg par ltung ba gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rgyun chad
8b2('bum): cing stengs par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skye bar gyur to// de bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum bcu'i rtsa gsum dang / mtshem
8b3('bum): dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzha na 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / rtswa skal ba mnyam par gyur to// de nas mi de dag dang / lha de dag mos pa dang / dga' ba dang
8b4('bum): nyams bde' ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rje su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mas pa dang / nyams bde' bar gyur pa de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la
8b5('bum): kha der dong zhing phyin nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog sa pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// 
8b6('bum): shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs
8b7('bum): re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun
8b8('bum): chad mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang / mi dang / lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so// de nas mi de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang
9a1('bum): nag sang dang / nyams bde' ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde' bar gyur pa de dag rang rang gi/ sangs rgyas
9a2('bum): kyi zhing de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ni bzhugs pa/ de dag gi drung du dong zhing / phyin nad zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa pan+d+ha
9a3('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can dmul long ji snyed cig yod/ 
9a4('bum): pa de dag thams cad kyang / mig gis gzugs mthong bar gyur to/ 'on pa dang / rnams kyang rna bas sgra thos par gyur to// smyon pa rnams kyang dran par thob par gyur to// sems 'khrugs pa rnas
9a5('bum): kyang 'khrug pa med pa'i sems thob par gyur to// gos med pa rnams kyang gos thob par gyur to// dbul po rnams kyang nor thob par gyur to// bkres pa rnams kyang zas thob par
9a6('bum): gyur te// skom pa rnams kyang btung ba thob par gyur to// nad kyi sa btab pa rnams kyang nad 'tsho bar gyur to// sus nyams ba dang / sid kyi las kyi mtha' dang / 'tsha ba mi dge' 'am
9a7('bum): spangs pa rnams kyang / lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi mtha' dang / 'tshe ba mi dge' ba spangs par gyur/ sems can thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la dper na/ pa dang ma dang pu nu dang / 
9a8('bum): sring me dang / mdza' bo dang / gnyen po dang / grogs po dang / mtshungs pa'i sems kyis phan tshun sems mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyang dga' ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang
9a9('bum): dbang po ma tshang rjes kyang / lus dang dbang po tshang zhing rgyas par gyur to// ngas pa rnaMs kyang ngas sos par gyur to// lus dngangs
9b1('bum): ldan zhing tshangs par spyod pa dang / mi btsang ba dang nyes pa'i dri nga ba med pa/ mi dge' ba'i rtog pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur to// de'i tshe sems can thams cad bde'i ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dang ldan par
9b2('bum): gyur te/ dper na dge' slong bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde' ba de lta bu'i bde' ba thams cad dang ldan par gyur to// de'i tshe sems can thams cad bdel ba'i rnam pa de lta bu'i
9b3('bum): shes rab dang ldan par gyur te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa ni dge' ba'o// dul ba ni dge' ba'o// zhi ba ni dge 'a ba'o// sdom pa ni dge' ba'o// bden pa ni dge' ba'o// bag byed pa ni dga'
9b4('bum): ba'o// byams pa ni dge' ba'o// snying rje ni dge' ba'o// tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa ni dge' ba'o// srog chags/ su gyur pa thams cad la mi 'tshe ba ni dge' ba'o// zhes bya
9b5('bum): par shes par gyur to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das bdun seng ge 'i khri la bzhugs pas 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma sgrib sa pa med pa/ nam mkha'i dbyibs yongasu dag pa 'am
9b6('bum): zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab dang bcas pa khor yug dang bcas pa/ lha'i gnas dang bcas pa/ dbang po dang bcas pa dbang byed dang bcas pa
9b7('bum): lha dang lha ma yin gyi ris dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa/ zil gyis mnan te bzhugs na/ 'od dang sku mdog dang / gzi'i brjid dang / dpal gyi
9b8('bum): mdzes shing / lham me/ ldan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs pa de bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis son na te/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi
10a1('bum): brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing / l+h+wam me/ lhan no// snying nge bzhugs so// lce dang / nudra na byung dang / byang shar dang / 
10a2('bum): mas dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs rje 'jig rten blo khams grong gA'i klung gi bye mi snyed bris gyis san na// 'o nga chu ma
10a3('bum): mdzes shing / sngam me/ ldan ni/ ljang der bzhugs so// 'di la ste dper na ri rgya/ ra nok+ta/ rje glen+d+ran thamamo cad rdzis rgyu sprin ni ma
10a4('bum): 'di lta ste dper nA/ zla bu'i dkyil 'khor skur mi gzugs thom ched zil gyis gnon par kyi ma mo/ 'o// 
10a5('bum): sems cad zil gyis gnon par gan rgya me sa rgya/ na m-i 'angs rdzog 'i
10a6('bum): dang bas ga tshangs pa dang bcan pa/ gtsang ma'i gonam sa la/ kyi
10a7('bum): rgyorar+ya blo'i 'o gro rkyen gyin ngos su bcom ldan ljongs kyis ra bzhin gyi
10a8('bum): mdzes shing / lham me ldan no// nga de la da nas mam skye byas kyis stong sum
10a9('bum): kyi chos kyi kun snang drang ba dag nga/ zhan 'phrul dbang byed
10a10('bum): du bstan to// de nas steng gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten rlorlomapa 'dra bag ci kyi'i
10b1('bum): dga' dang / dga' ldan dang / mtshe' ma dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / rgyal tshe rno bzhi'i ris kyi lce gudz+ra ji snyed po de dog thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
10b2('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas bad na seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa mthong nas/ dga' zhing spro ba dang / yid bde'u 'i skyes nas sku rdzas kyi me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang
10b3('bum): lha rdzas kyi gdugs spos dang / lha rdzas kyi ud pe lwa dang / ku mr-i ta dang / pun d+ha tsis dag kun mun dang / seM na nga lha rdzas kyi me tog kri s+ya ru dang / ta ma laSh+Ti lo ma
10b4('bum): rdzas kyi nam bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang / gdug suM rgyu wa ma tshun du lha rdzas kyi blo d+hA par mi thogs nasabacom ldan 'das gang na ba de ra dang ste/ byin
10b5('bum): phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang na phyi ma dang / gdugasasras dang / ud pa la dang / byed ma dang / shu mu Shang+rangapun dA ri ke dang / don yi na da dang / so'u brAna? d+hi nga
10b6('bum): ke sa ra dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / lho rdzas kyi na bze'u drang na rkyen dang / gdugs rmi/ rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i byA don dag gi sa bco ma ldan 'das la ga tu
10b7('bum): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'dul ba dang / sbed du gyur rje'i mi ji snyed cig yod pa dro dag kyang tshulas skyes bya dang / phreng lis skyes pa mang po khyer nas
10b8('bum): 'das la mchod pa byed par gyur to// me tog dang phreng ba dang / smos dang / byug pa dang / phyis la stsogs pa dang / na bzla'i dang / rgyan dang / gdugaste dang / rgyal mtshon de dag mas cu
11a1('bum): ma rdzog tu bcom ya 'dzus kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi sasabacom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng gi nam mkha' la/ me tog la stsogs pa'i khang partsegs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
11a2('bum): kyi khams tsam du red dag nas par gyur don kyi bye rtse gles bya de las kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / dar gyi lnga ldi mang po 'phyang bar 'gyur ro// mngon par 'phyang bar gyur to// rab tu 'phyang bar
11a3('bum): gyur to// me tog dang / dar gyi lnga ldi ri ngag gis stong gisum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di shin tu mdzes par gyur to/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba gser gyi kha tog lta bu des kyang shim
11a4('bum): sa/ gyi ste chen pa 'ji na nadu she kyi 'jig rten gyi la
11a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba sa bya skyong gas pa bar gyur to/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shing dang shar lce dang / lce nub dang / nub byang dang / phyogs mtshams dang
11a6('bum): dang / 'ug dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// de la 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnas
11a7('bum): kyi che de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi byinas pa mthong nas/ tsA 'di snyam du sems par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// 'dzam du'i
11a8('bum): klong gi mi rnams kyi snyoms pa de bzhin du nub kyi bo lang spyod dang / shAr gyi lus 'phags po dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar
11b1('bum): nga ma 'arnams sa mas sa sa sa su ba mam pa na gyi 'das
11b2('bum): de bzhin du stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang / lha thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas
11b3('bum): chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi bdun du bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis yang bdan seng ge'i khri la
11b4('bum): bzhugs bzhin du/ 'od rab tu bkye ba mdzad de/ yang 'ang ngos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu snang bar gyur to// shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub dang / byang dang shar nga
11b5('bum): shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
11b6('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge' 'dunadang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcwa sa pa/ mang po mthong bar gyur to// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rte
11b7('bum): gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed pa de dag na/ phyisems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong chen po'i 'ji garten gyi khams 'di na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
11b8('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang+yas rgya se shAkya thub pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar/ 
11b9('bum): gyur to// hUM de bzhin du lce dang dang nub dang / byang dang / tsho byang shI ro dza/ shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten phyogs re re zhing / 
12a1('bum): ma nu slong gi khye lung dang 'dus ga byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa/ ma gcig tu bzhugs
12a2('bum): ra bag sa 'a ba zhin gyi 'a nga gi rgyam dang dun gyi yo du rkyen gyi sa pa ni med song canas rgya bsod de/ don de ba'i sa / 
12a3('bum): jug bcom pa dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu
12a4('bum): byi bu di byung slong dag kyar slong ma mdzad do// de nas gtsun gyi khams den du byang chub sems dpa'i sems so/ pa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pa
12a5('bum): na pa dri dang / so cher// yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa de mthong nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
12a6('bum): swa rI'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas gdun pa der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po'i
12a7('bum): sa don du byeng ste / rmugs 'di ltar mer g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'dil bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu/ ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhi
12b1('bum): shegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi
12b2('bum): khams gang ba'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya
12b3('bum): bruM bzhugs shing 'am skyong nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu' yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sos
12b4('bum): dbye'i chen po 'od zer kun nas byung bas/ bcom ldanaldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas la 'diskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi
12b5('bum): khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'ongs de bzhin gdon gas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de lta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / 
12b6('bum): byang chub sems dbye' sems dpa'i chen po de dag kun kyang phal cheraru gzho nur gyur pa dang / gzungs dang sa so yang dag par rig pa sgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jugs
12b7('bum): rnams cangs byungang rab tu thob byasado dag lci ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin rkyen 'byung gnas kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par
12b8('bum): nas ma gyi rlo kyi nas dre bzhin gang shegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas byung ba la bang mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgya las byung ba
13a1('bum): gser gyi mingag can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das rdo bzhin ga ni ga kyi rigra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya sri na kyi thub pa/ 
13a2('bum): de la phud me de dag gis gton cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi da dong bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i bri na/ jig rten gyi rnams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpe' sems pa tshan
13a3('bum): bye dag ni mgu phyur da/ ba yin gyis// dri gams par gyur // de dus byang chub sems dpa sems dpa chen po yod na sngon rim 'byung bas/ yodo pa ldan 'as de bzhin gshegs pa pas
13a4('bum): yang dgu pa rdzog rje pa'i sangs rgyas pas rin chen 'drung gnasangesas par mo gser gyi mdog can 'as du stong ba na dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa khyim pa dang / rab tu thu/ 
13a5('bum): dang / khye'u dang bu se ri gzugs su 'dug rgyas khrig brgya stong dus dang 'grag / sangs rgyal gyi nga 'anas mi snang bar gyur na shar phyogs kyi sangs
13a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gang dri sted cig bzhugs shinga'atsho sbyong ba de dag pams zang me/ me tog dang / rjes dang / 'dugs thos dang phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / nu ba dang / rgyar
13a7('bum): ra kyi sa rgyun dgro myung du ga sa du nga shA nga/ sa pa du
13a8('bum): rgyu sems dba'i mabur chen po dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin go shegs pa dgra botso me po yang dag ngo rdzogs po sangs rgyas gsu phu po gang na ba dor dang ste/ byin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi/ 
13b1('bum): banyis la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das
13b2('bum): 'di skad ras gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin cher 'byung gnasabacom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am
13b3('bum): kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byurkang gnas kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i sladadu bskuro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegasapa
13b4('bum): shAkya thub pas blang mye de dag bzhes nasashar phyogs kyi bya 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed pa de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog pa
13b5('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang ba der gtor to// ga de nas brang mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ bud me de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdu
13b6('bum): po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te/ chos ston to// chos snyan pa de sems can gang gis zlos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / blan med pa yang dag
13b7('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu me'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa blas
14a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shakya thub pa de la rim gro byas so// bkur sti byas so// sti stang byas so// mchod pa byas shing
14a2('bum): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ de nas lce phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs/ 
14a3('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dngul zhes bya ba bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
14a4('bum): 'di yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams den byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pa/ snang ba chen po de dang / sra cher
14a5('bum): g.yos pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta na chog mi shes pa de ma thong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag/ bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med ni
14a6('bum): dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan myed pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / 
14a7('bum): dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gdal ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis
14a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan myed pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten
14b1('bum): gyi khams gang mi mjed ces bya ba yod do/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
14b2('bum): po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu' yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ma ngan med pa'i
14b3('bum): dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de
14b4('bum): lta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang / phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa gzungs dang / so so yang dag par rig par sgrub pa rab tu/ 
14b5('bum): thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab sa tu theb pa de dag lta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan// 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis
14b6('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na songashig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan
14b7('bum): med pa la pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bkur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
14b8('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad mo 'di dag gis gter cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
15a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyam su bar gyur ta rA/ de nus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pas/ com ldan 'dis 'an
15a2('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dngal ngo lasu pang ma gser gyi sadog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te// byang chub sems pa'u khyim pa dang
15a3('bum): ra 'byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu me 'i gzugs su 'dug pa/ bye gzug khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'phrogs / seMs nus kyi zhing rjes mi sna ba gyur nas/ blo phyogs sangs sus bcom ldan 'chi
15a4('bum): gdiji snyed cig bzhugs shing / 'tshe sbyong ba de dag thams cad me chos dang / spros rapa 'a 'dug smos dang byung thig d+ha dang / byem durjod/ rgyan ba ga
15a5('bum): dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang // bkur stir bya ba dang / sti stang du bya ba dang / mAtshod pa nyid cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen bai p+la ma?/ byang
15a6('bum): lci bos phyag 'argyam te byeg su gcig tu lamed do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang chub sems dpa' ser su me 'i myang na mong pas mdzad radam pa nis
15a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dab pa bcom ldan 'das la skyon mi mnga' 'am/ d+hagyanod pa ma mchis sal// zlum
15b1('bum): sku nyams dang ldan nam/ rdo bde ba dang dges par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs bya mya ngan med pa'i dbul gyis
15b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad me de dag bzhes nas/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed pa de dag
15b3('bum): gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der gtor to// de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur to// pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs po'i sku mang
15b4('bum): bzhugs shing 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'dra nyid rtsams te chos ston to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos por gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag byar rdzogs pa'i
15b5('bum): byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang kyi rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa phye de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i cha byas bcom ldan 'das
15b6('bum): ngo bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim 'gror byas so// bkur bstir byas sa/ hU~M sti steng du byas so// mchod par byas nas/ phyogs gcis
15b7('bum): tu 'khrod do// de nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ dre 'jig rten gyi khams nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba mdzod/ de na de bzhin gshes
15b8('bum): ga dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste khya de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinam
16a1('bum): 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug paste/ snang ba chen be dang / 
16a2('bum): sa cher g.yos pa de dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phros
16a3('bum): gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs d+hA sprin chen 'od 'phro de la 'di skad ces gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di lta
16a4('bum): tsher g.yos pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom lda ldan 'das rin chen 'od 'bros byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
16a5('bum): chen po spyod pa'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// r-i gas kyi bu 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi 'o/ mas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi
16a6('bum): mi mdzad ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ 
16a7('bum): po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu' yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'od 'phro la 'di
16a8('bum): skad ce rtsa gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la
16b1('bum): phyag bya kyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems papa' che pa de dag kyang pas mer gzhon nur gyur pa/ gdu sa dadzu po so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa/ rob tu thob pa'i ting nge chen
16b2('bum): drang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag lta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de yinan gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'bros bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab
16b3('bum): shes na song shig de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros la pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang / 
16b4('bum): ldan pa stong skur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagashegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangasargyas shAkya thub pa de la pad mo 'di dag gis gtore cig rigs kyi
16b5('bum): bya sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir ra zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ 
16b6('bum): der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' med ste spyod pa'i blo gros gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po
16b7('bum): chen 'od 'khro de las kyang pad mo gser gyi 'dog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig rgya sa
16b8('bum): phyo tu grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas ma snang bgyur nas/ nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig gzugs shing myatsho skyong ba de dag zas cid las tog deng sum dang / phreng ba dang
18a1('bum): bskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu/ 
18a2('bum): ci'i rkyen de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyal bas byin la 'di skad ces gsol to// rig
18a3('bum): kyi su 'di ni lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
18a4('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 
18a5('bum): 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin kyis/ bcom ldan 'a/ das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang po la 'di skad ces gsol
18a6('bum): to/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten khams mi mched dor/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la 'di lta ba dang / de
18a7('bum): phyag bgyi zhing snyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal rkyer gzho dur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob
18a8('bum): pa ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos bka' stsal pa/ 
18b1('bum): rims kyi bu gyur bu'i dusas papapa shes slong gig de nas de bzhin gasregs pa rgyas dbyung po po po ngas pa porin po so sa
18b2('bum): kyi rgya las byung ba gser gyi mdog can 'das ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom sden 'dus de bzhin ga shegs pa dgra bcom pa mdza dag par rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas shakya thung pa de
18b3('bum): la bang mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
18b4('bum): chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis der nyams pa ra gyur te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
18b5('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po de las pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma sto/ nga dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim
18b6('bum): ba dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang phyogs kyi sangs
18b7('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad me tog dang / spos dang phreng ba dang / byug pa dang phye ma dang / na bza' dang rgyan dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan
18b8('bum): dang ba dan dag gis rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / sti bstang du bya ba dang / mchod par byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu'
19a1('bum): chen pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos
19a2('bum): phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
19a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bdel 'am
19a4('bum): sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dges par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg
19a5('bum): rgyalnga ba'i dbang pos bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i/ slad du bskur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshan phrengan kya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig
19a6('bum): rten gyi khams glang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi sang sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der gtor to/ de nas bde mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cang rgyas par khyab pa
19a7('bum): gyur te/ bad mo de dal la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag
19a8('bum): thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ngas par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang
19b1('bum): rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim 'gror byas so// bkur stir byas so// sti stang du byas so/ 
19b2('bum): mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas byang sher gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na 'jig rten gyi khams ting nge 'dzin gyi
19b3('bum): brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang
19b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad// ston te/ de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ byang chub sems dpa'
19b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon nye ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bas
19b6('bum): chog mi shes pa de mthong nasabacom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas btso// 
19b7('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa cher 'di ltar
19b8('bum): tshor g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i
20a1('bum): da sabyang chung ste 'i sems dpa'i rten gyi rnam du rlom kyika' stsa to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni rdo nub kyi phyogs pa rnams
20a2('bum): phyogs su lo rkyen hU~M khams grong bya'i klung gi bye mye snong 'dus myu kyi rnams mi mdzod slong / de meng banin gyi shegs pa dgra btsem pa snang dag par rdzogs pa'i
20a3('bum): sa rgya thu ba nas bye ba bya zhugs snying than skyeng byang chub sosas sems dbyo chen bye rnams bya s+yai pha rol tu phyin pa ston to// chu 'di ni de'i mthur yin te/ de 'da'o// de nas byang chub sems
20a4('bum): ngas padag kying jog rten gyi khams kyi sbyi d+he ma ldan 'dus de bzhin ga sogs gro bcom kyi napar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shA kya thub pa de lta ba dang / de la phya
20a5('bum): gyi ni ba snyen 'gu bya chub myos dbya' sems dpa'achen po de dag kun kyang ba'i tshor gA/ zhon nu rgyu ngos dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting
20a6('bum): dzin dbyi sgo mos par 'jug bya thams cad l+ya dbyang rab tu thob bya de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gyi glang blo dam bu'i dpal gyis bka' stsal gyi/ rigs kyi bu de ltar/ 
20a7('bum): sa la khyab par shes na song shig/ ba ma de nas de gzhin gshegs pa ti/ 
20b1('bum): shugs pa kra bcom pa yang dag pa sangs rgyas na kyi thub pa de la pad skye 'di dag gis gtor cig rigs
20b2('bum): jig rten gyi skyes pa'i byang chub sems 'a sems dpa'i rkyen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis der
20b3('bum): na 'das de bsnyen gshegs pa dgra btsam pa yang dag pa
20b4('bum): gargyams sa na rnas ma ra na gyi phyogs mtshasas kyis sa
20b5('bum): smra gyis ma ra kyi ngan sa du du larten pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i mabu na sa
21a1('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dA sha~Mk+Sha thub pra gled na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag
21a2('bum): 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khrid nas/ byang chub sems dpa sems dbang cheran po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub
21a3('bum): pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// prabacom ldan 'das de bzhin ga shegs pa dgra bcom bya yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das
21a4('bum): bsnyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ ze mdoga'adro shAm/ sku nyams dang ldan nam de bde' ba dang da ges par spyod dam/ zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi
21a5('bum): mdag can 'deb ma stong dang ldar bu 'dri jog kyang bamamo ldan sade bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa 'i dbul gyis bcom ldan 'dres la mchod pa'i slad du/ 
21a6('bum): bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga sh+logs bshAkya thub pas pad me ni dgu la zhes nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de/ 
21a7('bum): dag gi de bzhin gshegs bu dgra bcom pa yas dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi bye bu der gtor te/ ga de nas pang mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad
21a8('bum): rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pyad skye d+ho drug phyi byan+d+han+yA g+ha sheg sa bya'i sku mdo bye bzhugs kyi rje gyi 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid tsams te chos ston to// skye chos bstan pa
21b1('bum): sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa dro dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / 
21b2('bum): bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang / nga rlung gi dge' bya'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thung ba
21b3('bum): rim 'gror byas so// bkur stir byas so// sti stang du byas skyo mchod pa byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
21b4('bum): stod 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na 'jig rten gyi khyis snying byang chub kyi shin tu yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
21b5('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dang lto zhes bye sa du zhugs shi su 'i tshe sbyong ste/ nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
21b6('bum): nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams nga ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pang mo zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / 
21b7('bum): sa rgyar g.yos pa de dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ba lta bus chog mi shes pade mthong nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa
21b8('bum): mo dam pa'i dpal gang nA ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig
22a1('bum): g+hurten du byung ba dang / ngog pa 'di ltar cher gsos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtswa 'di lta thu ba 'din na skad kyis gso ba dang / rje badzin gshegs pa yang
22a2('bum): ngas kyis/ byang chub sa mas dpa' sems dpa chen po lagan zad pol 'di skad ces pa tshul te// gas kyi kyi don du rung gi kyi sa gas du dris chen gyi mas 'ad+mara'i
22a3('bum): gabyen snying 'as pa/ 'dis rten gyi 'i da sa bya med du/ de k+Sha ngas sa rgya gyu chub da bya dzu
22a4('bum): spong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sto te/ 'di ni dekyi sa su me mini de de 'dug// de nis byang chub sems dpa' sems pa
22a5('bum): chen po lag na pad mas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshigaces pa pad mo dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjedar/ 
22a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shasu thub pa de lta ba dang / de la phyag brgya zhing bsnyen ba kur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
22a7('bum): chen po de dag kun kyang dul cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang / so so yang dag par rig bsgrub pa rab tu thong pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams cad la dbang rab tu bong
22a8('bum): de dag lta ba'i slang du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das pad mo dam pa'i dpal gyis dka' stsal la/ rig na kyi bu de sa de'i dus su rab pa bzhes so gis/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bam
22b1('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na pad mo la/ pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang
22b2('bum): ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs
22b3('bum): rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig da de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu ba dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par
22b4('bum): gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la dag na pad mos pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo
22b5('bum): dam pa'i dpal de las pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang nga ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu me'i gzugasu 'dug
22b6('bum): bya bye bu khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ shor lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'am skyeng po
22b7('bum): ro dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / gdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan drag gis rim gyir bya ba dang / bsgyur
22b8('bum): stir bya ba dang / sti stang du bya ba dang / mchod par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / rdobyang chub sems dpa'i mthu'i chen pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
23a1('bum): gas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shakya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ginyis satshig
23a2('bum): phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag ma pang mos/ rje bcom ldan 'dis 'di song rje po rje rje sardzu brjid gro grogs
23a3('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la bsnun mi mnga' 'am/ 8gnod pa ma mchi tra~M zi ma ge ba rje rnam pa skye sa sa du ldan na mo/ 'do bye
23a4('bum): dges par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dge kya / bcom ldan 'das ngo bzhin tsa shems gre tsam pa yang dge sbyor rdzogs pa'i
23a5('bum): sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom lda na 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// khyod nas bcom nani ljin 'ongs sde rjegro \u0f7fsde das bcom po meng dag
23a6('bum): ba'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ga gnaklung ni bye mo skye rje rje rdo ga gi na gle shegs po dgra
23a7('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag glang na ba der gtor to// de nas pad me de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag khrims cing rgyas phyi'i khyod bur 'gyurd mye rkye ga la po zhin
23a8('bum): gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shig de 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to// tshe skye bstan pa de sems can yang gis skyes byi ba gyur
23b1('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rje zab tu byung ba dang / khyo'u dang / rdo dro mo nig zugs su da
23b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la'i me 'gror byas so/ kur s+t+waM/ kyi srung rjo rje she sa
23b3('bum): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// lho nub kyi phyogs mtsham su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi ba rI no/ 'jig rten gyi khyoms rgya ma lding bral ba zhes khye'i se
23b4('bum): de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog ras pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang bu dam pa'i dang zhes bya bra blo zhugs wi 'tsho skyong ste/ ro bya nu zla sems
23b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ de nas 'jin kyu khams de na byang chub ma spong ba'i spos dpa tshon dz+yo kyai ma
23b6('bum): tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bas thAs tsheg mi shes pa de mabyang nu s+ye bcom ldan 'das de ban ga shegs pa
23b7('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces ma so to// bcom ldar blangs nyid chen mo madri bya 'jig rten du bru ba
23b8('bum): dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gdu' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ 'di skad cesu gsol bre bcom ldan 'das dre ban+yai shugs bu ga
24a1('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyis rab tu snang ba de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs
24a2('bum): kyi bu 'di nas byang shar kyi phyogs 'tshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams glang ga'i klung gi byem skyong 'das pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs kyi dgra/ 
24a3('bum): com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shakya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsha skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i
24a4('bum): san te de 'dra'o/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshe rgan po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das nyi mdzod dkyis 'khor snang ba drim pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
24a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed dude bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa 'i sangs rgyas tu thub pas nges pa dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing / 
24a6('bum): bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dnga' chen po de dag kun kyang bal cher gzhon nur gyur pa gzungs dang rtse so yang dag par bsgrub pa rab tu thob ba/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug
24a7('bum): thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag lta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i rapal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la 'a/ 
24a8('bum): bar shes na song shi ka de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rang
24b1('bum): tu snang ba de la pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs/ 
24b2('bum): ba'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
24b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu' bar dka' ba yin gyis rje rtse der nyams par gyur tA re zhes/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
24b4('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de las pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' byin pa dang
24b5('bum): rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba nga rdza gyi khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas ba kyi ning de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams
24b6('bum): kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji skad cig pa gas shing rnam cu sbyong ba de dag thams cad pa me dag dang / skyes dang bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang rgyun pa
24b7('bum): gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba den dag gos rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / sti snying du du dza nga/ mchid pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sa
24b8('bum): dba'i mthu' chen po sa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas can kya thub pa gang nang der dong ste/ phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi/ 
25a1('bum): bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod // phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
25a2('bum): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' re/ gnod pa ma mchis
25a3('bum): zo mdog bde'a'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam bde' ba dang dges par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ bang mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
25a4('bum): ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'idakyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis bcom ldan 'des la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das
25a5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nasalho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga
25a6('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gton to// de nas pad mi de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag rnams
25a7('bum): cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to// chos bstan pa de sems can
25a8('bum): gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs
25b1('bum): 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thub pa la rim 'gro byas so// bkur sti byas so// sti stang du
25b2('bum): byas so// mchod par byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten
25b3('bum): gyi khams dbang du gyur pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa
25b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyi nga yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyikhams de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen
25b5('bum): mchog ces bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po dang / nges cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku su phye lte bas chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das
25b6('bum): gdugs dam pa gang na ba dar song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bco
25b7('bum): ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / 
25b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni shar lho'i phyogs 'tshas
27a1('bum): sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas/ bcom ldan 'das la bsnyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang / rigs par spyod ngam zhes/ 
27a2('bum): 'dri ste/ pad ma gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas/ bcom ldan 'das
27a3('bum): la mchod du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i
27a4('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad
27a5('bum): rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po// 'di nyid rtsams te chos ston to/ chos bstan pa de sems can
27a6('bum): gang gi don du thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang
27a7('bum): bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag thams cad gis kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim mo
27a8('bum): khyas so/ bkur sngo byas so// mchod par byas so// de nas 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha roso na/ 'jig rten gyi khas pad mo ngas pa zhes bya ba yod/ 
27b1('bum): do na de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i dpal zhes bya bo bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad// de nas
27b2('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi
27b3('bum): shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal gang na ba der dong ste/ phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag/ 
27b4('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal da de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dzad chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog su 'di ltar ches
27b5('bum): g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba ni 'i rgyu ci'i rkyen de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan// 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
27b6('bum): sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'od nas steng gi phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed
27b7('bum): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sha kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyeng // de byang chub
27b8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ de ni de'i mthu' yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pas te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gnyis
28a1('bum): pa brang mo das pa'i dag sa 'di skad ces gso te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi 'ams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
28a2('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi grub par lta ba dang / del phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen 'gyukur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems papa' chen po de dag kun kyang bam+bu cher gnonar gyur pa
28a3('bum): gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin/ 
28a4('bum): gshegs pa pad mi dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rig sa kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzos
28a5('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pa la pang mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong pa
28a6('bum): ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de la pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs/ 
28a7('bum): kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing drer bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu' bar dka' ba yin gyis
28a8('bum): der nyams par gyur te re/ khye nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pang mo ngam pas/ rgyabacom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pang mo'i
28b1('bum): dpal de las na pang mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag
28b2('bum): khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba de dag thams cad
28b3('bum): la me tog dang / spos dang bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba/ 
28b4('bum): dang / sti stang du bya ba dang / mchod par byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu' chen pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
28b5('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gdon pa der song / ste phyin nasabacom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la/ spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu khod do/ 
28b6('bum): phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
28b7('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la bsnun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bdel 'am sku nyams dang ldan nam
28b8('bum): bde ba dang dges par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang \u0f7f/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
29a1('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pang po'i da sa gyis bcom ldan 'das la mnod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas sa 'dul sa de bzhin ga shegs pa dgra ma pa sang dag par rdzogs
29a2('bum): mangs rgyas thub pas 'dum de dag pa zhes nas 'og kyi gas kyi 'a rten gyi khams ga ba'i klung gi sa rnyed dag ni/ de shA'i ga shes nga com pa yang dag par rtags pa ma
29a3('bum): rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to// de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khya par gyur te/ pad mi de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing 'di
29a4('bum): bAr pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid 'artsams te/ chos ston/ chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang than med pa yang ngag par rdzogs pa'i bu
29a5('bum): chub tu nges par gyur to/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dugabla de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsabs bcom ldan 'das de
29a6('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur stir byas so/ sti stang du byas so/ mchod par bya'o// de nas steng gi phyogs
29a7('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngangs dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
29a8('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig
29b1('bum): rkyen gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bas byin zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po dang / sa mer gsos pad dang / de bzhin sashegs pa'i
29b2('bum): chos mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das dga' ba'i dpal gangan ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga'
29b3('bum): ba'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba
29b4('bum): ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'ang sa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems
29b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge' bas byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni 'og gi phyogs su 'dzi ga rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig
29b6('bum): rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod do/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sas
29b7('bum): dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu' yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bas byin pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
29b8('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gas bus la dge' ba'i dpal la 'di skad ces gosi me to/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'a/ 
30a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kya thub pa de blta ba dang / dril phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpal ses papar/ 
30a2('bum): chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa gzungs dang / so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob
30a3('bum): de dag lta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shigatude nas de bzhin
30a4('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasadaga' ba'i dpal gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bas byin la/ pad ma rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las
30a5('bum): byung ba gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
30a6('bum): kya thu zla pa de la pang mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa'/ 
30a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis// der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bus byin pas/ bcom ldan 'das de
30a8('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal de las pad mo ga/ ser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub ses dpa'
30b1('bum): khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye bu khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ steng gi phyog
30b2('bum): su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig gzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma rnyeng / na bza'
30b3('bum): dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgya le mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / sti stang du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems deH'i hUM 'phrul chen
30b4('bum): bo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu' chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste/ phyin nas
30b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ byegs gcig tu mjing danas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag
30b6('bum): zas byin pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsom d+ha de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das
30b7('bum): lnga snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde' 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dges par spyod dam/ zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab
30b8('bum): tha srong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' de'i dab gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod po'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes/ 
31a1('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin
31a2('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang na ba der gtor to// de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad me de dag
31a3('bum): la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang
31a4('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur/ to// byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung pa dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis
31a5('bum): kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur stir byaso/ sti stang
31a6('bum): du byas so// mchod par byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na
31a7('bum): po che'i rang bzhin du kun nas par gyur te/ me tog sil ma sna tshogs kyis kun nas gang ba dang / dar gyi lda ldi dang / chun po kun nas bris pa dang / snod sna tshogs nas/ bd-ig sgros sna tshogs 'thul
31a8('bum): ba dang / dpag pusam gyi shing rgyan dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi yal ka'i rtse mo g.yur za ba dang / me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing dang / spos kyi shing dang / phreng ba'i shing dang / phye ma'i// 
31b1('bum): shing dang / bdug spos kyi shing sna tshogs kyis rab tu rgyan pa/ kun nas gnas par gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mye tog kun nas
31b2('bum): rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na ba 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lha'i bu blo gros shin tu brtan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan yang gzi' brjid chen po dag
31b3('bum): 'khod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams pad mo can gzhin du gyur to// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las// gling bzhi'i le'u ste drang po'o// 
31b4('bum): de nas de'i tshe de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge'i sbyong dang / bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa
31b5('bum): lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa mang po tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol cher gzho nur gyur pa mngo po de bzhin du 'dug por thugs su chud nas
31b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pA/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzog
31b7('bum): par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
31b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson por bgyi/ de skad
32a1('bum): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen thos sos
32a2('bum): med 'a'i tshus du/ shes ra gi pha rol tu phyin pa gnas te/ sbyin pa gdong ba dang / yongasu len pa phyi migs pa'i phyir yongs su btang ba med pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yong
32a3('bum): rdzogs par bya'o// ltung ba dang mi ltung ba med pa'i tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// 'khrug pa med pa'i phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par/ 
32a4('bum): bya'o// lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus nyams pa med ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// ro myong ba med pa'i phyir/ bsam gtan
32a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa yangs su rdzogs par bya'o// chos tham sa cad mi dmyigs pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin rtse ba yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
32a6('bum): dab sems dpasha chenA pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas to// dran pami dmyigs pa'i phyir/ dran pa nyo bar bzhag pa ba ni yongs su rdzogs par byar// yang dag par spong / 
32a7('bum): bya bzhi dgra rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang de byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// stangaH
32a8('bum): nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// bas gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i sgo
32b1('bum): bar 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthor kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang / b+hu can gyi 'du shes
