156b7('bum): skabs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sra so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis glu dang // de bani
156b8('bum): dag chos kyi dbyings dag chos kyi gnas nyid dag/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yongasu mi 'dzin pa 'dzin pa ma ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe
157a1('bum): rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'on kyang smon lam yongasu ma rdzogs kyi bar du bar ma dor yongasu mya ngan las mi 'dos skedran pa nye bar gzhags pa bzhi yongs
157a2('bum): ba rdzogasayang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams pa dbang po dge stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag 'dun dang / 6'phags pa'i yum yan lag ba rgya
157a3('bum): yong su ma rdzogs/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rtsa bsam gtan bzhi dang / chang mang bu bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyems par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa rgyad dang / 
157a4('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu da dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan mo med pa dang / smon pa me ba dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi
157a5('bum): sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so yang dag pararig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad
157a6('bum): nga sum rdzogs par ma dor yongasu mya ngan las mi 'da'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar smon lam rnams ni smon lam mang lags/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma lags/ yang dag par spong
157a7('bum): rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang po rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phags pa'i
157a8('bum): bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / 'phags pa mthang gis gnas pa'i
157b1('bum): rnapapa 'dus 'grub sa ninga'i zam ya dag pazag pa'i na sas rgyas kyis pa ches pa brgyad rnaMms rgyas kyirnas mo khros pa'i rje bcung du munas me da na
157b2('bum): chos kyang ma lags na tshus ma legs pa yang ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos thams cad yongasu ma bzung ba'i slad du gzugs yong su mi 'dzin pa dang / tshor ba 'du shes dang / 
157b3('bum): da shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang yongasu mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongasu ma bzung ba'i rdza smad du yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yongasu mi 'dzin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 
157b4('bum): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yod/ su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongasu ma bzung ba/ de'i slad du/ yang dag pa'i mtha' bar du yongasu mi 'dzin pa dang
157b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhanayang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
157b6('bum): ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ci zhig de ci'i phyi zhe na de la shes rab kyi pha rol
157b7('bum): tu phyin pa zhes bya zhes yongasu rtag par bgyi ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shA gal te de lte sa 'di ltar chos gang yang yod pa ma yin
158a1('bum): zhing mi dmigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam zhes spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
158a2('bum): la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga la chos gang rnams med cing mo dmyigs pa yin/ rab 'byor kyis spros pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong
158a3('bum): nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las
158a4('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan
158a5('bum): nying song pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / rongs po med pa stong pa nyid dang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dad kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
158a6('bum): pa med cing mi dmyigs so// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa
158a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang med cing mi gso// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra~M dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid ngo // phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam
158a8('bum): stong pa nyid dang / 'das byas stong pa nyid dang / 'das ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid/ rang bzhin
158b1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa
158b2('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dag kyi phyir gzugs med cing mi dmigaso// tsho ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigaso// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu'i nang stong pa
158b3('bum): nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / dom dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang
158b4('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor bad med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan
158b5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dag kyi phyir/ skye mched dang rnams
158b6('bum): dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba med cing mi dmagaso// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bya
158b7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid stod kyi phyir pha rol tu phyin pa rnams med cing mi dmigs/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bai cu rtsa bdun med cing mi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan
158b8('bum): rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gis gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dag pan dgu dang
159a1('bum): stong pa nyid dag mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
159a2('bum): dong / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas dag kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad med cing mi dmigs/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa
159a3('bum): jo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir rgyun tu zhug pa'i 'bras bu med cing mi dmyigs so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyi mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang
159a4('bum): lam ge rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ni med cing mi dmigaso// nang stong ba nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir de bzhin
159a5('bum): nyid med cing mi dmigaso// chos nyid dang // chos kyi dbyings dang / ches kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' med cing mi dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid da
159a6('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir rgyun tu zhug pa'i 'bras bu med cing mi dmigs so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang
159a7('bum): chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas med cing mi dmyigaso// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// nang stong pa nyid med cing mi dbyigaso// phyi stong pa nyid dmig su med
159a8('bum): pa'i phyir/ phyi stong pa nyid med cing mi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid dmig su med pa'i phyir phyi nang stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dir migasu
159b1('bum): med pa'i phyiran dngos po mang po 'ango bo nyid stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigaso// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
159b2('bum): gal te de ltar rtog cing sems pa dang / de ltar rtog cing sems pa'i tshe/ sems zhum pa med cing yongasu zhum pa med la/ mi 'jigs mi sdang / skrag par mi 'gyur na byang chub sems dpa' sems
159b3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa ci'i phyir mi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar
159b4('bum): shes par byan rab 'byor nga gis smos pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs ni gzugs ni kyi rang bzhin sa rlos dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
159b5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa rdzi lta ba bzhin du/ rab tu shes so// tshos pa kyi tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/ 'du shes ni 'du shes kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ 'du byed ni 'du byed ni gi ra
159b6('bum): bzhin dang / rnam par shes ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
159b7('bum): shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol
159b8('bum): tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dadu 'grus gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang shes rab kyi pha rlos tu phyin
160a1('bum): gipa ring bzhin dang bram gA dran pan par bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba ba'i dang cu 'phrul gi gang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lta dang stobs lnga dang/ byang chub
160a2('bum): yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / samam tan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam/ 
160a3('bum): dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / spong ba nyidi dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa rnams dang / 
160a4('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / ting gzungs kyi sgo rnamangs rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa
160a5('bum): chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa khe co brgyang gi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ rgyun tu zhug pa ni rgyun tu zhug
160a6('bum): bu'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/ lhan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni rnam pa
160a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ de de bzhin 'di ni de bzhin nyid rang bzhin dang bral ba/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyi dang / chos 'ang dang
160a8('bum): kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems sems dpa' chen po shas rab kyi pha rol tu
160b1('bum): pal rnyed pa'i sangag pa jis po na du ba tugs so/ tshang ldan pa shir dwa da du rngon phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bral bar shes par bya'o/ 
160b2('bum): snus pa me dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ril du/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byeng dang/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni jis bu/ skye mtshod dang / khams cadang / rte
160b3('bum): 'drom par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rab 'byorang gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos pa med pa
160b4('bum): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med
160b5('bum): po'o// yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gau ring bzhin na dang ni dngos po med pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ ji ltar na gzugs la gzugs kyi
160b6('bum): rang bzhin med pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'dushes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam pa shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / skye mched rnams la skye mched
160b7('bum): rnams gi rang bzhin med pa dang / khams rnams la khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung po'i rang bzhin med po dang / 
160b8('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang dge pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin med par shes par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang gzugs la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid med do/ 
161a1('bum): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do// skye mched rnams la skye mched rnams kyi mtshan med do
161a2('bum): khams rnams la khams rnams kyi mtshan nyid med do// ten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mtshan nyid med do// yang dag pa'i mthal yang dag pa'i mtha'i
161a3('bum): mtshan nyid med do// mtshan nyid la 'dre mtshan nyid gi rang bzhin med do// mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin la 'ang mtshan nyid rad kyi rang bzhin med do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa/ rab 'byor de byang chub sems
161a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la smrab pa na 'di la slob pa de rdzu rnam mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor kyis
161a5('bum): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ sho ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la slab pa 'di la slob pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
161a6('bum): du byung bar 'gyur ro/ gde ci'i slad du zhe na/ tshe dang lta bshor dwa ti'i bu'i drini 'di ltar chos thams cad ma skyes ma byung ba'i phyir ro// gasmras pa ma dang ldan pa rab 'byor daji ltar na
161a7('bum): chos thams cad ma skyes ma byung ba yin/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu'i gzugs gzus kyis stong ste/ 'byung ba mi dmigs so/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes
161a8('bum): da/ 'du byed dang / rnam par shes po rnam par shes pas snying ste/ de la skye ba yang mi rimigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yang dag pa'i mthas songs
161b1('bum): del skye ba mi dmigs/ 'byung ba 'ang mi dmigaso// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la de ltar spyod pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
161b2('bum): ba nyid dang nye bar gyur pa yin no// de ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'ang du nye bar gyur pa de ltar de ltar lus yongasu dag pa dang / ngag yongasu dag pa dang / sems yong su dag pa dang / mtshan yongasu
161b3('bum): dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// de ji ltar ji ltar lus yong su dag pa dang / ngag yongasu dag pa dang / sems yongasu dag pa dang / mtshan yong su dag pa thob par gyur pa de ltar de ltar byang chub sems dpa
161b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po de 'dod chags dang ldan bu'i sems mi skyed do// da zhe sdang ldan pa'i dang / ni mug dang ldan pa dang / nga rgyal dang ldan pa dang / g.yo sgyu dang ldan pa dang / phra dag dang / ser swA/ 
161b5('bum): dang ldan pa dang / lta ba den pa'i sems mi skyed byas te nam du yang me'i mengar du skye bar mi 'gyur te/ de 'dod chags gi sems mi skyed cing / zhe sdang dang / rti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / gzhi
161b6('bum): sgyuskya dang / phra dog dang / ser sna dang / lta ba ngan pa'i sems mi skyed pas/ nam du ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur te/ 'khor zug tu rtag par rdzus te/ skye bar 'gyur ro// sems can
161b7('bum): yangasu smin par bya ba'i don ma rtogs par nam du yang ngan song rnamasu skyo bar mi 'gyur ro// de sems can yongasu smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par byed cing
161b8('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'gro ste/ nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du/ nam yang
162a1('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang thas pa mi gyu'o// de bas dri med pa rnan pa sha rA dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan dang los sa pa nga/ 
162a2('bum): slob par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brtson mi btang bar spyad par bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar
162a3('bum): spyod pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u lnga pa'o// 
162a4('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan ladangs gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
162a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes ra nga / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la skyed na mchen ma la spyod de/ 
162a6('bum): gzugs rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs mi rtag ces
162a7('bum): gyi bar skyed na mchad mal srid de// g.ye tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed do rje rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyong namatshan ma la spyod do// gas te gzugs pade zhes bgyi bar spyod na mang ni/ 
162a8('bum): rnams spyong / ga ge tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / nam 'a shes pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod nas chen ma la spyod do// gas te gzugs sug sngal nas brgya bar sring na mtshan ma la spyod ngo // 
162b1('bum): gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug stab zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs bdag bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te tshor ba
162b2('bum): nga 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar skyed na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / 
162b3('bum): rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan la spyod do// gal te ga zu gas zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes
162b4('bum): ni bzhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa
162b5('bum): ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzu gas dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes
162b6('bum): pa dben zhes bgyi ba ro spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do// gzugs mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan la spyod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi dben
162b7('bum): zhes bgyi bar mi spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ skye mched/ dang / khas
162b8('bum): dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags rtsa pa'i bden
163a1('bum): rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa
163a2('bum): 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / ston pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshes
163a3('bum): po'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo rgyad rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug sngal ba dang
163a4('bum): bdag dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / ma zhi ba dang / dben pa dang mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
163a5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam du bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa ste/ byang chu
163a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam cu gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa po
163a7('bum): spyod de/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom mo zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma nyid la spyod pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs ma mkhas par rig par brgyan
163a8('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mi mkhas pa ji ltar rig par bya
163b1('bum): sa pa rkyen ga kyi phyin pa stong gzugs pa che sha sa
163b2('bum): khyod kyis na/ de gzugs sa mos shing 'du shes tshan gyis cho pas/ gzugs mngon par 'du ba la spyod de/ deni skye ba dang / gab dang / na pa dang 'chib dang / mya ngan dang / skyes
163b3('bum): 'don pa dang / sdug sprul ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi grol/ sdug sprul chen po las yongs su mi grol bar brjod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang
163b4('bum): rnam par shes pa las mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gis rlob pas rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye
163b5('bum): ba dang zla ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug sbal chen po dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su ma grol/ sdug sngal chen po las
163b6('bum): yongs su mi grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mig la semos shing 'du shes te byin gis rlob/ rna ba dang sna dang / 
163b7('bum): shAlce dang / lus dang / yid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ gzugs mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rla / sgra dang / dri dang ro dang / reg dang / chos la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlom
163b8('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gis rlob/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / sras kyi rnam par shes pa dang / srid kyi
164a1('bum): rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ mig gi 'dus te reg pas mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlong / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te/ 
164a2('bum): reg pa dang / sras kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pas mos shing 'du shes te byim gis rjong/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bal mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlong/ rnam
164a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis cho/ ra ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus
164a4('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob ma rig pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin kyis rlog 'du shes khyed dang / rnam par shwes+ya ba dang / ming dang / gzugs dang / 
164a5('bum): skye mched drug dang reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa sa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / 
164a6('bum): stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms pa
164a7('bum): 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang
164a8('bum): mi sna dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs tsu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dgra par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas rgya
164b1('bum): ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad mngon par 'du bya ba la mdo spyod de/ khyod ni skye ba dang / rga dang / na pa dang / 'ching dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug sprul za dang yid mi ba dang / 'khrug byam
164b2('bum): yongs su mi grol sdug sngal chen po las yongs su mi grol bar brjod do// de nas me dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos kyi sra 'am/ rang songs rgya
164b3('bum): kyis yang mngon du bya ba'i skal ba med na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ba ste ci smos/ te/ de ni grwanas med do// tshe dang ldan pa na ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
164b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed pa ni tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas shes par bya'o// smras pa dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
164b5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas par shes par bya/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
164b6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / gzugs la mi spyod tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mi skyed/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi spyong
164b7('bum): dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan gal mi spyod/ gas te gzugs rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs pade zhes bya ba dang / gzugs sdugs gnas dra 'odza
164b8('bum): gzugs pa dag ces bya ba dang / gzugs padag med ces bya ba dang / gzugs ni zhes bya ba dang // gzugs pani nas bya ba dang / gzugs sor nas bya dang / gzugs mo song nas kya
165a1('bum): gzugs mtshan ma song bces bya ba dang / gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / gzugs ston pa yod ces bya ba dang / gzugs smon pa med ces bya ba dang / gzugs dben zhes bya
165a2('bum): 'ang / gzugs mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed da da rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde zhes bya ba dag swAn
165a3('bum): sngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mi sbyong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan me yod ces bya ba dang te mtshan
165a4('bum): ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med/ ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya ba/ du yi/ spyod pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
165a5('bum): chen po thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang gzugs ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gus na yang
165a6('bum): gzugs med/ gzugs las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid med de kyang gzugs/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam
165a7('bum): par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang rnam par shes pa med/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong
165a8('bum): pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa nyid/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten bcing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rlonas dang / spong
165b1('bum): nyid thams sa dadang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i badren pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / chad med pa rnams dang / mazugs smod pa'i sems pa
165b2('bum): 'jug pa rnams dang/ rnam par thar pa rnams dang / rnam par thar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smin pa myed pa dang / mngon pa

165b4('bum): zhi dang byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos pa bcwo rgyad dag stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na
165b5('bum): yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med der stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnamaso// sangs rgyas kyi// 
165b6('bum): chos ma'i rnams kyang stong pa nyid do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o// 
165b7('bum): shes rab / bam po bcu gcig pa// / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' seMs
165b8('bum): dpa' chen pog/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba yod// de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
166a1('bum): spyod pa dgas so// spyod do nasu byung ming migs so// spyod kya spyod pa spyod/ nga spyod byung po nas kya yang migs so// spyong pa 'ang ma yin ma myong ba yangamaman
166a2('bum): zhes bya bar mi dmigs so// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs so// mi sgyid ces
166a3('bum): bya bar mi dmigs so// spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs so// spyod pa yang ma yin mi spyod pa yang ma yin zhes bya bar mi dmigs so// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni
166a4('bum): 'di ltar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir te// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te// tshe dang ldan
166a5('bum): ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyesems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyodapa'i tshe/ spyod do zhes bya bar yang mi dmig so/ mi spyod do zhes
166a6('bum): bya bar 'ang mi dmigs so// spyod kyang skyong pa mi spyod kyang skye dade zhes bya bar mi dmigs so// spyod pa mang ma yin mo spyod pa yang ma yin no zhes bya bar mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni
166a7('bum): sathams cad ngom po med pa 'ang bzhin du 'ong du chud cing mablangs pa'i phyir te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems da 'chen po rnams kyi ting de 'dzini chos thams cad skye bamyed pa zhes bya skye
166a8('bum): byache ba mchog tu bye ba/ chad med par nges pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa ste/ ting 'dzin ngas rnam par spyong pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen zin
166b1('bum): myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin 'di 'ba' zhig gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
166b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'am/ 'on tam de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag kyang yod/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa
166b3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag la rnam par spyod pas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
166b4('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba yod do// smras pa tshe dang / ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin gzhan gang dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du
166b5('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgyad gang yin/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpan
166b6('bum): chen po/ rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par bskyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
166b7('bum): byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// de bzhin du rin chen phyag zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 
166b8('bum): zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 
167a1('bum): tsug rnam par sa ga zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin song ngo // chos kyi dbyings su sa pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin med do// nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rdo rje wu bu zhes
167a2('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes
167a3('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// dpung rnam par dkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa'i
167a4('bum): phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// tshig bla dgas la rayang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// phyag rgya yongs su
167a5('bum): 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// nyam pa medapazhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos thams cad yang dgapar 'du ba rgya mtsho'i bya rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// nam
167a6('bum): mkha' rgyas par 'grengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rdo rje dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// dbang po'i dpa
167a7('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rgyun kyis rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// seng ge rnam par sgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// snrel bzhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ 
167a8('bum): nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// gnas la rten pa med pa zhes bya'i
167b1('bum): ting nge 'dzin yod do// sems pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 'od 'byed pa
167b2('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ 'o dgril pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ dga'
167b3('bum): babyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// zad mi shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// mi 'pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// gzi' brjid
167b4('bum): sod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// zad pa dang bral/ ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// mi g.yo ba zhes bya da pa'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 'jig pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
167b5('bum): 'dzin yod do// nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin Di yod do// zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod dngo/ shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// snang ba
167b6('bum): gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 
167b7('bum): rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// sems gnas pa zhe bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
167b8('bum): yod do// rin chen mtha' yas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 
168a1('bum): dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos kyi 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed
168a2('bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// yi ge rnam par dkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 
168a3('bum): 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rnam par gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// mi nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzi
168a4('bum): yod do// rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// spyod pa dang to ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// g.yol ba med pa/ zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// yul las rgal ba zhes
168a5('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// yon tan thams cad kyi chogs su gyur po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// dge ba'i me tog rgyas
168a6('bum): shing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// chos thams cad las
168a7('bum): 'das pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// yongs su gcad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
168a8('bum): 'dzin yod do// gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rnam par mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod / 
168a9('bum): smongs pa mgyu' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ti 'dzin mang/ 
168b1('bum): rgyas pa yong me sa dzin spyod / lung sa rlon pa spyod chu na myong do// ya smras 'jug pa zhes bya nga rdzun mong du
168b2('bum): kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// mngon par dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i
168b3('bum): ting nge 'dzin yod do// sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// mngon par dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 
168b4('bum): rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// bde ba dang sdug sngal thams cad las mngon par dga' ba me da pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// zad mi shes pa'i za
168b5('bum): ma za tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// yang dag pa dang / log pa sa cad yang dag par sel ba/ zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod/ 
168b6('bum): 'gal dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar bya ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge yod do// mthun pa dang 'grel ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod/ 
168b7('bum): snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// zla ba dri ma me nga pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
168b8('bum): yod do// ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// nyon mongs pa med par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin mod do// nyon
169a1('bum): ga 'ongs pa dang las brtson mongs pa med par yang drug par gnos pa nis rgyu ba'i ting 'dzin yod ngo // gnas dmigs su med pas rtsol bzhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// de bzhin nyid
169a2('bum): gnas shing / sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i dring nge 'dzin yod do// ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhen
169a3('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// shar dwa ti'i bla nam mkha' la 'i rdzogs pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i
169a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang rtsi dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par la/ ni chang rgya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de dag ni
169a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzi na te/ ting nge 'dzin des dag la rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ myur
169a6('bum): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya snye de ltar ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo gang la skabs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
169a7('bum): 'dapa' chen po rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sa rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu tshad med grangs med pa gzhan dag kyang song ngo // de nas
169a8('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sa thu sa myo dang ldan pa rab 'byod pa 'di skad ces smras si gachi dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang chen po gang ting 'dzi ni de dag gis rnam par spod 'i
169b1('bum): slod ga do ni ga shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang / bla na med layang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya chub tu spang stan to// de ltar phyogs na
169b2('bum): ni rlob seras kyi gyur ba med do// das 'dug gosangag gis mnyam par nas dag gis ma TIg 'ge lu / 
169b3('bum): rje sems su gyur bayang med pa nga sa rnam par rtog pa dug mi mi ma su'o// sdus pa tshe dang ldan par du 'byo dag gnas pa'i byang chu ba sems pa pa
169b4('bum): dri bzhin gshegs du dgra bcom pa yang dgu par rdzogs kyi rje sangs rgyas rnams kyis sa mun pa yod dam/ nga khyod kyis smras bya/ seMng ldan ya sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni skad do// de ni'i phyin na
169b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ming kun nas/ ting 'dzin kyang gzhan byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba myed kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid
169b6('bum): kyang ting nge 'dzin to// ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpo' sem/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin to// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gas te de ltar ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan la/ 
170a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan pa ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub
170a2('bum): sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' nyid dang ting nge 'dzin no/ de ting nge 'dzin snyan par nus sam rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni ma yin no// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rigs kyi
170a3('bum): bu ting nge 'dzin de la 'du shes su byed dam/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes su byed pa med do// smras pa ji ltar de la 'du shes su byed par mi 'gyur/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ 
170a4('bum): rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro// smras pa de la ji ltar na togad pa med pa yin/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ chos thams rtsod med pa'i phyir rtog pa med do// che dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
170a5('bum): rnam grangs des na/ rigs kyi bu de la rnam par shes pa ra byed pa med do// 'du shes su byed pa med do// smras pa/ ci'i phyir/ rnam par shes par byed pa med cing / 'du shes su 'gyur/ 
170a6('bum): 'gyur ba med do// rang 'byor kyis smras so/ ting nge 'dzin de yang med la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa byed pa med do// lu sa su gyur
170a7('bum): bsring ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ rab 'byor legs so// legs so// 'di dag ni legs par bshad do// ji sa ngas nyon mongs
170a8('bum): ba med pa la rnam par spyod pa'i nyan thos kyi nang na/ mchog tu bshad pa ni 'di yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la srab par bya'o// 
170b1('bum): lasam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la srab par bya'o// 
170b2('bum): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis srab par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das
170b3('bum): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis slob po// bsam
170b4('bum): gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha ro/ rdul tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
170b5('bum): pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis slob po// byang chub kyi phyog sa kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis slob po/ bcom ldan
170b6('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis slob pa yin/ bsam
170b7('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs
170b8('bum): ngobo'i tshul gis slob pa yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis slob pa yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom/ 
171a1('bum): ldan 'das tsho'i slad du mi dmigs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsas pa/ sha ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ bdag mi dmigs so// sems can dang / srog dang 'gro ba dang / gso ma
171a2('bum): kha dang / skyes bu dang / gang theg dang / shed bdag can dang / shes bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po mi dmigs paso// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ bu dang / skye
171a3('bum): mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ta sdug sngal mi dmigaso// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ kun 'byung ba mi dmigs so// 'gog to dong
171a4('bum): lam mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ 'dod pa'i khams mi dmigs sor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ gzugs kyi/ khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam por dag pa'i phyir/ gzugs med
171a5('bum): pa'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ rol tu phyin pa rnams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag ba'i phyir/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden
171a6('bum): rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid da
171a7('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par
171a8('bum): rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ rgyun tu zhugs pa mi dmig so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir
171b1('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ byang chub mi
171b2('bum): dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas mi dmigs so// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags/ 
171b3('bum): pa dang / pa kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ding ni/ rnam par dag pa zhes bya ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu
171b4('bum): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis slob pa yin no// gsol/ pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sa
171b5('bum): dpa' chen po/ chos gang dang gang la slob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'angs kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'ibyang chub sems dpa' dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang la yang
171b6('bum): bslob pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos 'di dag ni/ byis pa so so'i skye bos/ ji ltar mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu'i rnam pa yod pa ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
171b7('bum): na chos 'di dag gang gis mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ji ltar med pa de ltar yod de/ de ltar yod pa ma yin pas de'i phyir med ces bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i
171b8('bum): slad du/ mchis tha ma lags pa ma mchis zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin
172a1('bum): tshor ba dag 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum
172a2('bum): bcu rtsa bdun rnams kyi bar du nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco rgyad kyi bar du nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo/ 
172a3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ yod pa ma yin no// de la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams med pa zhes mngon par zhes pas/ sred pa la mngon par zhen te/ de dag gis med pa yongs su rtags pas/ med
172a4('bum): pal mngon par zhen cing / 'di lta ste chad pa dang / rtag pa'i mtha' gnyis la chags pas de drag mi shes mi mthong ste/ gang med pa'i chos de dag yongs su brtags pas/ ming dang gzugs
172a5('bum): la mngon par zhen pa de dag dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la zhen te/ de ltar de dag la mngon par zhen pas/ yod pa ma
172a6('bum): yin pa'i chos rnams la yongs su rtog ste/ de dag mi shes mi mthong / ci mi shes mi mthong zhe na/ gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo // tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // 
172a7('bum): skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun mi shes mi mthong ngo / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar
172a8('bum): mi shes mi mthong ngo // de ltar de dag ni byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'dong ba ste/ de dag 'byung ba ma yin no// gang nas kyang 'byung ba ma yin zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no/ 
172b1('bum): gzugs kyi khams nas byung ba yin no// gzugs med pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no/ nyan thos dang / nyan rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'byung ba ma yin no// de dag ni yid mi ches zhe na/ ji ma
172b2('bum): yid mi ches pa ste/ gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo // zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// byang chub kyi bar du byang chub kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// de dag ni gnas ma yin pa ste/ ji ltar gnas ma
172b3('bum): yin pa ste/ ji ltar gnas pa ma yin zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
172b4('bum): dang bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha ma rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin no// phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la ga de nas pa ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la gnas
172b5('bum): pa ma yin no/ de dag ni mngon par zhen pa ma yin te/ ji ltaramangon par zhen pa yin zhe na/ gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yi na/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mdo
172b6('bum): par zhen pa yin/ mig la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ skye man ched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mngon par zhen pa/ 
172b7('bum): yin/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lta bar gyur pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ byang chub kyi bar la mngon par zhen pa yin te/ de'i phyir na byis pa zhes bya'o// 
172b8('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi sleb cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags sam/ bcom
173a1('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
173a2('bum): mi 'byung ba yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung
173a3('bum): bya legs ka bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gtams shing mngon par zhen/ bsam
173a4('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tuphyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtsams shing
173a5('bum): mngon par zhen/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang byang chub kyi
173a6('bum): yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gdams shing mngon par zhen/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med
173a7('bum): pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa
173a8('bum): ting badzin dang / gsus kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin phyo shags pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa pa'i dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgya sa
173b1('bum): mas shing mngon par zhen/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid kyi bar la gtams shing rjes su bangon par zhen pas/ sha ra dwa tI'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni
173b2('bum): zhes rab kyi rab tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de la lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
173b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa larnam pa gang gis slob par 'gyur ba lags di ltar bsgrubs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dang/ shar du sa
173b4('bum): bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmyigs/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing / sha ra dwa ti'i bu
173b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro/ la tu phyin pa la de ltar slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen dpa nyid du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba yin no// bas rten gyi
173b6('bum): phyi rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nga / bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol rang phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i/ 
173b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing / yang dgra par rjes su mi mthong ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la skyong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de mi dmyigs shing / yang dag par
173b8('bum): rjes su mi mthong zhing / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung
174a1('bum): sashar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i rgyal gyis
174a2('bum): rnam pa thams ca mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // gsos pa bcom ldan 'das gang dmigs pa'i mya mas rnam pathams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lagasu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal
174a3('bum): nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / dngos pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar shes par bya'o// 
174a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa steng brag te shu ga mas sbyin drug kyi // de mcho dang sun parab 'byer kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'dzin pa
174a5('bum): ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di ska da du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung
174a6('bum): dro bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji sang du bstan par bgyi ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'dibasam gtan gyi
174a7('bum): ma tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi 'i tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa pha rob tu phyin pa dang / tshu mas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i ba N+DI byin pa la bsrabs shing / 
174a8('bum): rnamams cad mkhyen pa nyid du byung pong sunga'i phyis bu 'ong kying chu kyi phyogs kyi sa rnams kyi par khyabs paso zhing / rnam tha sems cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur
174b1('bum): sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos mi 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du thob par 'gyur

174b3('bum): lung ston cig/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin sum 'am/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma ma

175a7('bum): kyang sgyu ma sgyu mi nyid kyang gzugs so/ bcom ldan 'das cher ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rna bu'i rnam par shes pa nyid
