180a3('bum): spong sa ma dusems nyi sems can thams cad la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de snyi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches ston te/ tshor ba dang 'di shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rkyeg ces bya
180a4('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to// gzugs sdug sngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang steng pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par re/ du bya ba snyed ces bya ba dang / 
180a5('bum): raben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa sdug sngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan
180a6('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par la su bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa
180a7('bum): sdug stsal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya ba rnyed mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches sten to ste
180a8('bum): rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// 
180b1('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs mi rtag pa'i
180b2('bum): rnam par yid la byed de/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs mi rtag/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / rnam par shA
180b3('bum): pa mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed de// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs sdug sngal ba dang / bdag med pa
180b4('bum): dang zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed de/ de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// 
180b5('bum): tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug smra/ nyel ba dang / bdag med pa dang zhi ba dang stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 
180b6('bum): dben pa'i rnam pa yid la byed de/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yi nga la byed de/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khris kyo pha rol tu phyin pa ma nyams pa ste/ 
180b7('bum): de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyuraro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
180b8('bum): la skyed pa'i tshe/ ches de dag mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug sbal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / 
181a1('bum): sngon po med pa'i rnam du dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam dang / dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed pa dang / bzod pa dang mes pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
181a2('bum): bo'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs mi sdang sgeg par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
181a3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa le skyed pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi la bya bas/ gzugs mi rtog ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ 
181a4('bum): tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dong / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ra bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// gzugs su ga sngal zhes bya ba dang / bradrug med ces bya bya dang / 
181a5('bum): zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bye bdang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
181a6('bum): gyis rab tu rtog po/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug sAl zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / steng zhes bya ba
181a7('bum): dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / spen pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i rgyal gyis rab tu rtog ge/ de ltar de dag la rnam pa zas
181a8('bum): cad da mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas mi rtong zhing / brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub
181b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi spang / skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhamyi srung byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong
181b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bsagazugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu te gcod / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa
181b3('bum): yo la bya ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos de ma yin pa byeng bya sems dpa'i phyogs su 'gyur ba gzhon gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / gzugs srog snga la zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis du
181b4('bum): bdag mod ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mA ru dron par 'du bye ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhe
181b5('bum): bya de// mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i srid la bya ba dang / mi dag nan phyi ma sbyin pa byang chub sems ca gyi phyogs su
181b6('bum): 'gyur ba gzhan gyi ge mi 'byed pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sgo rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug sbal zhes bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba
181b7('bum): dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / draben zhes bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog cing / nyan thos
181b8('bum): rang/ sangs rgyas kyi dang ldan pa'i yi la bya byas/ mi dge pa des smon pa de byang chub kyi phyogs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa 'dzin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen yo so/ 
182a1('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs mi snang / skrag par mi 'gyur ro// bam po bcu gnyis pa
182a2('bum): nga 'byor ga'an sang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha com tsun pas spong ba'in/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa kyid dang ldan pa'i yi 'a byangs/ 
182a3('bum): 'di ltar rab tu rtog ste/ gzugs kyi steng pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa nyi ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa
182a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa ma yin gyi// rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sto/ pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mig stong pa nyid kyis mig stong pa nyid ma yin gyi/ mig nyid kyang
182a5('bum): stong pa nyid de/ stong pa nyid kyang mig go// rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang / lus ni yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ yid stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ stong pa nyid kyang yod de/ gzugs
182a6('bum): kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa rjid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// ska rang dri dang / ro dang reg dang / chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ chos stong pa nyid ma yin
182a7('bum): skyetshus nying kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang chos saM/ rig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis/ mig gi nas par shes pa stong pa ma smin gyi/ rig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa'i / 
182a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna pa'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam pa rishes pa sto / 
182b1('bum): ba ma yin gyi/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ 
182b2('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid de/ stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg
182b3('bum): pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid de/ stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gi 'dus
182b4('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis cher ba stong pa nyid kyis/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba steng pa ma yin gyi/ mig go 'dus te reg/ nye ba'i rkyen kyis tsher ba stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang / 
182b5('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tsher ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / 
182b6('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus tshe reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bla ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
182b7('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa ma
182b8('bum): yin gyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
183a1('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
183a2('bum): chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// thabs mkhas pa de dag dang / 
183a3('bum): ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bstan pa 'di thos ni ma 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mo 'gyur ro// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis
183a4('bum): yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos na/ mi 'jigs mi srung skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de gang 'gra/ 
183a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bu shes gnyen ni sa te gang de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i
183a6('bum): tshul gyis ches ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// tshor ba dang 'du
183a7('bum): shes dog 'du byed dang / rnam par shes b+ha mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul byas ches ston to// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma ma
183a8('bum): par/ nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang
183b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dag pa'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs sdug sngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos skyon bu dang / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / 
183b2('bum): rnam par shes pa stug sprul zhes bya bar da mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sten pa dang / gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 
183b3('bum): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 
183b4('bum): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya b.re de mi dmigs pa'i rgyu dal gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs snyed zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang 'du
183b5('bum): shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmi gas pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar dwa mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa
183b6('bum): dang / cher ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sten pa dang / gzugs smin pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
183b7('bum): ches ston pa dang / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sten pa dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmis
183b8('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi
184a1('bum): ga dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rjes ston pa dang / rkyer bu dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dbyes rjes bya bo myi dmigs pa'i rgyus byas chos ston cing / dge' badzin du thanas tsa
184a2('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rung sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'dri na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshu
184a3('bum): gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge' ba'i dri shes gnyen ni/ grang de la mog mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / 
184a4('bum): rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang / lus dang yid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches ston pa dang tha mig sdug sprul zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul byas chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang sna dang
184a5('bum): lce dang lus dang / yid sdug snga ma zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i chu/ la gyis chos ston pa dang / mig bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ches pa dang / rna ba dang sna dang
184a6('bum): lce dang / lus dang yid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshu la gyis chos pa dang / mig zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmi gos pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang sna dang / lce dang lus
184a7('bum): dang / yid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig steng zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches ston pa dang / rna ba dang sna dang lde dang / lus dang yid ts+li zhes bya bar de ma
184a8('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / na ba dang / sna dang lde dang / lus dang yid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmig pa'i/ 
184b1('bum): tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang sna dang / lce dang lus dang yid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
184b2('bum): chos ston pa dang / mig mngon par 'du bya ba med bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang sna dang lce dang / lus dang yid mngon par 'du bya ba med par de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
184b3('bum): chos ston pa dang / mig dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang sna dang lce dang / lus dang yid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa
184b4('bum): ba de dag kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan tho/ ngas kyi sna 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
184b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzu gas mi rtag ces bya bar ngo ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rje sa ston to// dge bo'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
184b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// sgra dang dri dang / ro dang reg dang chos mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
184b7('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ gzugs pa dag med
184b8('bum): sdug sdel zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sgra dang dri dang / ro dang reg dang chos sdug sngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs bdag med/ 
185a1('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang / reg dang chos bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs zhi zhes bya
185a2('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sgra dang dri dang re dang / reg dang chos zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches ston pa dang / gzugs stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul
185a3('bum): gyis rjes sten pa dang DA sgra dang dri dang / ro dang reg dang chos stong zhes bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul kyis chos ston pa dang / grwazugs mtshan ma med ces bya ba rlung mo dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang
185a4('bum): sgra dang dri dang / reg dang chos mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sten phyir tsha ni gzugs smon pa me de ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang sgra dang dri dang / 
185a5('bum): rmeng reg dang / chos smon pa med ces bya bar ngo mi dam gas pa'i tshul gyis moHsa ston pa dang / gzugs mdza na par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
185a6('bum): ston to// sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang / chos mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi drimigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
185a7('bum): pa dang / sgra dang dri dang / ro dang reg dang chos dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos
185a8('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge pa'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan ya
185b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
185b2('bum): kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang lce'i rnam
185b3('bum): ra shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dga' ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
185b4('bum): nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa sdug sngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis choso ston
185b5('bum): ga dge pa'i / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dgra/ sa 'i rnam par shes pa dang / kye'i rnam par shes pa dang / sa kyi rnam 'i shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa sug stsal zhes/ 
185b6('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / migo gi rnam par shes pa bdag med bya bar dad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam pa
185b7('bum): sa pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam pa tshazhes pa bdag med ces bya bar dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa ni
185b8('bum): zhes bya bar ngo mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dag gA'i rnam par shes pa dag / khri'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam ma
186a1('bum): ni zhes bu bur de mi dmigs pa'i rgyas kyis chos ston pa dang / mig kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches sten pa dang / rno ba'i rnam pa shes
186a2('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi rnam pa
186a3('bum): par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes
186a4('bum): dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang // mig gi rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sten pa
186a5('bum): drung / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par nas pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / kye'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa
186a6('bum): sbyin pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya chos ston pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du ba ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / 
186a7('bum): na pa'i rnam par shes pa rin/ sgra'i rnam pa thos pa dgu khyo'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du dru ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa
186a8('bum): tshul gyis ches ston pa dang / mig gi rnam pa zhes pa dben zhes bya bar de'i dmigs pa'i rgyal gyis chos sten pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / 'i rna pa shes pa dang / ston rnam pas nas bla da
186b1('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / ming kyi rnam par shes pa dben nas bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang dge ba'i ma ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma tegs par tan
186b2('bum): thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyis du yongs su ba snor mi 'jug pa'o// rabu 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bya
186b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge' ba'i bshes kye nyan ni/ gang do la mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
186b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan tho sa kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bslar mi 'jug pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sme
186b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid rang kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston rnying / dge' ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam bya thams cad mkhyen
186b6('bum): pa nyid mu rtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa sdug sbal zhes bya bor de mi dmigs blo'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / 
186b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug sngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston thaMb+h+ya dang
186b8('bum): mi gang gi 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg
187a1('bum): bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to// mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus

187a5('bum): te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
187a6('bum): ston par me rna pa 'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te log pa dang / lce 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa sbyin pa med ces bya bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis

187a8('bum): ngas te reg pa dang / mid kyi 'angs te reg pa mngon par 'a bya ba med ces bya bar dem migs phyi'i chul gyis nos ston pa dang / cig gi 'dus te reg pa byen nas bya bar dem dmigs pa'i chus kyis nos
187b1('bum): ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang /

187b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad

187b5('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa lasabyung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i/ tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag
187b6('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug
187b7('bum): ba dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sdug sngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa

188a1('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i/

188a3('bum): cher ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus
188a4('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te regasde pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byu dang po'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i cher ba dang /

189a1('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i beshas gnyen ni gang de la
189a2('bum): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches smon pa dang / sug sngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang /

189a4('bum): sgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam po thams ca/ da mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
189a5('bum): kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya bar de mi da migs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug sngal zhes bya ba dang /

189a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'odres pa sgom pa'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sbom po'i phyir/ de mi dmi
189a8('bum): ba'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub kyi bar du sgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / degartsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sgom ma rtogs par nyan thos
189b1('bum): kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngon mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen des
189b2('bum): yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos na nimi 'jigs mi sdang / skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ rab 'byer kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
189b3('bum): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing sul skrag par 'gyur zhing / thabs rgya
189b4('bum): mkhas pa ste/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu ltung zhing / dga' ba'i bshes gyis yongs su spangs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dang/

189b7('bum): ning dmigs te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rnam sems su byed pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ bzong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / tshul khrim

190a1('bum): de lta bu ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' seMs
190a2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas med par/ gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid
190a3('bum): la byed/ gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nang stong
190a4('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa phyi skyong ba zhes bya bar yi da la byed/ rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa
190a5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya ba nyid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i rgyu la gyis nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang dmigs/ phyi steng pa nyi de de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po
190a6('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi drir de yang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// mig nang sreng bzhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig phyi nang spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig dngos po med
190a7('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba dang sna dang / lce dang lus dang / yid nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed// phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ 
190a8('bum): yid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i de/ 
190b1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang mi dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// gzugs nang pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya
190b2('bum): bar yid la byed/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ sgra dang dri dang / ro dang reg dang / chos nang skyong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chos phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
190b3('bum): chos phyi nang steng pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chos dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs phyi steng pa nyid de yang dmigs
190b4('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom ste mas su byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar
190b5('bum): yid la byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yidal byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i bye
190b6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa nang stong
190b7('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa phyi steng pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
190b8('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang mi dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
191a1('bum): da kyi bar du sa nga migs / stong ba nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// mig ga 'das te reg pa nang stong ba zhes bya bar yid ma byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa phyi snang ba zhes
191a2('bum): bya bar yod la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'das te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba
191a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg phyi stong pa
191a4('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang steng pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te 'ag pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
191a5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis/ nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi steng pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs
191a6('bum): la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba phyi steng pa
191a7('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dngos pade ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
191a8('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg
191b1('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba phyi stong pa nyid zhes bya bar yid la byed/ 
191b2('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te regro ba'i rkyen kyis cher po/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes yid la byed/ 
191b3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de yong dmigs/ stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs shing / 
191b4('bum): stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems du byed do// sa'i khams cadra nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ sa'i khams phyi sto/ ngang pa nyid zhes bya bar yid la byed/ sa'i khams phyi nang stob
191b5('bum): ba nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ sa'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi byor zhes bya bar yid la byed// chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / 
191b6('bum): nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi nang
191b7('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po med pa'ongo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs
191b8('bum): phyi steng pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigaso shing / stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// 
192a1('bum): ma rig pa nang stong pa nyid zhes bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa dngos po med pa'i ngo
192a2('bum): me nyid stong pa nyid kyi thar nas nub med ma yid sa byed po dang / rnam pa shes pa dang / l+r-ing dang gzugs dang / sbyin ched drug po// reg pa dang / tshor ba dang sred pa da // len pa dang / med pa dang / snru ba
192a3('bum): rga shi rlung stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rga sha phyi steng pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rga shi phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la bying / rga shi dngos pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes
192a4('bum): bya bar yid la byed/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang pa nyid de sa dang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang skyeng pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang
192a5('bum): dmigs shing / stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems// dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
192a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ dran pa nye bar
192a7('bum): gzhag pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang
192a8('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ 
192b1('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge
192b2('bum): 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stob bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
192b3('bum): bco brgyad sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag kyang dmigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs
192b4('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
192b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar tha/ ste ba mi mkhas pas ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o di thos na/ 'jigs shing sdang la skrag par 'gyur ro// 
192b6('bum): gsol ba bcom ldan 'ongs ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing
192b7('bum): spang la/ skrag par 'gyur zhing / sdig po'i grogs po'i sug par ltung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
192b8('bum): po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / mos pa med par byed de// zlog par byed do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
193a1('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mos pa med par byed cing / zlog par
193a2('bum): byed pa ste/ 'di ni de bzhin ga shegs pas gsungs bre ma yin/ 'dri ni chos ma yin/ 'di ni 'dus bu ma yin gyis/ 'di ni ston pa'i snyan pa ma yin gyis/ 'di la srab par bya ba ni
193a3('bum): 'o/ mdo sde 'di dag ni/ rang bzed byas pa ste/ 'di ni mnyan par mi bya'o// bzung bar mi bya'o// rje ba che te dar mi bya'o// klag par mi bya'o// kun chub par mi bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid lang
193a4('bum): mi bya'o/ 'di dag ni gzhan la bstan par mi bya'o zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor
193a5('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapo'i grogs po nini 'di lta ro bdud sdog 'dun srings rgyas kyi cha byad du byas pa dag/ byang chub sems dpa'o
193a6('bum): sems dpa'o sbyin pa'i drung du 'ongs nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug las zlog cing / mos pa med par byed de rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa snyoms pas khyed la ci zhig bya
193a7('bum): sam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa snyoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bzod po'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms pas khyod kyi
193a8('bum): zhig bya/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms pas khyed la ci zhig bya/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sboms pas khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer po 'dzinaskyes bdud kyi las mi son
193b1('bum): bdud kyi las nyes par mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can sangs rgyas kyi
193b2('bum): cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po'i drung du phyin te/ nyan thos dang ldan po'i sems kyis/ mdo' dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa 'jog lung bstan pa dang / tshigs
193b3('bum): su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng bzhi dang / 'di ltar 'ongs pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmongad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa'i brjed pa dang / 
193b4('bum): gtan la phab ba ro bstan pa dag ston to// 'grel to/ rnam par 'byed do// gsol bar byed do// yongs su bstan to zhes bdud kyi las rnam pa 'di lta bu dag myi smra
193b5('bum): ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chechen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po m+bo rig par bya'o/ 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig te can sangs rgyas kyi cha byang du
193b6('bum): byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod lo ni byang chub kyi sems cung zad kyang med/ khyod ni phyir mi ldog pa yang ma yin
193b7('bum): che byed kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya mi nus so// zhes sbyor byedo 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las drag mo smra/ mi ston pa 'di ni// byang chub sems dpa'o// 
193b8('bum): semus dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dgo sangs rgyas kyi ma byang du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drang
194a1('bum): du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu ka/ mig ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba dang sna dang / lho dang lus dang / yid ni bdag gam gdag gis stong ngo // gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis
194a2('bum): steng ngo // sgra dang dri dang / ro dang reg dang / chos ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pas stong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam
194a3('bum): bar shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis skyong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang
194a4('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam/ bdag gis stong ngo / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni
194a5('bum): bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
194a6('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni/ bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ bdag gam bdag gis steng ngo // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
194a7('bum): brjod pa'i pha leb tu phyin pa dang / na cen 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin tha dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngo na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis snying ngen byang chub kyi phyogs
194a8('bum): kyi chos rnams kyi bar du bdag gam bdag gis steng ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar ni/ bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
194b1('bum): rdzogs par sangs rgyas te yang ci zhig byagazhes zer ba 'di lta bu ni/ bdud kyi las dag mi span pa mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'/ sems dpa' chen po ni sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ 
194b2('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang / bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byang du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu shar phyogs ni sa
194b3('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'angs dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas shes bya ba yang med do// byang chub sems zhes bya ba yang med do/ nyan thos
194b4('bum): shes bya ba yang med do// lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang sha ra dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / 
194b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams// kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas shes bya ba yang med do// byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang med do// nyan thos zhes bya ba
194b6('bum): yang med do// zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi sten pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang
194b7('bum): ladud sdig to can dag nyan thos kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba zlog cing / nyan
194b8('bum): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'dems pa dang / rjes su ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las suHmi smra mi snyan pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grog por rig
195a1('bum): bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig te can dag 'khan po dang / slob dpon gyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin/ byang
195a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sted pa las zlog cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yong la bya ba las thog ste dran pa nye bar gzhog pa rna mos
195a3('bum): la skyer ba dang / yang dag par sbeng ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams pa 'a
195a4('bum): 'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor ba dang / steng pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / ston pa med pa'i bar gyi chos rnams la sbyar cing / de ltar rigs kyi bu khyed kyis chos
195a5('bum): de dag yongs su skems la/ nyan thos kyis mngon du gyis shig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa/ 'i byang chub kyis/ khyed la ci zhig pa zhes zer ba de lta
195a6('bum): bu'i bdud kyi las ngag gis mi smra/ mi sbyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i gle gas par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud
195a7('bum): sdig to can pa dang ma'i cha byed du byas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin nas/ de la 'di skad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
195a8('bum): chub tu mngon pa rdzogs pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ de'i don du ni skal ba tshad med/ grangs med par 'khor ba na 'khor zhing / rga lag dang mgo bcad pas/ nyon mongs par 'gyur
195b1('bum): zhing / gang la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / dgra
195b2('bum): bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig ces zer ba de lta bu'ibadud kyi las ngag mi smra/ mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
195b3('bum): chen po'i sdig pa'i grags par rlog par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang / bdud sdig to can dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 
195b4('bum): gzugasu mi rtag ces bya bar ngo mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches ston pa dang / gzugs sdug sngal ba dang / bdag ma da pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / 
195b5('bum): spen pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / da na zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa da nga / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes
195b6('bum): pa mi rtag ces bya bar ches ston pa dang / mngon par 'du byas rnam par shes pa sdug sbal ba dang / bdug med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smyon pa mang pa dang / ma
195b7('bum): bar 'du bya ba mod pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sten pa dang / mig mi rtag ces bya ba dang / srug sngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / steng pa dang / mtshan ma
195b8('bum): med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang sna dang / lce dang lus dang / yid mi rtag ces bya ba pa/ 
196a1('bum): sdug sngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
196a2('bum): chos ston pa dang / gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug sngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 
196a3('bum): dben zhes bya ba re dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang sgra dang dri dang / re dang reg dang / chos mi rtag pa dang / sdug sngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa
196a4('bum): dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya ba ra de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / dmig gi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
196a5('bum): gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug sngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / steng pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa me da pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi
196a6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba/ 
196a7('bum): dang / sdug stsal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
196a8('bum): gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug sngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / steng po dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par/ 
196b1('bum): 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi
196b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug sngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar de dmyin/ 
196b3('bum): ba'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug sprul ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / steng pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon po med pa da
196b4('bum): mngon par shes 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / lce'i
196b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg/ pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyi skyes kyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug sngal ba dang / bdag med pa
196b6('bum): dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnas/ 
196b7('bum): kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug sbal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces dang / dben zhes bya bar de dmigs
196b8('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug sngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
197a1('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dbyen zhes bya ba de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las kyi rnam pa dag mi smra/ mi rton pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
197a2('bum): sdig pa'i grogs par rig par bya'o// de ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya ste/ de lta' shes nas kyang yongs su spang bar bya'o// 
197a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u bdun pa'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di
197a4('bum): skad ces gsel te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' se/ mas dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba'i tshig 'di'i don gang lagasade skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' tshe da
197a5('bum): ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub dpe'i tshig ni tshig gi don med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub kyi nga ma skyes la/ sems can kyang ma skyes pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ 
197a6('bum): byang chub la yang tshig gi don med de/ sems can la yang tshig gi don med do// de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'dri lta ste/ dper na/ na mkha' la bya'i rjes med do// rab 'byor
197a7('bum): de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rmi lam la gnas med do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 
197a8('bum): sgyu ma la gnas med de/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med de/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper no// smyig rgyu la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med de/ 
197b1('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na chu zla dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / gzugs rnyan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du shes byang chub sems dpa'i
197b2('bum): tshig gi don med de/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas med de/ rab 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na
197b3('bum): de bzhin nyid la gnas med de/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yid pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid lag na
197b4('bum): med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi drin med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs la gnas med de/ tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
197b5('bum): byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhi na du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
197b6('bum): dnga'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'iskyes bu'i mig la gnas med de/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas med do// rab 'byor
197b7('bum): de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzug
197b8('bum): la gnas med do// sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi/ 
198a1('bum): don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas med do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par
198a2('bum): shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
198a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg
198a4('bum): pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg bla dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas med de/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes ra
198a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byer 'di la ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba
198a6('bum): la gran su med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'du sa twa reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
198a7('bum): rkyen kyis chetshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skye
198a8('bum): ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don mod do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dperan sgyu ma'i sgras bu'i/ ma rig pa la gnas med do// 'du byed dang / rnam par dzinasag
198b1('bum): dang / ming dang / gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sbed pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin
198b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes
198b3('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med med do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
198b4('bum): dang / bas ma gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshe/ ke ga gi don med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems
198b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod da pa'i tshig gi don med do/ 
198b6('bum): bam po / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i
198b7('bum): nga byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi den med de/ phyi steng pa nyid dang phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid kyi bar la
198b8('bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi den med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi
199a1('bum): slobasan mas dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med rje rnam
199b1('bum): samam dma'i tshig gdon med do/ rab 'byor 'di sa ste sa dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang/ 'du bye
199b2('bum): shes pa la gsas byed de/ ro byo ni us bya zhes pa med pa'i byi / rlu 'byur de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang so sbyin shes kyi rlo tu phyin pa
200a1('bum): bas/ ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / dri dang ro dang / reg dang / chos la gnas med do// de ci'i phyi zhe na/ 
200a2('bum): de med nga'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ 
200a3('bum): dber na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myig gi rnam par shes pa de med pa
200a4('bum): khyer te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ste mas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'i spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di
200a5('bum): ste ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / 
200a6('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas med do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa de med pa'i phyir to// rab 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sem
200a7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med de/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dpar na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
200a8('bum): sangs rgyas kyi mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas med do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
200b1('bum): kye ba rlol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chubs pas+yA pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di la ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegasu pa dag dacom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi na pa'i 'dus te sa/ 
200b2('bum): bdang / sna'i dus pa dang / dus pa dang / dus kyi dus ti ga tu dang / sod kyi 'dus ti gdul gnas med do// 'i nan dus rdzog pa me pa'i to// ra 'byor
200b3('bum): nga chub sems dpa' sems du dzin gyi gas ra kyi ros tu phyin pal spyod pa'i byang chub sa lus da tshig gi don med de/ rab 'byor 'das sre byed ni/ de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom po ya
200b4('bum): bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sreg gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyeni kyis tsho bul gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sreg sde 'dus kyi ga pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dmeng pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin
200b5('bum): du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gid med / rab 'brer 'di la ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
200b6('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bA sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / lus
200b7('bum): kye 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / yod kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gros tshor bra la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen tshor ba dri med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor
200b8('bum): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' cha sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rob 'byor 'di lta ste dpo' na/ de bzhin
201a1('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ma rig pa la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma rig pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa
201a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
201a3('bum): kyi 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / mying dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang skye ba dang / rga shi la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rga
201a4('bum): shi de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems da tha' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lci ste dben
201a5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa ngas rgyas kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de med po'i phyir te/ rabya
201a6('bum): 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcu tsa/ 
201a7('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan cig pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes ra
201a8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bya
201b1('bum): chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nang stong pa nyid de med pa'i phyir te
201b2('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag ba
201b3('bum): payang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dngos med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po med pa'i dngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de med pa'i phyir te// de rab 'byor de bzhin du/ byang
201b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phye na pa la spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
201b5('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum che bcu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnaMs dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnas
201b6('bum): dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting 'dzin rdzas
201b7('bum): dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'dzegs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la gnas med/ 
201b8('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems rba/ 
202a1('bum): chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings la 'dus byas kyi khams kyi gnas med do/ 'dus byas kyi khams la 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings kyi
202a2('bum): gnas med de/ rab 'byor nga de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skye ba med pa
202a3('bum): gnas med de/ 'gago pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par bye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmyigs pa med pa la gnas med
202a4('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// gsold pa bcom ldan 'das gang gis skye ba ma mchis
202a5('bum): pa la gnas ma mchis pa lags/ gang gis 'gag pa mam/ ches pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba ma mchis
202a6('bum): dang / 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / gang gis mi mags pa la gan sa ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsngal po/ rab 'byor gzugs skye ba med pa la gnas med de/ gzugs 'gag
202a7('bum): ba med pa dang / gzugs kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / gzugs 'byung ba med pa dang / gzugs mi dmigs pa la gnas med do// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 
202a8('bum): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa la gnas med do// rnam par shes pa 'gog pa med pa dang / rnam par shes pa kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par byang ba med pa dang / rnam pa
202b1('bum): shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / rnam par shes pa 'byung ba med pa dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa la gnas med do// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba skye ba med pa la gnas med do// 
202b2('bum): skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la gnas med de/ 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba
202b3('bum): myod pa dang / myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi ches rnams kyi bar dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
202b4('bum): por 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / ma tha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par
202b5('bum): shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa ba zhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
202b6('bum): ma 'dres pa rnams skye ba med pa la gnas med de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'gag pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 
202b7('bum): 'byung ba myed pa dang / mi dmigs pa la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpe'i tshe ga gi
202b8('bum): don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'di byed dang / rnam par shes pa shim bu rno bar dag ma la mtshan
203a1('bum): rnab ma'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di
203a2('bum): lta ste dper na/ skye mched dang / khyams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
203a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med de/ yang dag par spong ba dang / 
203a4('bum): rje 'phrul go rkang pa dang / dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub gakyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ra dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam dang / bsam rten rnams dang / tshad med
203a5('bum): pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting
203a6('bum): 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyo sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas ka chos ma 'dres pa lacwo brgyad
203a7('bum): shin tu rnam par drag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i cho ga den med de/ 
203a8('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bdag med pa'i phyir bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med de/ sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang gso ba dang / skyes bu dang gang zag dang / shed
203b1('bum): can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
203b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mngon par sher ba'i tshe/ mun pa'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
203b3('bum): byang sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bskal pa'i mye 'bar ba'i tshe/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thas cad
203b4('bum): kyi gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub snyoms dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 
203b5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la tshul khrims ngan pa'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po
203b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'khrul pa'i gnas medado/ 
203b7('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
203b8('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi shes rab skye la shes rab 'chal pa'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sas/ 
204a1('bum): dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol pa rnam par ma grol ba'i gnas med do// rab 'byor
204a2('bum): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dpe' na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
204a3('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa la rnam par ma grol ba'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
204a4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// re 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang zla bo'i do/ lo mun pa'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub seMs cha
204a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dpe' na/ gang za' dang skar ma dang / nor bu rin po che dang / klog gi
204a6('bum): 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshig gi don med do/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na
204a7('bum): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lnga/ 
204a8('bum): nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshungs chen dang / 'og myin gi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
204b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don mang ngo // rab 'byor de lta ste dper na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs/ 
204b2('bum): nga'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// de ci'i phyir na
204b3('bum): rab 'byor 'od lnga ste dper na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don gang yod pa de'i chos de dag zas cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ljo
204b4('bum): yang ma yin te/ gzugs med pa stad du med pa/ thogs pa med pa 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa sha stag ste/ ra rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams
204b5('bum): kyi med pa yang dag pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'asems dpa'i chen po chos thams cad rig par bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gang lcags/ bcom ldan 'das
204b6('bum): khyang chub sems dpa' sums dpa' chen pos ni ma mchis pa yang dag po nyid pa je ltar bslab par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nas thams car ji ltar rig par bgyi bcom ldan 'das kyi ste ba'i
204b7('bum): rjem ga'ab 'byor chos thams cad ces bya nga na dge pa dang / me dge pa dang / s+ya btsun pa dang / lung ma bstan pa dang / nga garten pa dang / na las 'das 'dang / zag pa nga/ sa pa dang/ zag pa med pa
204b8('bum): 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas dang / kha na ma tho ba dang / bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / thun myong dang / thun mong ma yin pa ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya ba ste/ thamal pa bcom ldan 'das
205a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos de dag thams cad kyi med pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes par bya ba yang chos thams cad de dag nyid do// gsol pa
205a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya ba ni phar shes pa dang / mar shes pa dang / dge sbyong du shes pa/ bram zer shes
205a3('bum): rig kyi nang na rgan pa la rim 'gror byed pa dang / sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po dang / nyam su blang ba dang // 
205a4('bum): ldan pa'i 'du shes dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i 'du shes dag ste/ 'di ltar rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang / 'du can gi 'du shes dang / rno bar rnags pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par rnam
205a5('bum): ba'i 'du shes drung / rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam por zos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang / rus pa 'du shes dang / rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten pa'i ngas
205a6('bum): bzhi dang / tshad mang pa bzhi dang / gzugs mang ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten po'i rje su dran pa bcu ste/ de dag gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa dang / chos rje su dran
205a7('bum): kha dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes dran pa dang / rtong pa rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rje su dran pa dang / lus kyi rna ba rje su dran pa dang / skye ba rje su dran pa dang
205a8('bum): 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dge ba bcu'i / 
205b1('bum): kyi lam dag ste/ 'di ltar rab 'byor srog bcod pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o// ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas ldog par yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / zhe chog pa dang / tshig kyal po dang / chags
205b2('bum): sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba dang / khro ba dang / mdud par 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / 'phra tog dang / ser sna dang / nga rgyal dang / log pa'i nga rgyal te/ rab 'byor de dag ni
205b3('bum): 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das lung du ma snyan pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus kyi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// ngag gi las ni lung du ma ston pa'o// ying
205b4('bum): kyekyi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni lung du ma bas+t+ra/ don pa'o// dbang po lnga ni lung ma bstan pa'o// skye mched drug ni lung du// ma bstan pa'o// gzugs med pa bzhir skyes pa ni lung ma bstan pa'o
205b5('bum): phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched ni lung ma bstan pa'o// rnam par sbyin pa thams cad ni lung ma bstan pa'o// rab 'byor de dag ni lung ma bstan pa'o chos su ma shes pa'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig
205b6('bum): rten pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos shes bya ba ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi le dang / 
205b7('bum): bsam tan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mang rtogs par sem ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa/ de ma yin pa/ 
205b8('bum): 'jig rten pa'i chos gang ji snyed pa de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos shes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten las
206a1('bum): 'das pa'i chos shes bya ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan
206a2('bum): lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i dbang po dang / yengasu shes par rtog pa'i dbang po dang / rtag pa dang bas/ 
206a3('bum): spyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med par spyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rig pa dang rnam par grol ba dang / dran pa dang shes bzhin dang / tshul bzhin yid la bya ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad de rgyad gang
