206a4('bum): zhe na/ gzugs dang ldan pas gzugs mthong ba ni rnam par thar pa dang pa'o// nang gzugs med pas phyi 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol kyi gzugs mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o// gzugs kyi 'du shes
206a5('bum): sdug par mes par gyur pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o// gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub nyebar gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams la mi
206a6('bum): byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas sgo mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o// de rnam par thams cad du man mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las
206a7('bum): yang dag par 'das te/ rnam shes mtha' yaso zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du ni shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par/ 
206a8('bum): 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched las nye bar sgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'ongs te/ 'du shes med
206b1('bum): du shes med min skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas pa 'don rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las srung drag par 'angs te/ 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gon du
206b2('bum): nye bar sgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o// rnam par thar de dag dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/ chu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'dod pas dben pa sdig rto mi dge ba'i chos
206b3('bum): kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas/ spyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben po las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang 'de ba can bsam nyan po la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par sbyang pa nye
206b4('bum): zhi nas nang yongasu dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam pa ra ra rtog pa med pa dang / rnam par spyod pa myed pa'i/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam rten gnyis pa la nye
206b5('bum): bar sgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas rje dran pa dang ldan zhing / shes bzhin btang snyem su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong kha dang / 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan
206b6('bum): ba bde ba la rnam par stod pa/ btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam rten gsum la nye bar sgrubs te gnas// de bde nga yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spang shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi 'ad
206b7('bum): snganas nub pas bad pa yang med/ sdug bsngal ba yang med pas patang rnams dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bas mdzan gni 'i nya bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shis las yang dag par
206b8('bum): 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yase zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnaso// de rna ma thams cad
207a1('bum): ga dun ma mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam shes mtha' yas zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched lasra/ 
207a2('bum): yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod de zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas te/ de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes mid min skye mend
207a3('bum): las nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar sgrubs te gnas/ de ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
207a4('bum): 'jug pa dgu po de dag dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi brar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / 
207a5('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni 'jigs las 'das pa'i chos shes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos gang
207a6('bum): lpags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos shes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / bsam rtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i spyas
207a7('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos shes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das zag pa dang ma mchis pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
207a8('bum): zag pa med pa'i chos ni/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i la yan lag rnyeng pa pa
207b1('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thos cad dang
207b2('bum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mo 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dag sde
207b3('bum): de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos shes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bgyi ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dus kyi chos shes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs/ 
207b4('bum): med pa'i lhums dang / gzhan yang de ma yin pa 'dus byas su rtogs pa'i chos rnams/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang nga sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'das pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni 'dus byas
207b5('bum): kyi chos shes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas kyi tshe sa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dus ma byas kyi chos shes bya ba ni gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med
207b6('bum): pa de la gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa ste/ 'dod chags zad pa dang / zhe sdang zad pa dang / rta mug zad pa dang / de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid/ chos nyid chos kyi dbyings nyid chos
207b7('bum): kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyen med pa nyid bsam gis mi khyab pa'i dbyings/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'dus ma byas pa'i chos shes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das thun mong gi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan
207b8('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor thun mong gi chos shes bya ba ni bsam rten bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga ste/ de dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnaMs dang / 
208a1('bum): zun mong gi chos zhes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ thun meng ma lags pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor thun mong ma yin pa'i chos shes bya ba ni khyangad chub kyi phyogs
208a2('bum): kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos shes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ 
208a3('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la rtog pa med pas chags par mi bya'o// chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i tshul gis rtog pa med cing // rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir/ chos thoms khong du chud bar bya/ 
208a4('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das gang 'od byang chub sems dpa' sems da'o/ pa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' seMs
208a5('bum): dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsngal pa/ rab 'byor/ sems can gri phung po chen po nges pa'i phul byed par gyur pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po zhes bya bsol
208a6('bum): byabacom ldan 'das sems can gi phung po chen po nges pa de lta bu'i phul byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgyid par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems can gi phung po chen po nges pa ni gang lags/ bco ldan 'das kyis bag
208a7('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gi phung po chen po nges pa zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi sa dang / rgyang pa'i sa dang / rgyud du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas da
208a8('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sres dpa' dang / phyir mo ldog pa'o sa la gnas pa'i byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bar dag ste/ rab 'byor de ni sems can gi phung po chen po nges pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa'/ 
208b1('bum): mas pa chen po sa du byed par / ngadrang chub sa sa pa mas chen pos da bu'i sems skyed de/ sems can gsung thongs pa'i yus zhes bya'o/ 'argyalal bcom ldan 'a ma
208b2('bum): sems skyed pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'angs kyis b+haka'i stsal mni rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems skyed de/ 'khor ba dpag tu med pa'i seMs can thams cad kyi dong du bdag gis kau
208b3('bum): bgro bar bya'o// bdag gi bdog pa thams cad yongasu btang bar bya'o// bdag gis seMs can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o// bdag gis ses can thams cad theg pa dasum gis yongasu mya ngan las bzla bar byad+d+ho// 
208b4('bum): da ltar sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang / sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las bzlas pa med pas/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa bdag gis shes par bya'o// bdag gi sgyu ma 'ongs
208b5('bum): pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad skye bar bya'o// bdag gis chos rtogs pa thams cad kyi rjesu 'gro ba phu na sum tshogs pa la sleb par bya'o// bdag gi chos kyi tshul cig
208b6('bum): du sgrub pa khong du chud par byo'o// bdag gis chos dpag tu med pa thams cad yongasu sgrub pa la slob par bya'o/ snyam su sems skyed de/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po sems skyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de des
208b7('bum): gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po sems can gi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gos byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems skyed par byas ste// 
208b8('bum): sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can ji snyed cig sdug sngal gi tsher bya nyams su mong bar 'gyur ba'i/ sdug bsngal gi tshor ba de dag thams cad sems can de dag gi don du dag
209a1('bum): gis nyams su myong bar bya'o// snam du sems skyed do// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang du 'di ltar sems skyed par bya ste/ bdag gis sems can re re'i don du yang skal pa bye ba khrad
209a2('bum): khrig brgya stong mang por sems can gang phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu mya ngan las ma 'das pa'i bar du seMs can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag kyang bdag gis nyam su myong bar bya'o// zhes de
209a3('bum): lta bus sems can thams cad kyi den du/ sems can thams cad phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las ma bzlas kyi bar du/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad kyang nyam su
209a4('bum): myong bar bya'o// rdod bdag gi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed do// bskal pa ci dbye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas byang chub kyi tshogs mang po bstsags te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa
209a5('bum): 'tshang brgya'o// snyam du sems skyed par bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sos skyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas shing byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can
209a6('bum): gi phung po chen po nges po'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshuyi gos byed// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen pos// sems can thams cad gi phul du gyur pa de lta bu'i sems rlabs po che bskyed par bya'o// de la/ 
209a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che ni/ sems dang po skyed phyin cad 'dod chags gi seMs mi skyed/ zhe sdang gi sems ma snyed/ rta mug gi seMs mi skyed/ rtse ba'i sems mi skod/ nyan thos kyi sems dang / 
209a8('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyang mi skyed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i seMs rlabs po che'o// seMs can thos cad kyi phul byed kyang / sems rlabs po che des rlom semasu mi bye'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
209a9('bum): rgyun mi 'chang bar rlabs po che'i seMs gang gis
209b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen pos mi skul ba'i sems dang ldan par bya ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi skul ba'i/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed cing / de rlom so su mi byed pa rtse
209b2('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi skul ba'o// sems des sems can thams cad kyi phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis 'gyuraro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can
209b3('bum): thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i sems skyed par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde ba'i sems ni sems can thams cad slob cing / sems can thams cad yong su mi rtong la des rlom semasu 'gyur ba med
209b4('bum): ba ste/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ing phan pa dang bde ba'i sos te/ de lce gnas shing sems can gi phung po che na po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis byed do/ rab 'byor gzhan yang
209b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag tu rgyun mi 'chang bar chod/ 'dod par bya'o// chos la dgo' bar bya'o// chos mos par bya'o// chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o// de la chos gang zhe na 'di ni chos shes
209b6('bum): bya'o// de la chos 'dod pa gang zhe na/ gang chos de la 'dod cing mos pa ste/ 'di ni chos 'dod po zhes bya'o// de la chos la dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang chos de la dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba ste/ 'di ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o// de la chos la
209b7('bum): mos pa gang zhe na/ gang chos de la yon tan du lta ba ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa zhes bya'o// de la ches la mos pa'i rnal 'byor gang zhe na/ chos de nyid la bsgom zhing mang du byed pa ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la rtson po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor
209b8('bum): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ sems can gi phung po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi/ 
210a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gi phung po chen po nges pa'i
210a2('bum): bur du 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la gnas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / byas rten rna/ 
210a3('bum): dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / 
210a4('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams da / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi da nga/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnaMs dang / byams pa chen po dang / 
210a5('bum): snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas stod sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub ses/ 
210a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed pas/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nam mkha' ltar chags pa med par/ rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ge bar gnas te/ 
210a7('bum): sems can go phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor chos de dag la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ ses
210a8('bum): can gi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du byed pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gi/ 
210b1('bum): slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di la bdag kyang spobs pa skyed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la spobs pa skyed cig/ sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bco ldan
210b2('bum): 'das bdag tu lta ba dang / sems can du lta ba dang / srog du lta ba dang / gang zag du lta ba dang / gso bar lta ba dang / skyes bu dang shed can dang // shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba por
210b3('bum): lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / yod par lta ba dang / med par lta ba dang / phung por lta ba dang / khams su lta ba dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar lta ba dang / pha rol tu phyin par lta
210b4('bum): ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs su lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta ba dang / sems can rnams yongasu smin par lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par lta ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba dang / 
210b5('bum): sangs rgyas su lta ba dang / chos su lta ba dang / dge 'dun du lta ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar lta ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das paralta ba rab tu spong ba'i sems can rnaMs la chos ston par bgyid
210b6('bum): kyang / mi rimigs pa'i tshul gis bgyid pa ste/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// 
210b7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ci'i phyir ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugasu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mya ngan las
210b8('bum): 'das pa'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / thabs mi khas pas/ gzugs su dmigs shing / 
211a1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gis lbu ba bskyed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gis lta bskyed do// skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung
211a2('bum): khar dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do// pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang rnams dang / 
211a3('bum): dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / chu byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i kham ldan zag rnams dang / bsam rten rnaMs dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs/ 
211a4('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i/ nga tshul gis lta ba bskyed do// rnam par thar pa dang / mthar kyis gan rgyas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang
211a5('bum): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi swA dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs thadang / sre sa yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje
211a6('bum): chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres par dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gis lta ba bskyed do// yongs su mya ngan las 'das par dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gis lta ba skyed de/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de'i/ 
211a7('bum): phyir byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugasu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/ 
211a8('bum): des byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas lta ba'i rnam pa de dag spang ba'i phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston to// de nas dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bco ldan
211b1('bum): das la 'di skad ces gso to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi bar de la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka bstsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod
211b2('bum): kyis spobs pa skyed cig/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / thun mong ma lags pa de lta bu'i yang chogs
211b3('bum): pa ma mchis paso// de'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de ni zag pa ma mchis khong du chud pa ma mchis pa ste/ de ltar thas
211b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum gi khong su chud pa mchis pa'i sems te yang rang bzhin stong po nyid kyi slad du chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' seMs
211b5('bum): chen po'i grangs su mching 'o// de nas tshe dang ldan sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa 'byor bya/ byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnye ba nyan thos pa
211b6('bum): rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i sems grang yin rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad/ chos gang yang
211b7('bum): drag par rjes su mi mthong / 'gag pa dang / 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs bu dang / rnam par byung bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang
211b8('bum): skye ba med cing / 'gag pa med dang / 'phel ba med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing / rnam par byang ba med pa de la nyan thos kyi seMs med do// rang sangs rgyas kyi seMs
212a1('bum): med do// byang chub kyi sems dpa'i seMs med do// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems med do// tshe dang ldan pa shwa ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam
212a2('bum): rang mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i semaso// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa med pa/ khong du chud pa
212a3('bum): med pa/ de lta bu'i sems la chags pa med do// zhes smras pa ni de lta yin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de bas gzugs kyang chags pa med do// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do
212a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la chags pa med do// smras pa ni nga dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang chags pa med/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi zer la tshogs par 'gyur ba me dang / 
212a5('bum): na pa dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang chags pa zed do// sku mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel ban 'acu mye ba la yang chags po med do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rjes kyi
212a6('bum): la yang chags pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar la yang chags pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yang chags pa med do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du
212a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar sems de yang zag pa med cing khong su chud pa med do// zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor des yang ma zad te/ byis pa so so'i sku 'o rjes kyi seMs kyang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid
212a8('bum): kyi phyir zag pa med cing khong su chud pa med do/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sos dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag po med cing khongasu chud pa med/ rab 'byor gyi/ 
212b1('bum): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bris pa so so'i skyebo rnams sems dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongasu chud pa med do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi
212b2('bum): phyir zag pa mod cing khongs su chud pa med do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de lta yin na/ gzugs
212b3('bum): kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongasu chud pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongasu chud pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos
212b4('bum): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang bzhin gyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa me dade cing khongasu chud pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar na yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med pa cing khongasu chud pa med/ 
212b5('bum): rab 'byer kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ji skad smras pa de ni bzhin te/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir te/ zag pa me dacing khong su chud pa med do/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / 
212b6('bum): rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khengasu chud pa medo/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnaMs kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongasu chud pa mdo/ rna ba thas cad mkhyen pa
212b7('bum): nyid kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongasu chud pa med do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du seMs med pa'i phyir/ seMs de la yang chags pa medado// zhesang smras pa ni 'di
212b8('bum): lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de yang ma zad/ gzugs med pa yang gzugs la chags pa med/ tshor ba med pa dang / 'du shes med pa dang / 'du byed pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med de/ byang chub
213a1('bum): sa kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du med pa yang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar la gnas pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du med pa yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags
213a2('bum): ba med/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags pa med do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzugs med pa yang gzugs la chags pa med do// tshor ba med par
213a3('bum): 'du shes med pa dang / 'du byed mod pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med don byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du med pa yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnas la chags pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi
213a4('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du med pa yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma chang 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa med do// tshe dang
213a5('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ byang chub kyi sem/ sa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thas cad kyang
213a6('bum): thun mong ma yin pa'i sems nges kyang / chos thams cad la dmigs pa'i tshul gis rlom sem su 'gyur ba med do// mngon par chags par med pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan
213a7('bum): byams ma'i bu gang po/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po// zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa
213a8('bum): gang po khyod kyis spobs pa snyed cig/ gang pos bsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni go cha chen po bgos pa'i seMs can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can lags/ de ni theg pa
213b1('bum): chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i sems can lags pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa byams ma gang po'i bus 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang
213b2('bum): ldan pa gang po'i bu ji tsam gyis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o// gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can nyung zad
213b3('bum): nyi tshe zhig gi don du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongasu rtod pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su rtong ngo // sems can nyung zad nyi tshe phyir/ tshul khris
213b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / tshul khrims srung ba ma yin gyisems can thams can gyi don du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ spyod cing / tshul khrims srung ngo // sems can nyung zad nyi tse'i phyir/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu
213b5('bum): phyin pa la gnas shing / bzod pa sgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can tha mas cad kyi don du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / bzod pa sgo mo/ sems can nyung zad nyi ci'i phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gan shing / 
213b6('bum): brtson 'grus tsam pa ma yin te/ sems can thams cad kyi don du/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems can nyung bad nyi ci'i phyir/ bsam rgan gi pa rab tu phyin pa la gnas shed / bas ma tan skyong
213b7('bum): ma yin gi sems can thams cad kyi don du/ bsam rten gi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / bsam rgan skom mo/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / shos rab sgom pa ma yin gi sems can thams cad kyi don du shes rab kyi/ 
213b8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab snom mo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can 'di skad cig phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongasu mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// sems can 'di sted
214a1('bum): cig ni/ yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar mi bya'o// zhe 'am sems can 'di snyed cig ni/ byang chub tu dgod par bya'o// sems can 'di skad cig ni byang chub la dgod par mi bya'o// zhes sems yongs su dpag pas go cha mi gon gi/ 
214a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi don du go cha chen po gyon no// de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang sbyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ 
214a3('bum): bdag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam rtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thoms cad/ 
214a4('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang stong pa nyid tha mdams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bas mi tan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnaMs dang / gzugs
214a5('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang rnams par thar pa rgyang dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'ju/ 
214a6('bum): pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag
214a7('bum): byar rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas par bya'o// sems can kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o// zhes sems skyed de tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems
214a8('bum): rapa' ses dpa' chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// 6 sa nga / shes rab bam po// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
214b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa gang yongs su rtong pa de dag nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas yongasu rtong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang se/ 
214b2('bum): na thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su rtong pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu/ 
214b3('bum): phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongasu rtong zhing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi so'i don du yongasu
214b4('bum): mi bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su rtong zhing / tshul khrim rangs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chu/ 
214b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i cu'i yid la bya bas/ chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rkyen gyi kyi 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
214b6('bum): pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongasu rtod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su rtong pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
214b7('bum): ba'i yod la bya bas/ brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'ad ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su rtong pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// che / 
214b8('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su rtong pa'i tshe/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ seMs rtse gcig tu byed cing de la dmigs pa
217a1('bum): rtsig gam rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams kyi ge me 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su rtong pa'i bsarten
217a2('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yong su rtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
217a3('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad smra mar byas pa she sob kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnas te/ sbyin pa de yang mi dmigs/ rnyong ba yong mi rimigs/ lon pa yang mi dmigs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpo' sem pa/ 
217a4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongasu rnyeng pa'i she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thas cad mkhyen
217a5('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byi bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa de dag la mtshan mar mi byed cing / mi rimigs pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i go cha chen po
217a6('bum): bgos pa ma shes par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 
217a7('bum): sbyin pa gang ngas su rkyong ba de dag kyang sas can thams cad dang byung du byos byeng/ blan med pa yang dag pur rdzogs pa'i byang chu tu me migs pa'i tshul gis sangs su bsngo ba 'din/ byang bachub sems dpa' ses dob chen
217a8('bum): bachul khrims kyi pa ram tu phyin pa la skyed pas/ sbyin pa'i ba ro tu byin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa te'i bu gzhan yong byang chub sems dpa' sos dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i med pa bya
217b1('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang kya sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang mes pa mi skyed na/ so so'i skye ba'i sa la lha smos pa 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pa
217b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul
217b3('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad cing / chos de dag la bzod pa dang mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan
217b4('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims da kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa
217b5('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub seMs dpa' sems dkyi' chen po/ 
217b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / gnas pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi go mi 'byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du/ 
217b7('bum): byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bse rten gri pha rol du phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha raH
217b8('bum): ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid dang ljon pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
219a1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye sa par gnas shing / tshul khrims des rlom sems su mi byed de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ tshul khrims de yang mi dmigs shing / drege pa'i rtsa ba de yang sems cad
219a2('bum): thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
219a3('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha ral tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'dzin te/ de'i phyir ge rgya chen po thegs zhes bya'o// 
219a4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sa ngas rgyas dang ldan pa yid la bya ba ma yin gi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
219a5('bum): ba nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongasu rtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang mthun mong du byas shing / bla na/ med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i don
219a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
219a7('bum): spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pas yid la byi bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la b+ha bas/ tshul khrims srung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas
219a8('bum): te bu med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa da ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpan
219b1('bum): sa nga chen po po pa da gnas ma du bye A ga pa khyod nga yo la sa na dod bya chu me / 
219b2('bum): byin pa'i laskyed pa rjod pa'i pha rol tu sbyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha te'i bu kun na yang byang chu senas dpa'i sems dpang rten nyon tshu dang / rangs sa rgyas pa rnam po ma pa yid sa byub sbyin / ma
219b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyes par mi byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i byang rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha ral tu
219b4('bum): phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shwa ra de ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam bya thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
219b5('bum): 'byas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed cing / sems rtse gcig tu byed pa/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i 'a/ rdol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i// bsam rton ge pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
219b6('bum): dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin go// rnam pa sems cad mkhyen pa nyid ldan pa'i yid la byas/ 
219b7('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad smra mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bzod pa des rloms su mi byed cing / bzod pa mi dmigs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sas dpa' chen po/ bzod pa'i
219b8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po
220a1('bum): thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go ma chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
220a2('bum): la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su tshong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thos ca
220a3('bum): dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
220a4('bum): pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa te'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pas yid la bya bas
220a5('bum): ma yin gi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims srung ba zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
220a6('bum): byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
220a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa yid la bya bas ma yin gi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 
220a8('bum): chochos de dag la de ltar bzod pa dang / mas pa dang / rten cing 'bros pa 'di ni byang chub semos dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// dang ldan pa shar
220b1('bum): bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pas yod la bya ba ma yin ge/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu/ 
220b2('bum): byin pa la spyod cing / sems can thams cad kyi don du brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed cing / brtun mi ngas pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i brtson 'bru/ 
220b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pas yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
220b4('bum): ba'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam rtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i chu
220b5('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la ba bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad ma/ khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad sgyu ma
220b6('bum): byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ brtson 'grus des rlom semasu mi byed cong / brtson 'grus de yang mi dmigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag pa
220b7('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
220b8('bum): tu sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod cing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po dgas shes
221a1('bum): ga kyi tshe bdun pa sha da 'i du gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bas ma nyan khri 'os tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang nang sangs rgyus dang ldan pa yid la bya bas ma yin na/ 
221a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su rtong zhing dge pa'i rtsa ba ro yang sems can thams cad dang ldan thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
221a3('bum): yong su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam rtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub ses dpa' ses pa
221a4('bum): chen po bsam rgan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing da nyan thos dang / 'du sangs rgyas dang ldan pa yid la bye bsem yin gyi/ rnam pasbyin thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pas yid la byas/ tshul khrims srung zhing
221a5('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla nani med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bas mye rkan gi pha ral tu
221a6('bum): byin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sem skye dpa' chen po bsam rtan gi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rangasas
221a7('bum): seM rgyas pan gyi/ rnamapa sus 'a khyen nyid du dzin pa ngas rgyas thaMng ga'is ts+tshi te/ dge pa ba de yang mams rnaM mas 'du ldan mang du
221a8('bum): drimeng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngod 'dzin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po bas maca ge pa ral tu phyin pas spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bu ni
221b1('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam rtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan bI la spyod pa'i pha rol yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
221b2('bum): napa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam rtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus kyi pa nyams par mi byed cing / dge pa'i rtsa la nga yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa
221b3('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bas mertan gi bu rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa
221b4('bum): te'i bu gzhin yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam rten gi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pasams cad mkhyen pa nyid dong ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtsa gcig tu byed de/ de la dmigasas
221b5('bum): gcig pa'i phyir nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang snying ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rnams kyi go cha'i pyod cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sa nas can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
221b6('bum): ba'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po bsam rtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bas rten gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
221b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bas rtan gri pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad spya tshwar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas ste/ bas ma tan ge pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom semasu byed cing / bos rten
221b8('bum): des kyang med migs te/ dge pa'i rtsa ba yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / phrin thod pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngob 'din/ byang chub ses dpa' sos dpa' chen
222a1('bum): bas martan gi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam rtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yo/ 
222a2('bum): 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid
222a3('bum): la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa yongs su rtong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang / sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byes shing / 
222a4('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol rnal tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
222a5('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gi/ rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i/ 
222a6('bum): yid la bya bas tshul khrims srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po rje
222a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ning / nyan thos dang / rang sangs
222a8('bum): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa la/ mos shing brten te dag pa'i ba de yang / sos can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing // 
222b1('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa tshe dang ldan
222b2('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
222b3('bum): pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang / sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
222b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
222b5('bum): cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ ma yin gi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la/ bya bas/ sems rtse gcig tu byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sas can thams cad dang / 
222b6('bum): thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ bsam rtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
222b7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang
222b8('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems su mi byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang ses can thams cad dang thun mong du byas she
223a1('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe nga
223a2('bum): ldan pa sha ra tI'i bu nam yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag dang / sos can dang / 'dre dag dang byang chub la mtshan ma
223a3('bum): mi byed/ mi dmigs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi go cha chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpas
223a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa re re la gnas shing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 
223a5('bum): bsam rten dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms para'ajug pa rnams la yang mnyam por bzhog/ bsam rtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnaMs kyi ro
223a6('bum): yang myong bar mi byed de/ bsam rten dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs rdzi med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag gis kyang / mi 'phrogs pa te/ bas rten dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
223a7('bum): pa'i dbang gis kyang ma skye'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen shes rgyam chub kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs mkhas pa dang 'grog pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
223a8('bum): gzhan srung byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bras ma tan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyam pa b+h+yo bar 'jug pa dag la bden par mthong ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon
223b1('bum): med pa mthong byas mnyam par gzhog ste/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye'o// yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du yang mi byed de/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon to// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
223b2('bum): bu 'di ni byangab chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rdza shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o// bas mkhas pa'i nga chu chen po ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpan
223b3('bum): chen po go mchen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rje dri shwa de ltar go cha chen po bgos pa la/ shar phyogs dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 
223b4('bum): byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs re rtse zhing / 'jig rten gi khams grang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa
223b5('bum): ched du brjod cing / mying yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten go kha mas che ge mo zhig na n+do byang chub sems draba'i sems dpa' che chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig/ seMs can yongasu smin
223b6('bum): bar bye'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed de/ rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o// zhes smra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyings rjes su sgrog go/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na byang chub ses dpa' ses so
223b7('bum): chen po la yang dag par zhugs zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gang yin/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
223b8('bum): drug la spyod de/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dbyen pa rtog pa dang bcas skyed pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba tsan pas rten dang / 
224a1('bum): la nye bar sgrub te gnas so// de bzhin du bsam rtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de byams pa dang / ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa
224a2('bum): tshad med pa/ gzugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ldang pa med pa// yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin du bsnyems pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas tshugs pa'i/ phyogs bcu brgyas pa
224a3('bum): bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying sde dang ldan pa dang // dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyems dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi mnyes pa tshad med pa gzugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ 
224a4('bum): stod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rteni chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs gcu brgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rje bar spyod// 
224a5('bum): de tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la ni nam / mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang mtshan mas rnam par 'jog cing / rnapar ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu/ 
224a6('bum): bsngo pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam
224a7('bum): mig sa ram du byon pa dang/ shes rang gyi pa rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par nugs zhes bya'o// che dang ldan pa
224a8('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shan tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gzugs med pa/ gnod pa meng gsang ba mong ga song su rdzogs pa/ 
224b1('bum): shin tu bsnyems pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mes pas byas shing rnam par spyod do// snying rje dang ldan pa dang // dga' ba dang ldan pa da
224b2('bum): tang snyems dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa gzugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa
224b3('bum): dam mapa'i mtha' gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod de/ da 'did pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas/ spyad pa dang bcas/ dben pa ldan
224b4('bum): skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde btsun pasam btan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs // te gnas so// de bzhin du bsam rtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// nam mkha' mtha' yas skyes
224b5('bum): dodzin rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mchod dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med med skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gan so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i
224b6('bum): 'dzin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas/ nyan mongs pa rab tu spong ba'i phyir/ bsam rtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs
224b7('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la brjod cing 'ching ba dang / ston cing 'grel la rnam par 'i'abyed cing / gsal bar byed de/ de dag gi ro myang yang reg gi skyon dang / 'byung ba yang tshul bzhin du ston pa 'di ni byang chub seMs/ 
224b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas de dag gis bas rten dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs
225a1('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang ba yang 'di lta ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems sam/ sems bskyed pa gzhan gi ge mi 'byed pa 'di ni
225a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma nyams pa'o// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la bya bas
225a3('bum): bsam rten dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam ste/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to// snya mo du sos
225a4('bum): shing yid la bya ba de dag la bzed pa dang / mos pa dang rten pa dang / seMs khong du chud par byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub ses dpa' sras dpal
225a5('bum): chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bse/ rten dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang
225a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir/ brtson 'grus nyams pa mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam
225a7('bum): ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam rten dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyems par 'jug pa rnams la mnyam par gzhag cing / rnam par ldang yang nyan thos kyi sa 'o/ rang sangs rgyas kyi/ 
225a8('bum): sar mi ltung ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam rtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bye ba/ khabs rten dong ba ma/ 
225b1('bum): yan lag dang / bas ma rgan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa'i yan lag dang / bsam rtan gi yan lag mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / steng pa'i rnam pa
225b2('bum): mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang / bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmyigs shing / de dag gis rlom sems su byed pa 'di ni/ byang
225b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o// 
225b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / dachen po'i zag pa chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun sgom dang / rna ba thams cad
225b5('bum): du 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam rtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugasamed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyi sa gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / 
225b6('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
225b7('bum): bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnas bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub ses dpa' seMs
225b8('bum): dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su bskyabs bya'o// zhes de la gzhol bar bya'o// snying rje'i tinge 'dzin la mnye bar gzhog cing / sems can rjes la snying rje pa
226a1('bum): DAka snang brtse ba'i nyams su byed do// dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / bdag nyid kyis sems can thams cad grol bar bya'o// zhes sems can thams cad la sems so// btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par
226a2('bum): gzhog cing / sems can thams cad kyi zag pa zad par bya ba la rab tu gzhol bar byed de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
226a3('bum): chen po bsam rtan dang / tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnas kyi rnam pa dang tshul dang / mtshan ma la mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang yang / rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sde bra ma
226a4('bum): rtogs par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi sngo ba 'di ni// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu ma nyams pa'o// nam byang
226a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam rten dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres pa/ rnam par spyod cing sa gnyis pa nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rlung sangs rgyas kyi
226a6('bum): sar 'dod pa mi skyed kyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos shing / dga' ba'i ni byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po/ tshad med pa rnams la skye da pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub seMs dpa' gro man pa'
226a7('bum): chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ me dge ba'i chos rjes rab tu yod pa dang // dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i don du/ brtson 'grus mi rnyed pas rnam par snyeng pa da ni/ byang chus seMs
226a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la skyed pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po// bas rten dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag khyi
226b1('bum): gzhog cing bsam rten dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye zhing / de dag gi ro myong bar byed pa yang med la de dag gis 'grogs par yang mi 'gyur ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'o tshun
226b2('bum): tshad med pa rnams la skyed pa'i bsam rten gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// na mo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam rten drong / tshad med dang / gzugs med
226b3('bum): pa'i snyems par 'jug pa de dag la mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam por ldang ba de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan
226b4('bum): ma med pa'i rna ba dang / smin pa med pa'i rnam par bya tu rtog kyang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par yang 'jug pa mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ 
226b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dam chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po ni/ rlung
226b6('bum): stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gis ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gis ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha rA dwa
226b7('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i thig pa chen po'i// tshe dang ljon pa sher dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad la sems rnam par me 'khrug cing / mnyebar gzhog par
226b8('bum): shes pa bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ rtag ces bya bar
227a1('bum): rgyag shes pa mi 'jug/ mi rtag ces bya ba dang / me pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag dang bdag med pa dang / sdug pa dang / me sdug ces bya bar shes par mi 'jug pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni de me
227a2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'das pa'i dus shes pa
227a3('bum): 'jug pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus su shes pa 'jug pa dang / de ltar byung ba'i dus su shes pa 'jug par byed de/ dus gsum du shes pa 'jug pa med pa 'di ni sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi dmigs pa'i
227a4('bum): tshul gis theg pa chen po'o/ tshe dang ldan pa shi ra dwa ti'i bu gzhon yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'dod pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khasu shes/ 
227a5('bum): ba 'jug par mi byed/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i kho sa mi shes pa yang med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang // de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa'i seMs dpa' chen po
227a6('bum): theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'i 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la yang shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ zag pa dang
227a7('bum): bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas pa'i chos la yang shes pa 'jug par mi byed pa 'di ni/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mi shes pa yang med/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag
227a8('bum): pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus mi byas kyi chos rnams kyang mi shes pa yang med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shar da ti'i bu 'di yang demi dmigs pa'i tshul gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen pa'o// 
227b1('bum): smras pa tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gnas zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab/ 
227b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des sbyin pa yang mi dmigasate/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs / len pa yang / 
227b3('bum): mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba dag kyang mi dmigs/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par gnas shes pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
227b4('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bas dam rtan gi pha rol tu pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyen pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gcu
227b5('bum): kyang / des dge ba'i chos de dag kyang mi dmigs/ 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos dang / kyang mi dmigs shing / 
227b6('bum): shes rab kyang mi dmigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la byed pa de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma dmigs pa'i tshul
227b7('bum): zhes/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shar da ti'i bu gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma 'dres pas smi
227b8('bum): ba'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma'i 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par sdom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul phyi stong pa nyid sbom mo
228a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bye ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ba
228a2('bum): ma 'dres pas/ sdom pa rnam par sgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul khyis/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sdom mo// tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa de'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thus cad
228a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'i don du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams sgom mo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsgom pa
228a4('bum): rnam par sdom pa'i dzin du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis/ 'phags pa'i bkyi ma den pa rnams dang / bsamu rgan rjes dang / tshod med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thor pa brgyad dang
228a5('bum): mthar kyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid da mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom mo// rje bathams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma 'ongs pas sde
228a6('bum): parnam par skam pa'i don du/ demi migs pa'i tshugs mdad par shes pa rnams dang / ting de nam da gle lungs kyi s+hongs bras mo/ rnam pa ma byas cad bakhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i meng la byangs/ sgom pa rnaMs pa ma
228a7('bum): ba'i ngan du de mer migs pa'i tshul gis/ de bzhin gan sogs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sa mi yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sbom mo tsho dang ldan pa shar dwa d+hin
228a8('bum): bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dmigasu med ba'i
228b1('bum): phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni/ snyang tsam du zad de zhes bya bar rab tu shes slo'i gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir gzugs shes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du rjod / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed / 
228b2('bum): rnam par shes par dmig su med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar 'dro ni ming tsam du zad do// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya
228b3('bum): 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni/ ming tsam du zad de/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin
228b4('bum): ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam rten gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyi nga ru/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni/ ming tsam du zad
228b5('bum): nang stong pa nyid dmig su med pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid ces byaba'adi ni ming tsam du zang // phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'imi phyir/ phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mong tsam du zang // phyi nang stong
228b6('bum): nyid dmigs su mid pa'i phyir/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong po nyid kyi bar du dmig su med pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming ma ru/ 
228b7('bum): zad do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dmig su med pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bas rten rnams dang / tshad med pa rjes dang / gzugs me/ 
228b8('bum): byabya'i rnams par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnaMs dang / slong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnaMs dang / ting po na
229a1('bum): rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mri 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dmig su med pa'i phyir
229a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// de mi dmigs pa med pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad de/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan mi nad pa de bzhin nyid dang / 
229a3('bum): chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du/ dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// byang chub dmig su med pa'i
229a4('bum): phyir/ byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// sangs rgyas dmigs sa su med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas shes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad/ zhes bya bar yang dag par shes te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub
229a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dang pa' sems dpa' chen po/ sems dang po skyed nas snying po byang chub la 'gug ga
229a6('bum): du mngon par shes pa thams yongs su rdzogs par byas shing / sems can yongs su sbyin par byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang / rim 'gro bya ba'i tshul gang la gang 'os pa de dag gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ang/ 
229a7('bum): la rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / sti bstang du bya ba dang / mchod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gre'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sem/ 
229a8('bum): theg pa 'di nyid kyi chos nyan to// de byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa de la gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed/ de la sangs
229b1('bum): rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung / sems can gi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung / gnyis su med pa'i sa la gnas shing / lus ji lta bus sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'i mthu yod pa de lta/ 
229b2('bum): dus med du bsams shing yengs su 'dzin to// de nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par ma gyur kyi bar du theg pa de dang nam du yang mi 'bral te/ des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes theb nas kyang / nyan / 
229b3('bum): dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / bcas pa'i 'jig rten gis bskor bar/ 
229b4('bum): mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro// de lda na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag
229b5('bum): na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub se/ sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di
229b6('bum): zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do// zhes grags pa brjod cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// lho dang nub dang / byang dang / 
229b7('bum): byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og bya dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan
229b8('bum): brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gi khams che ge mo zhig du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rna ba
230a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do// zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// de ltar na tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub seMs dpa'
230a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das go rgya chen po bgos so// go che chen po banas
230a3('bum): zhes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das ci tsam gis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos shes bgyi ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
