230a4('bum): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po theg pa chen po'i go cha gon cing / 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
230a5('bum): phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha ro/ la ga tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ nang stong pa nyid kyi ge
230a6('bum): cha bgos/ phyi steng pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar gi stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i go cha bgos/ yang dag par spong ba'i dang
230a7('bum): rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyi go chu bgos/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang
230a8('bum): rnam par thar pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin ga bdags pa'i
230b1('bum): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa ba'i dang / seM sa yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi go cha bgos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skor bag sangs rgyas kyi sku'i blo rman gros na
230b2('bum): stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi kha mas 'di snang bar rgyas par bkang ste/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// lho phyogs dang / tso nub phyogs
230b3('bum): dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar dang shwar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing / 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'grengs so// 
230b4('bum): stong gsum gi stong chen po 'jig rten gi khams gdu ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug du skyed do// shar phyogs kyi 'jug rten gi khams grang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug du rab tu spyod do// 
230b5('bum): dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nu ba dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs dang / phyogs re re zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye mra sred rnam pa
230b6('bum): drug tu rab tu skyed do// des stong gsum gi stong chen po 'jig rten gi khams 'di na/ sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang da
230b7('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ dbyangs sgro ag go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang / bde ba thob ste/ de dag dag ma
230b8('bum): ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par la nges nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag du sti'o// de bzhin du
231a1('bum): du byol seng ge skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can de dag rnam par ldang ngo / de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ 
231a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i 'khan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i 'khan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gri
231a3('bum): lam po che'i gzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye ba'i mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten drag cig mngon par sprul te/ de ltar mngon par sprul nas/ 
231a4('bum): ngan song sum gi sems can de dag la sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gi sgra dang / grag par 'gyur te/ de nas sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun kyi sna
231a5('bum): dang / sgra des sems can dmyal ba dang / byol seng gi ske gnas dang gshen rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs par gyur nas/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am sgyu ma'i mkhan
231a6('bum): de'i mtshan bu mkhas pa des/ sems can gang yang sems can dmyal ba dang / byol seng gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par bslang ba yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis su/ 
231a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams tshad med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams ngan seng gsul yongs su/ 
231a8('bum): snyos nas/ sems can gang yang 'angs su grol par byas pa med do// de'i phyir der/ rab 'byor sgyu 'as ning byobar bathung na/ marnams kyin nyid kris dbade pa'i byed de/ rab 'byer de ltar na/ byang chub gi
231b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ge cha chen po bgos shes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / stong bsum gyi sdong chen po
231b2('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams bye dU ru'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul par byed do// de ltar bye dU r+ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul nas/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal srid mngon par sprul pa byed do// de ltar 'khor les sbyar ba'i
231b3('bum): rgyal srid mngon par sprul nas/ zas 'dod pa rnams ni zas kyi sbyin pa byed de// skem 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/ bzhen pa 'dod pa rnams la ni gzhon pa/ gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos/ me tog 'dod pa rnas
231b4('bum): ma ni me tog/ 'bring ba 'dod pa rnams la ni 'phreng ba/ smos 'dod pa rnams la ni spos/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug cimal chu 'dod pa rnams la ni mal med/ khyim 'dod pa rjes la ni
231b5('bum): 'tshe ba 'dod pa rnams la 'tsho ba/ yo byad 'dod pa rnams la yodabyad/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad sbyin pa yod do/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bye dur+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / 
231b6('bum): nga / gseng dang / gdul 'dod pa rnams la/ nod dang / mu tig dang / bye dU r+yA dang/ dung ngo / man na da/ bre de/ mang 'i bu gi sbyin pa rkyen
232a1('bum): rnam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper nas/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan pa'i mchan bu bayis pa zhig gis/ lam blo che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye be mang po'i tshogs kyi
232a2('bum): mdun du/ skye ba tshogs cig mngon par sprul de/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhyen sde 'am/ sgyu ma'i
232a3('bum): mkhan po'i mtshan po deste/ sems can gang la yang byin pa yod dam/ gsolang pa bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ba stsal pa/ po 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems
232a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'khyer les sgyur ba'i rgyal sred mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin yang / sems can gang la yang ci yang mi byin pa
232a5('bum): sed do/ de ci phyir ni ni/ rab 'byor dron spyi mi'i chos nyid nye bar brgya na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab byor de lta bu'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sos dpa' chen pon ngo
232a6('bum): phe bgos zhes bya/ rgyab 'byor gzhan yang // byang chub sems dpa' sem so dade'i tshen do// nus khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shong / ched du bsams shing / skye ba yong su bzung bas/ 'khor los spya
232a7('bum): rigs su ste zhing / 'khor les sgyur ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas nas/ sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu 'grod de/ bsam rtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms bor
232a8('bum): 'jug pa bzhi dang / rdo mngon par shes pa lnga dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi ches rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med par da / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
232b1('bum): dgu dgapa' phags pa'i bden pa pa dang / shing nge dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgothams cad dang / de brjon gshegs pa'i spobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par reg pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas
232b2('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa brtse brgyad pa/ sems can rnams rab tu 'god du/ sems can de dag kyang/ bran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par sa gyur gyi bar du/ chos snyan pa de dang / mang
232b3('bum): yang 'bral bar mi 'gyuraro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam ba che'i bani mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mdzu chog
232b4('bum): tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ sems sngon de dag dge ba bcu'i las sa kyi lom la bkod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco rgyad kyi bar la bkod na/ rab 'byor de ci snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i/ 
232b5('bum): sgyu ma'i rtsi khan po'i mya rgyan bu mkhris pa des/ sems can gang yang dge bcu'o las kyi le la rab tu bkod pa yod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
232b6('bum): de bar rdzordzas bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa/ rab 'byung de bzhid du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen pos/ sems pan mod med bgrangs med pa dashe bu cu las kyi lam sa rab tu dad
232b7('bum): ba 'byor dris bu byong chub pos dpa' sems dpa' chen po go na chen po bags zhes bya'o// 'i rlob tshedra rab 'byor gzhan
233a1('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i ba rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing / rab tu dgod do// rab 'byor ji ltar na/ byang chub
233a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing / rab 'byor 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byorarang 'di la/ byang chub sas
233a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sems dang po skyed pa nas/ nye bar bzung ste/ rgyal sems can thams cad bdag la rdo dang / dbyig pas bdeg cing / mtshon kyis 'debs kyang / de la bdag gis 'khrug pa'i
233a4('bum): sems 'ga' tsam yang bskyed par mi bya'o// zhes chen rgya na cing / semus can thams cad stong / bzod pa de 'dra ba la rab tu dgod de/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan pon
233a5('bum): sgyu ma'i mkhan pa'i mchan bu mkhan pa zhog gis/ las bre che'i bzhi mdor 'jug ste/ ske ba mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye ba madra po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul ten bzung bu'i ba rlom
233a6('bum): byin snang pa dang / rab tu dgang par byas na/ rab 'byor da je snyam du sems/ sgyu ma 'amakhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i minan bu mo khos pa des/ sems can gung dang bzod pa'i pa sa bye
233a7('bum): thelo babyed pa yid dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ bcom ldan 'dis byas bka' bstsas rnaM/ rab 'byor du bzhi cug/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rjen pad
233a8('bum): ma nga pa sbyi kyi nga/ sa da sa/ na mi ga
233b1('bum): rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor delta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gon chen po bgos zhes bya'o// rgyarab 'byor gzhan srung byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
233b2('bum): chen po drang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing // sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul/ 'di gzhog go/ 'ged dor ze 'byor ji ltar nan byang chub
233b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul ba dang / gzhog cing 'gong ma phyin mye
233b4('bum): ba'i byer 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed nas/ sadams can thams cad lus dang / sems kyi brtson 'grus la mdzod na/ 
233b5('bum): bar skul zhing gzhog go// 'god de/ rab 'byor 'di snya dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan pa'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan ba'i mnan bu gakhas pa zhig gis/ lam bro che'i bani ma da 'jug ste/ 
233b6('bum): skye ba mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshigs ni/ mngon par smral te/ lus dang sems kyi brtson pa khrus la ga byung de ci snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po
233b7('bum): sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des/ sems can gang yang lus dang / seMs kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa
233b8('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa/ lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang lus dang sems kyi brtson
234a1('bum): ka'agrus la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpan
234a2('bum): chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam rten gi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad bsam rtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa
234a3('bum): yang dag par skul zhing / gzhog go// 'god do rab 'byor ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' soms dpa' chen po bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bsam gtan gi ba
234a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang / gzhog cing 'god pa yin/ zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po chos thams cad kyi chos nyid la gnas shing / chos gang la yang 'khrung/ 
234a5('bum): ba 'am 'grug pa med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ bsam rkan gi pha rol tu phyin pa lha gnas pa yang yin te/ de de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
234a6('bum): yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog pa dang / 'ged par byed de/ de ltar yang dag par skul bu rnams kyang / nam blan med pa nga dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du
234a7('bum): nam yang bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhan pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'jug sde/ 
234a8('bum): skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshigs shig mngon par sprul te/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan du
234b1('bum): mkhas pa des/ sems can gang yang bsamartan gi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsngal ba/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
234b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni gang sems can gang yang bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkang
234b3('bum): pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis/ de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
234b4('bum): gi cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
234b5('bum): yang dag par skul zhing gzhog gi 'god do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu
234b6('bum): pa la yang dag par skul ba dang / gzhag cing 'ged pa yin na na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos lnga yang skye ba 'am/ 'gagasas
234b7('bum): 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ tshu rol tamo/ pha ro lo mi dmigs te/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rnon po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab
234b8('bum): rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yod te/ de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'o yang dag par sgrol zhing gzhog go 'godang / rab byer 'di la ste dper na/ sku bo'i gakhan po
235a1('bum): sgyu ma'i mkhan pa'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis rtsa lam ze che'i gzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang bya'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
235a2('bum): yang dag par bskul te gzhog cing 'god na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa des/ sems can gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa
235a3('bum): yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'dus de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
235a4('bum): pa la bkod kyang / sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ra be 'o byor de ni sgyu ma'i cho sa nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi ches nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor
235a5('bum): lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po no/ gtso chen po nga thugs kyi zhes bya'o// rab 'byer gzhan yang / byang chub sems dang nga sems dpa' chen po bges shing / shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi
235a6('bum): khams gong gA'i klung bye ba skyed dag tu song shing / je gar bdag sbyin du rgya'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gan ba bzhin du/ 'jig rten ge ba byams de dag na/ sems can je snyed cog/ 'a'ong ba dag
235a7('bum): thams cad kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog gi 'ged / ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
235a8('bum): dang / bsam rten gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de dag zhin du 'jig rten gi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol/ 
235b1('bum): dadu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// 'di sa ste/ rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston to// sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang rgyu
235b2('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// lho dang nub dang byang dang / byang shar dang / sher lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyi
235b3('bum): kyi phyogs re re zhing / 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la gnas pa de bzhin du
235b4('bum): 'jig rten gi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod/ pa de dag thams cad kyang sten pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par sprul zhing gzhog go 'god de/ de bzhin du nu
235b5('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam rten gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing yizhes
235b6('bum): ge 'ged do// 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid kyis chos kyang ston te/ sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/ bla na med pa yong dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar
235b7('bum): du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po rje'i bzhi mdo 'dug ste/ 
235b8('bum): skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la yang dag par skul cing gnag ste/ bkod par gyur na/ rab 'byor de la ji snye du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan pa'o/ 
236a1('bum): sgyu ma'i mkhan pa'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ sems can gang la yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la yang dag par sprul zhing bzhag ste bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bco ldan
236a2('bum): 'das kyis bka' bsngal bya/ rab 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shar byegs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / lte dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / 
236a3('bum): shar lce dang / lce nub rje dang / nub byang dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi// phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can gang ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bked kyang
236a4('bum): sems can gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bged pa med do// de ci'i phyi dang zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byer de ltar na byang chub sems pa
236a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po grom chen po bgres pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor grwan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ga cha bgos pa ni/ rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis rnam par
236a6('bum): skyed cing / sems bskyed pa gnang gi ge ma 'byed de/ bdag gos sems can 'di sod cig ne/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dged par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di med cing ni
236a7('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bkod par bya'o// 'di snyed
236a8('bum): cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi snyoms sum bcu rtsa bdun la bkod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni bkod par mi bya'o// bdag gis ses can 'di snyed cig ni sangs rgyas
236b1('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la dged par byaste/ 'di snyed cig ne dgad par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bul dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgad par mi bya'o// bdag
236b2('bum): gis sems can 'di snyed cig ne/ kha na cig par 'ang ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dged par mi bya'o// dag gis sems can 'di snyed
236b3('bum): cig ni rang byang chub la dgyed par bya'o/ 'dre snyed cig ni dged par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par ma bya
236b4('bum): zhes bya bar sems bskyed pa'i ge mi 'byed kyi/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o// bdag gis sems can tshad med bangos med pa tshul
236b5('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam rton ge pa ral tu/ phyin pa dang / shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o// nang stong
236b6('bum): pa nyid dang la dgeng par bya'o// phyi stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// dngos bi med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dgeng bar bya'o/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la dgod par bya'o// 'phags pa'i bden
236b7('bum): pa bzhi dang / bsarnam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar
236b8('bum): ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la dgod par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
237a1('bum): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sa so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dus pa bcwo brgyad la dgod par bya'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bul dgod par bya'o// yan cig
237a2('bum): phyir 'ang ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// rang byang chub la dged par bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// zhes bya bar ses skyed dor ba 'byor
237a3('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan pa'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan pa'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i bzhi mder 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshugs shig mngon par sprul te/ 'di sa
237a4('bum): du bdag gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa 'di dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod par bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la dgod par bya'o// snyam du sems skyed par 'gyur na/ rab 'byor de ji snye du
237a5('bum): sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod par byas pa yod dum rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la dgod par byas pa/ 
237a6('bum): yong ngam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'bar de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems can chad med grangs med pa la ma
237a7('bum): tu phyin pa drug dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la dgod par sems skyed kyang / de sems can gyi don du yang sems bskyed pa med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ 
237a8('bum): chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis
237b1('bum): com ldan 'das kyis pa'asungs pa'i rin chos 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi steng du/ go cha ma mchis pa'i go mo bskos sor rig par bya'o// de'i
237b2('bum): spang du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis spong ngo // tshong ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / kye rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong // mig mig gis stong ngo // de bzhin du
237b3('bum): rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid yid kyis stong ngo // gzugs gzugs kyis steng ngo // sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / chos chos kyi sa stong ngo // mig gri rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam pa
237b4('bum): shes pas stong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dag nga / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas
237b5('bum): stong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pas steng ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'du sa te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'as
237b6('bum): te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas steng ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
237b7('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas sngon
237b8('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ngas rtan gapa rlol du byin pa dag she/ 
238a1('bum): ra kyi ba rosong tu phyin pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
238a2('bum): kyis stong ngo // byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su cu rtsa bdun/ byang chub kyi phyogs chos su nu rtsa 'dun gyis stong ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i skyes par
238a3('bum): 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rna bar thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang
238a4('bum): gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnaMs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pas stong ngo // bcom ldan
238a5('bum): 'das byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub ses dpas stong ngo / go nA chen po yang go cha chen pos stong ngo // bcoM ldan 'dasani grangs des ni/ byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ go cha chen
238a6('bum): po ma mchis pa'i go cha cha thogs par rig par bya'o// bcom ldan 'ad sa kyis bka' sngayang ba rab 'byor ji sbed du smrasapa bzhin de/ deng bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ra' byo
238a7('bum): de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma byas// ni bar ma byas/ mngon par ma byas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ gang gi don du go ma 'gos pa'i seMs can dag kyang ma byas/ rnam par ma byas
238a8('bum): mngon par ma byaso// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid ma bgyis/ rnam par ma bgyis/ mngon par ma bgyis pa lags/ bcoM ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa'
238b1('bum): rnon pos gang gi don du/ go che chen po bgos pa'i seMs can de dag kyang ci'i slad du ma bgyis/ ni bar ma dgyis / mngon par ma bgyis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byed kyi
238b2('bum): dmig su med pa'i phyir/ rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi byas/ rnam par ma byas/ mngon par ma byas so// byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen pos gang gi don du/ go cha chen po bogs pa'i sems can de dag
238b3('bum): kyang ma byas/ mngon par ma byas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di ltar gzugs mi byed rna bar mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rna bar shes par mi byed/ rnam
238b4('bum): par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// rab 'byor mig mi byed/ rnam do// par mi byed/ rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang / lus dang / yid mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// rab 'byord
238b5('bum): gzugs mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang / chos mi byed/ rna bar mi byed do// rab 'byor dmig gi rnam par shes par mi byed/ rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byed do/ 
238b6('bum): rna ba'i rna bar shes pa dang / sno rnam par 'ashes pa dang / lce'i rna bar shes pa dang / lus kyi rna bar shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang mi byed/ rnam par mi byed do// rab 'byor dmig gi 'dus te reg pa
238b7('bum): mi byed/ rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byed / na ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te rig pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi byed/ rnam par
238b8('bum): byed/ mngon par mi byed do// rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshong par mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// rna ba'i 'dus te re
239a1('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg
239a2('bum): ba'i rkyen kyis tshor bar mi byed/ rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byed do// rab 'byor bdag ni mi byed rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor sems
239a3('bum): canan ni mi byed rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni shin du mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ rab 'byor srog dang 'gro ba dang / gso' ba dang / skyes bu dang gong zag dang / shod can dang / 
239a4('bum): shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / mthong ba po mi byedran par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shi rnyan tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor rmi lam ni mi byed rnam par
239a5('bum): mi byed mngon par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni shin du mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor sgyu ma dang sgra brnyan dang mig yor dang / gzugs rnyan dang / sdug rgyu dang / sprul pa ni mi byed/ 
239a6('bum): rnam par mi byed pa mngon par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ da ni shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni byed rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 
239a7('bum): shin tu myi migs pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor tshu lo khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brjed pa'o pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brten 'grus kyi pha ral tu phyin pa dang / bsam rdzun gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shos rab kyi pha
239a8('bum): rol tu phyin pa ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid mi byed rnam par mi byed mngon par
239b1('bum): mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mi byed rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin phyir ro// 
239b2('bum): rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyes kyi 'a sems dpa' chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni mo byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang
239b3('bum): khas rten dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnas
239b4('bum): dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sde rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang du so so yang dag pa ri rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres
239b5('bum): pa bco brgyad ni mi byed rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byo/ ra de bzhin nyid ni mi byed rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ 
239b6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhini nyid dang / chos nyid dang // chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa
239b7('bum): nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsum gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings mi byed rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byed de/ dri ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin du mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ rab 'byor byang chub ni mi
239b8('bum): byed rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byed do// de ci'i zhe na/ de shin/ 
240a1('bum): tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de ma byas/ mngon par ma byas pa ro rig par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
240a2('bum): nan bre chos gang gi don du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag ma byas/ rnam par ma byas mngon par ma byas par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
240a3('bum): chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni go cha chen po med pa'i go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'odas kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni ma bcings ma
240a4('bum): grel ba'i/ tshor ba dang 'dre shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma nyi ba bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan
240a5('bum): pa gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du khyed dang / rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba yin nam/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa gang po de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ 
240a6('bum): gzugs ni ma bcings ma gro'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol bu'o// gang pos smras pa che dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar na ma bcings pa'i gzugs gang
240a7('bum): yin pa de ltar ma bcings ma grol ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa gang yin smras pa tshe dang ldan pa gang po rmi lam lta bu'i gzugs de ma bcings ma grol ba'o// gang 'di/ 
240a8('bum): rmi lam lta bu'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// gang 'di sgyu ma lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / gzugs rnyan lta bu dang / mig
240b1('bum): yor lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sbrul lta bu'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// gang 'di sprul pa lta bu'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / sprul pa lta bu'i rnam
240b2('bum): par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'das pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcangs ma grol
240b3('bum): ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan
240b4('bum): pa gang po da ltar byung ba'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o ma ngad ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan
240b5('bum): pa gang po gzugs med pa'i phyir gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnam sar shes pa/ med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa ma bcing ma grol ba'o// tshe dang / 
240b6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzugs med pa'i phyir/ gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o// 
240b7('bum): gzugs ma skyes pa'i phyir gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang
240b8('bum): dge ba'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dge' ba'i tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po mi dge ba'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// 
241a1('bum): mi dge' ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed drang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// lung du ma
241a2('bum): bstan pa'i tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'jig rten pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// 'jig rten pa'i tshor ba dang 'du
241a3('bum): shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 
241a4('bum): 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po zag pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// zag pa dang bcas pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
241a5('bum): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma gro lu dra ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po zag pa med pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// zag pa med pa'i tshe rub pa dang / 'du shes dang 'du
241a6('bum): byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'i tshe dang / na pa gang po de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs med pa'i phyir gzug sa ma bcing ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / 
241a7('bum): rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa ma bcos ma grol pa'o// gzugs dben pa'i phyir gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa'i
241a8('bum): phyir rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o// gzugs ma skyes pa'i phyir gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes ma
241b1('bum): bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po chos thams cad kyang ma grol ba ste/ med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin
241b2('bum): pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
241b3('bum): ba ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir/ pha rol tu phyin pa ma btsongs ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// med pa'i phyir/ 
241b4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma bcings
241b5('bum): ma grob ba skye/ med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grel ba'o// dbenapa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po nang stong po nyid kyang ma grol pa'o// 
241b6('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dang sa po med pa'i de pe nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang ma bcings ma grol gal/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir nang
241b7('bum): stong ba nyid ma bcings ma grel ba'o/ dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes
241b8('bum): ba'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ dben pa'i phyir ma bcings me grol ba'o// 
241b9('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi bcings ma grol ba'o// 
242a1('bum): ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin gshegs pa'i sdebs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
242a2('bum): ma pa rnams kyi tsho po mthol bya'o/ nga ldan pa gang 'i snying pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi rnaMs ma 'dris pa ma bcis ma grol ba'i/ dben pa'i phyir ma bcos grol ba'i/ ma skyes pa'i phyi ma su
242a3('bum): phyir ma btsongs ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings mtho
242b1('bum): ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir/ 'dus ma byas ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa glang po 'di ni byang chub
242b2('bum): sis dpa' soms dba' chen po rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba'o zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo ste/ 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma bciHsa ma grol ba'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa du
242b3('bum): bskyed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma sgrol ba'o// rnam pa thams cad mu
242b4('bum): pa nyid kyi bar du ma btsongs ma grol ba'o/ byang chub sems dpa' rim bcings ma grol ba'o// sangs rgyas mchings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o// rnam pa thams cad ma
242b5('bum): ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid/ dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas ni da dang / ches skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag bu'i mtha' ma bcis
242b6('bum): me grol ba'o// de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
242b7('bum): ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ ma bcings ma grol ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la gnas/ ma bcings ma grol ba'i de bzhin
242b8('bum): nyid la gnas/ ma bcings ma grol ba'i ma nor ba de bzhin nyid la gnas/ ma bcings ma grol ba'i gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang ma gcings ma grol ba'i chos nyid dang / ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos kyi
243a1('bum): de 'dzubyi sa dang sa kyikyis ma grol ba'i gyis kyi gnas nyid dang / ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos skyon med pa nyid dang / ma bcings mi zlum pa'i mang dag pa'i mdzal la gnas/ ma bcas
243a2('bum): ma grole ba'i 'dus ma byas la gnas te/ ma bcings ma grel pa'i sems can rnams rnams yongs su smin par byed do// ma bcings ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'o// ma bcings
243a3('bum): mo grel pa de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed do// ma bcings ma grol ba dri ma bcings ma grol ba'i ches nyon// ma bcings mo grol ba'i sangs rgyas bco
243a4('bum): ldan 'das rnams dang / nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams dang / nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// ma bcings ma grol ba
243a5('bum): mig deng nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// ma bcings ma grol ba'i
243a6('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// ma bcings ma gre lo ba'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgrub par 'gyur ro// ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i rnam pa thas
243a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol po'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro// ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings
243a8('bum): ma grol ba'i sems can rnams theg pa gsum la rab tu dgad par gyur te/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma
243b1('bum): sa pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po ma bcings ma grol ba med pa dang / dben pa dang / skye bu med pa nye bar bzung zhing / chos thams cad khong du chud par byed do// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar na/ byang chu
243b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma bcings ma grol ba'i theg pa chen po'i ge tshe tshogs par rig par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te
243b3('bum): bco ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das ci tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa 'di la
243b4('bum): yang dag par gnas par rig par bgyi lags theg pa gang du gnas par 'gyur ba lags/ theg pa des ni su zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
243b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' kyi stsol to// rab 'byor gang khyed de skad du/ byang chub sems dang sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po gang zhes zer ba ni// rab 'byor
243b6('bum): phra rol tu phyin pa drug ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ drug gang zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
243b7('bum): med pa'o seras tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pa ra tu phyin pa dge bas na gtan gyi rol tu sbyin pa dang / shes kyi sa rlos byin pa dang/ 'byor 'di la byeng chub sems dan
243b8('bum): pa'i che byernam pa sems cang mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i rdol byas pan drugacer ba rnams pa na tho ma ze'i sngon pa yongs su rnye ste 'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mo
244a1('bum): byas shing / bla na med pa yang dgra par rdzogs tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongasu bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gsol
244a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma nyams pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'od la byang
244a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs shing gnas la/ pha ro kyang
244a4('bum): dge pa bcu'i las kyi lam la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par skul ba dang / gzhog pa dang rab tu gzhog pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
244a5('bum): phyin pa yongasu ma nyams pa'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bya/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
244a6('bum): stsol pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ bdag kyang bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin la/ gzhan yang
244a7('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa la yang dag par bskul ba b+hi ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub seMs
244a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags kabacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams
244b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas bdag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson pa mi 'dor zhing / gzhan yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyor ba 'di ni/ byang chub
244b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang logs/ bcom ldan
244b3('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ bsam rnam rnams la thabs
244b4('bum): mkhas pas mnyam par gzhog kyang / de dag gi dbang gis mi skye zhing gzhan yang bsam gtan rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par skul ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' seMs
244b5('bum): dpa'i ji cha nas po'i bsam rten gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gsol pa ni bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags/ bcom
244b6('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ bdag kyang ches thams cad la mngo
244b7('bum): par chags pa med par ches thams cad kyi rang bzhin yang dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par byed cing / sems can rnams kyang chos thams cad la mngon par chags pa med pa dang / chos thas
244b8('bum): tshad kyi rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par skul zhing gzhog pa dang / rab tu dgod pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol
245a1('bum): ga tu phyin pa ste/ de ni rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po po'i rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpelnga chen po theg pa chen po 'di rnam
245a2('bum): 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma
245a3('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa steng po nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang
245a4('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid snying pa nyid de/ de la nang stong pa nyid
245a5('bum): gang zhe na/ gang gi ches shes bya ba ni/ mig dang rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang / lus dang yid de/ de la mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir/ mig mig gis skyong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang
245a6('bum): bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro// mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir/ rna ba dang sna dang / lce dang lus dang / yid yid kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni nang stong pa nyid do
245a7('bum): de la phyi steng pa nyid gong zhes/ phyi'i ches shes bya ba ni/ gzugs dang sgra dang / dri dang ro dang / rig dang chos rnams dang / de la mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir/ gzug so gzugs kyis stong ngo // de rje
245a8('bum): phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de bzhin du mig mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir ro// sgra dang dri dang / re dang reg dang / chos chos kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 
245b1('bum): 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la phyi stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ nang gi skye mched drug dang / phyi'i skye mched drug dang / 'di dag ni phyi nang gi chos zhes bya ste/ de la mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir/ nang gi
245b2('bum): chos rnams phyi'i chos rnams kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir re/ phyi'i chos rnams nang gi chos rnams kyis steng ngo / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i
245b3('bum): phyir te/ 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de lo stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir/ chos rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis steng
245b4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la chen po stongapa nyid gang zhe na/ mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir/ shar phyogs shar phyeg
245b5('bum): kyis stong ngo // lho phyogs lho phyogs kyis stong ngo / nub phyogs nub phyogs kyis steng dzi/ byang phyogs byang phyeg/ sa kyis steng ngo // 'og gi phyogs 'og gi phyogs kyis stong ngo // ste
245b6('bum): gi phyogs steng gi phyogs kyis kyi stong ngo // phyogs 'tshams rnams phyogs 'tshams rnams kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid ces
245b7('bum): bya'o// de la don dam po stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ don dam pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa de yang / mya ngan las 'das pas stong ngo // mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir/ mya ngan las 'das pa de yang mya ngan las
245b8('bum): 'das pas stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni don dam pa stod pa nyid ces bya'o// de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ 'dus byas zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khas
246a1('bum): dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams te/ de la mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir/ 'dod pa'i khams 'dod pa'i khams kyis stong ngo // gzugs kyi khams gzugs kyi kham
246a2('bum): kyis stong ngo // gzugs med pa'i khams gzugs med pa'i khams kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la 'dus ma byas
246a3('bum): stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ 'dus ma byas shes bya ba ni gang la skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa de ni 'dus ma byas s+ho/ mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir 'dus
246a4('bum): ma byas de ni 'dus ma byas kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la mtha' las 'ongs pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang mtha'i mi
246a5('bum): dmigs pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa ste/ mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pas steng ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yi
246a6('bum): ba'i phyir te/ de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ gong la theg ma mi dmigs shing / thA ma yang mi dmigs pa de la ya
246a7('bum): yang mi dmigs/ 'ong ba yang mi dmigs te/ mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir thog ma dang tha ma med pa thog ma dang tha ma med pas skyong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'din
246a8('bum): tho gri mra drang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir/ dor ba med pa dor ba med pas stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de
246b1('bum): yin du'i phyir te/ 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang zho na/ 'dus byas sam 'dus ma byas kyang rung ste/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni
246b2('bum): nyan thos rnams kyis ma byas// rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ma byas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
246b3('bum): sangs rgyas rnams kyis mo byas te/ mi rtag mo jig pa'i phyir/ rang bzhin rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la
246b4('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ chos tha mas cad stong pa nyid ces bya ba ni/ gzugs dang tshor ba dang / 'du she sa dang / 'du byed drang / rnam par shes pa dang / mig dang rna ba dang sna dang / 
246b5('bum): lce dang / lus dang yid dang / gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang / reg dang chos dang / mig gri rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam pa
246b6('bum): shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te rag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sus
246b7('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / 
246b8('bum): skye'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / gzugs yod pa'i chos dang / gzugs med pa'i
247a1('bum): chos dang / 'dus byas kyi chos dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos de/ 'di dag ni chos thams cad ces bya'o// de la mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad ches thams cad kyis stong ngo // de ci'i
247a2('bum): bya ma de 'ang byazhini de yon pa'i byon te/ don ces thams cad stong ba nyid ces bya'i rlom ra mi nyid stong pa nyid pa she na/ gzugs ni 'jig pa'i mtshan cid/ nor bani rtsing ba'i mam
247a3('bum): sa na man pa'i mam da / byed ni pang byung 'a bye pa mican cing/ rnam pa basmra rnaM ma zlog pa'i ca da/ ng+yas su 'dug pa'i sasu byas kyi kyis rnams kyi myu
247a4('bum): dang / sa rdzu mas kyi rnan ba'i de sakyi/ sa sa rnamam / no// dedag po yin pa / 
247a5('bum): dzin rang gi mnan nid stong po nyid ces bya/ de la myi rtogs pa nga ga zhe na/ gangs 'das bya mi dmigs pa dang / ma mos pa mngomags pa dang / daltar byung ba'i gnas kyang
247a6('bum): dang / miTIg mi 'jig pa'i phyir/ mi migs pa sa dmigs pas spyod du/ dun phyir zhen/ po dang bzhin de srid pa'i phyir te/ 'dzin mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ des sa pa ni ni ma
247a7('bum): spyod pa nyid ba na/ gangs sa na pa byed par 'byung bar byor tho ma rtag mi 'jug pa'ibyor/ 'as pa dus pas spyod do// dkya byor na/ po bzhin yin pa
247b1('bum): ba 'byor gzhan yang dngos po dngos pos stong ngo // dngos po med pa ni dngos po med byas stong ngo // rang bzhin ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gzhan gyi dngos po ni gzhan gyi dngos pos stong ngo // de la dngos po dngas
247b2('bum): rdza khro zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ phung po lnga po ste/ phung po de dag kyang phung po rnams kyis spong bas/ de ltar na drangos po dngos pos stong ngo // ji ltar nadangos po med pa ngos po med pasu steng zhe na/ ba.A bo med pa n+de
247b3('bum): bya ba ni 'dus ma byas te/ 'dus ma byas de yang 'dus ma byas kyis stong pas na/ de ltar na/ dngos po med pa dngos po med pas stong ngo // ji ltar na rang bzhin rang bzhin gyis stong zhe na/ rang bzhin zhes byab
247b4('bum): ni ngo bo nyid ma nor ba ste/ de la stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni shes pas ma byas/ mthong bas ma byas te/ 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// de la rlung bzhin gyi dngos po stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ de bzhin gau shes
247b5('bum): pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor
247b6('bum): ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni de bzhin nyid du gnas bu ste/ de ltar chos de dag gi gzhan gyis stong pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ gzhan gyi dngos po stong
247b7('bum): nga ces bya'o// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ dpa'
247b8('bum): bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin du rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par gartse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla bu bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba'i rgyal
248a1('bum): mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i tipange 'dzin dang / spyi gtsug rnam
248a2('bum): bar lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad
248a3('bum): la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpung rnam par
248a4('bum): bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag byar 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi zla bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshig bla dgas la
248a5('bum): yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya yo/ ngas su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams
248a6('bum): cad mnyam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' rgyas par 'gyangs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i
248a7('bum): dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyun ces bya bo'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang po dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyun gyi rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i
248a8('bum): 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par bsgyings po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snrel gzhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa sgo nga ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang ba zhes bya/ 
248b1('bum): titi nge 'dzin dang / tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin dang / gnas la rten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems me rnyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes/ 
248b2('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od mtha' yos pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dag pu dam pa zhes bya/ 
248b3('bum): khe'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i tong nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba byed po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / klog gi sgren mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zang mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ti
248b4('bum): 'dzin dang / mi 'pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nagazi brjid yod pa/ zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad pa dang bra la ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
248b5('bum): 'dzin dang / 'jig pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma me da pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba
248b6('bum): ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba gsal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba 'byed pa zhes bya po'i jing nge 'dzin dang / bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
248b7('bum): rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snyems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen mtha'
248b8('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
249a1('bum): chos kyis 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbe' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ges rnam par dag
249a2('bum): pa zhes de ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa med pa zhes
249a3('bum): byab ting nge 'dzin dang / mi nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas pa med par spyod pa 'is bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin dang / rab ni bsred pa sa bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snyid pa ldan gas
249a4('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su 'gyur ba zhes bya 'i ti de'i
249a5('bum): dang / sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ti nga 'dzi rkyen dang / dge ba'i lo tog rgyas shing gsal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge dang / byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
249a6('bum): spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rjes thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang su gcong pa zhes
249a7('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par mdze
249a8('bum): bor sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'dir ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brda' dang sgral
249b1('bum): 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
249b2('bum): 'dzin dang / mngon par dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam po'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bde ba dang sdug sbal ba thams cad mi mngon par dga' ba med
249b3('bum): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi gle gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba
249b4('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mthun pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od
249b5('bum): ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying po dang lnga na pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma med pa rgyas pa'i'od zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / klog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge
249b6('bum): 'dzin dang / rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen du 'ong byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mnyam pa nyid ces bya bo'i ting nge 'dzin dang // tshul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ti
249b7('bum): n+d+ra dang / rkyen mongs pa med pa yang gA byar gnas pa zhes bya nga dzin dang / mas pa nga sas na nga yongs pa rnyed pa yang dag par gnas bzhes bla mau po nga
249b8('bum): dmyigs su med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bye ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lus kyi skyon yang dgu par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ngag gi
250a1('bum): skyon rnam par 'jig pa dang khwa' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / na mkha' ltar chags pa med pas/ rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dri la dang
250a2('bum): bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin do ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod yul spyod pa ste/ 'di ni dpa' bar 'gro bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rin chen
250a3('bum): phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin des ting rjeng nge 'dzin thams cad rgyas btab pa lto bur gyur pa ste/ 'di ni rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ de la seng ge rna bar

250a5('bum): zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la zla ba'i rgyal/ 
250a6('bum): mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyal mtshon 'dri ni 'dzin pa skye/ 'di niHmas ci zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya
250a7('bum): ting nge 'dzin to// de la chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis mngon par 'phags pa ste/ 'di ni chos thas
250a8('bum): cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ de la spyi phyug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyi phyug rnam par lnga
250b1('bum): ste/ 'di ni spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la chos kyi dbyings nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos kyi dbyings su rtogs pa'i 'gro ba/ 
250b2('bum): ste/ 'di ni ches kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la ngos pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi
250b3('bum): rgyal mtshan nges par 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin
250b4('bum): thams cad 'jig par mi 'gyur ba ste/ de ni rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ de la chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shang
250b5('bum): chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'jug pa ste/ 'di dA ni ches rnam sa cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzi nA to/ de la ting nge 'dzin rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i
250b6('bum): ting nge 'dzin gang zhe no// ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa ste/ 'di ni ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
250b7('bum): to// de la 'od zer rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa ste/ 'di ni 'od zer rab tu 'gyed
250b8('bum): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi stobs rnam par dgod pa ste/ 
251a1('bum): 'di ni dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de yang dgra par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thos
251a2('bum): cad yang dgra par 'phags par 'gyur bA ste/ 'di ni yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ de la nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
251a3('bum): rjegang zhe na/ rating nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig po 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi zla bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// 
251a4('bum): de tshig bla dgas la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi tshig kla dgas la 'jug pa ste/ 'dri ni tshig
251a5('bum): dgas la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge/ 'dzin te// de la phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i// ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting

251a7('bum): la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thas cad kyi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin phra ste/ 'di ni phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de lo nyam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin gang
251a8('bum): zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad mnyam par mi 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni nyam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba
251b1('bum): rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'dra zhing khongs su chud bar 'dong ba ste/ 'di ni chos thas cad yang dag
251b2('bum): par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ de ldan mkha' sa pad+ma 'byings bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin grad+hA na na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis
251b3('bum): na mkha' rgyas par 'gyings pa ste/ 'di ni na mkha' rgyas par 'gyangs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas
251b4('bum): shwang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dkyil 'khar yongasu 'a// dzin pa ste/ 'di ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i / nga nge 'dzin to// de la nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
251b5('bum): dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dri ma rab tu sel ba ste/ 'di ni nyon mongs pa spospang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rnam
251b6('bum): bar snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad lham me ldan na ljang nger byed pa ste/ 'di ni snang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i
251b7('bum): da 'dzin to// de la tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos gang yang tshal ba med bu ste/ 'di ni tshil ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
251b8('bum): te/ de la gnas la rten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin// gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos gang la yang gnas pa rten par ya/ brten par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste
252a1('bum): 'di ni gnas la brten pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de la sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / sems kyang mi 'byung sos las bya
252a2('bum): ba rnams kyang mi rgyu ba ste/ 'di ni sems pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ de lta dri ma med pa'i gron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin
252a3('bum): cad kyi ston ma 'bang bar byed bu ste/ 'di ni gri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la 'od mtha' yas pA zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin glang zhe n+tu/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shi
252a4('bum): khyod mtha' yas b+har byed pa ste/ 'di ni 'od mtha' yas pa 'o/ sa bya bu'i ting nge 'dzin to/ de sa 'od byed pa zhes pa ni/ ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ti ngange 'dzin
252a5('bum): d+hi thob ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od 'a byed pa ste/ 'di ni 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin
252a6('bum): gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin 'di thab ma thag tu/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ de la dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhon
252a7('bum): ting nga 'dzin thams cad dz+nyA gan ste byed// de de 'dzin rnams cad kyi drug pan+d+ha rnam pa nying tho dri na 'a gshos bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la bye dri ma med pa zhos bya ba'i ting de lji na ga / 
252a8('bum): ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing+ga/ ting nge 'dzin thas cad kyi drim sel ba ste/ 'di ni 'od drim med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// ngom dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhon// ting nge mdzin ngam
252b1('bum): ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dga' ba nyams su byed pa ste gyur te/ 'di ni dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la klog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas
252b2('bum): shig ting ngange 'dzin thams cad kyi sgron ma byed pa ste/ 'di ni glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin te/ de la zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shri nga/ tI ngengange 'dzin
252b3('bum): thas cad shes pa dang / zad mi shes pa yang dag par rje su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'atin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la
252b4('bum): gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis 'bar bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya bu'i ting nge 'dzin te/ de la zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang

253a1('bum): bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi mun pa med pa

253a6('bum): rjesu mthong ba ste/ 'di ni ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang /

253a8('bum): shing / sems mi g.yo rnam par mi g.yo mi ldog/ yongs su yi chad par mi 'gyur/ nyam su mi byed pa med la de soms shes bya ba ni 'di yin zhes bya bar sems mi 'byung ba ste/ 'di ni seMs gnas pa lnga/ 
253b1('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ti nge 'dzin thams cad rab tung dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni kun du snang ba zhes bya ba
253b2('bum): ting nge 'dzin te/ de la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad rlab tu granas par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni rab tu gnas pa zhes bya
253b3('bum): ting nge 'dzin to// de la rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad cang rin chen mtha' ltar kun nas snang ba ste/ 'di ni rin chen mtha'
253b4('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ de la chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes byas ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas/ shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad phyag rgya med pa'i mthas phyag rgyas

253b7('bum): pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ de la dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang chos thams cad gi dga' ba ste/ 'dri ni
