287b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongs su rdzogs pa'i spobs pa nges par snyan pa shes par bya ba rtogs pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ma'i mngal du 'gro ba
287b4('bum): phun sutshogs pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpanga' sems dpa' chen po'i tshe rabs thams cad du rdzus te skye ba dza ste/ de ni byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i me'i mnga'
287b5('bum): du 'gro ba phun sum sa tshogs pa'o/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rig/ 
287b6('bum): chen por skye ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyud phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang
287b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho bar skyo ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyud phun sum tshogaso pan
287b8('bum): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi rigs su sngon gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
288a1('bum): chen po rnams byung bar gyur pa'i rigs su skye ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum tshogs pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
288a2('bum): pa'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la sems can rnams bkod cing / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur ba ste/ de ni
288a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshe phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
288a4('bum): dpa' chen po'i skyes ma thag tu 'jig rten gi khas snang ba ngas rgyas par bkang ste/ de dag rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar bye/ dang pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po'i tshe phun
288a5('bum): sum tshogs pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' semasakyi dpa' chen po'i mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa gang ni na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rab tu byung du'i phyir
288a6('bum): sems can bya brag khrag tu stong dum deng lhan cig tu mngon par 'thun zhing/ sems can de dag kyang theg pa gsum ltungs par 'byung ba ste/ de ni byung na pa semasu dpa' pos dang nan pa'i matin
288a7('bum): 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i shing gi
288a8('bum): gser gi rgya la sa byung ba yin zhe ni lhun byed rgyar 'dug pa yin// yal ga rin po che sna bdun gi rang bzhin las grub pa yin me tog dang / lo ma rin po che thams cad du gyur pa yin/ shing de'i dri zhim po dang 'od
288b1('bum): bzang pos 'jis rten gyi khams mtha' yas brgyas par gang ba yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan phran sum tshogs pa'o// del zung chub sems dpa'
288b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa gang zhen byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po'i sems can yongs su smon par bya ba rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
288b3('bum): rnam par da byung ba sems da sems sa rten po'i gon tan pasas kya yos su dgu thu ma rdzogs 'jogs pa'o/ du gyun sems sam
288b4('bum): sa bcu pa la gnas pa de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya ba gang she na/ byang chub sems nab rnams dab chen po gang gi rol tu phyin pa them so pa'i yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba da
288b5('bum): kyi chags dang / byag chags kyi marnams sbyar ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dus ba ni chen po dang / sangs na sa rnam ca dkyang yongs su rdzogs pa gyur ba dga'i
288b6('bum): sgyu byung chub sams dpa' sems dpa'i chen pos bcu la gnas pa ni bzhin gi she sa bya ny-id kyis drun/ 'byor byang chus sems pa sems na po cu ga nan
288b7('bum): khyor bya ba sa chos depa'i sems dpa' chen pa lanas mkhas pas par latu phyin pa rnams sa stod ci nga / ma nyid bkyis du chun kyi thugs kyirjes sum bcurtsa badzin nga/ la sa/ 
289a1('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rgyad dang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms/ 
289a2('bum): par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
289a3('bum): dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco rgyad la spyod pa'i tshe/ kar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa las yang dag par 'da' ba rigs kyi sa dang / 
289a4('bum): brgyad pa'o sa dang mthong ba'i sa dpa' srabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang / nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems da
289a5('bum): las yang dag par 'das te rab 'byor de ltar byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dgu pa las yongs su 'das nas/ sangs rgyas kyi sa las gnas pa ste/ 
289a6('bum): rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' songs dpa' chen po'i sa bcu pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe 'a chen po theg pa chen po chen po la yang dag par zhugs
289a7('bum): pa re rig par bya'o// rab 'byor khyod kyis gang yang 'di skad du theg pa de gang nus byung bar 'gyu ro zhes bya ba smras pa ni/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshu la gis khams gsum nas byung bar 'gyuraro/ 
289a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas par 'gyur ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa'i
289b1('bum): chos de nyis ka yang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin gzugs med pa stan du med pa thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
289b2('bum): rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos ni 'byung ba 'am/ 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'am 'byung bar 'gyur ba med de/ rab 'byor gang mtshan ma med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni chos kyi
289b3('bum): dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad de/ rab 'byor grang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung ba 'ding ba de ni/ de bzhin nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i rnams 'byung
289b4('bum): bar 'dod pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung ba dar 'dod pa de ni bsam gis mi khyab pa'i dbyings 'byung
289b5('bum): bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rjes 'byung por 'dod pa de ni/ na mkha'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnaMs 'byung
289b6('bum): bar 'dod pa de ni/ 'dod chags zad pa'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad de/ rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rab tu byung ba'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang / 
289b7('bum): mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni spong nga ba'i dbyings 'byung 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du
289b8('bum): zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ 'gog pa'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ gzugs stong pa
290a1('bum): nyid 'byung bur 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni tshor ba stong pa nyid dang 'du shes stong pa nyid dang 'du byed stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung
290a2('bum): bar 'dod du zang // de ci'i phyir ne na/ rab 'byor gzugs stong pa nyid ni khams sum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thas cang mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// tshor ba stong pa nyid dang 'du shes stong pa nyid dang 'du byed stong pa nyid dang / 
290a3('bum): rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe ni/ 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// tshor ba stong pa nyid dang 'du shes stong pa nyid
290a4('bum): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mig stong pa nyid 'byung ba ra 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos
290a5('bum): rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rnab stong pa nyid dang sna stong pa nyid dang / lce stong pa nyid dang lus stong pa nyid dang / yid stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad du/ de ci'i phyir zhe nas/ rab 'byor mig skyeng pa nyid ni khas sum
290a6('bum): nas 'gyur ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ rnam pa stong pa nyid dang sna stong pa nyid dang lce stong pa nyid dang / lus stong pa nyid dang yid stong pa nyid ni khams sum nas 'byung ba med do/ rnam pa thams cad
290a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mig mig gis stong pa'i phyir ro// rna ba dang sna dang dang lce dang lus dang yid yid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gangango mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar
290a8('bum): 'dod pa de ni gzugs stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod bu zang do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni sgra stong pa nyid dang dri stong pa nyid dang / ro stong pa nyid dang reg stong pa nyid dang / chos stong pa nyid 'gyu
290b1('bum): ra 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs stong pa nyid ni khams sum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang / chos stong pa nyid ni khams
290b2('bum): gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang chos chos kyis stong pa'i phyir
290b3('bum): rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rna ba'i rnam
290b4('bum): par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang lce'i rna bar she pa stong pa nyid dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// 
290b5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khas bsum sa nas 'byung ba med de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / sna'i
290b6('bum): rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi rna bar shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad
290b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes/ 
290b8('bum): pa dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod
291a1('bum): du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / lus
291a2('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang yid kyi 'dus te ga reg pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa
291a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi
291a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rna pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir/ zhe na/ 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te
291a5('bum): reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang lus kyi 'dus te rig po dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas sbyong pa'i
291a6('bum): phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid du 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnas
291a7('bum): 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshe ro ba stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi 'dus
291a8('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ni zhes
291b1('bum): gsum nas 'byung ba med du/ rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba snang ba nyid dang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / lce'i 'dus
291b2('bum): rig pa'i rkyen kyis char ba stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis NA~Mr bya stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam
291b3('bum): thas cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na// 'di ltar mog gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis nor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te
291b4('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus
291b5('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnaMs 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rmi lam 'byung ba ra 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i
291b6('bum): chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ sgyu ma dang smig sgyu mi dang / sgra brnyan dang mig yor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma dang smig sgyu ma/ 
291b7('bum): dang sgra brnyan dang / mig sor dang de bzhin gshegs pani sprul pa ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med sde do/ rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
291b8('bum): rmi lam rmo lam ges stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// sgyu ma dang srog rgyu dang smra brnyan dang mig yor dang / de rje'i bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stsal pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de/ 
292a1('bum): mnan nyid med pa'i chos nas 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung bar 'dong du zad de/ rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rnal khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi
292a2('bum): ba dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'artson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gautan gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'o// 
292a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ rna pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnos pa med do// nul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol/ 
292a4('bum): phyin pa dang / bas rten gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam rna pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de'i ci'i phyin
292a5('bum): zha nu/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis snang pa'i phyir ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
292a6('bum): rtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i
292a7('bum): chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ nang stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos 'byung bar 'dod pa kyi de ni phyi stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med// 
292a8('bum): pa'is nas 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad po / rab myong gang mnan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dong du 'ang du
292b1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// phyi slong bu nyid ni khas gsum nus 'brub ba med do rnarna pa thams
292b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med de/ phye nang stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nus 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas phra med do// dngos pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni khams
292b3('bum): gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med de de/ rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis
292b4('bum): stong pa'i phyir ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po/ rkyen med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong po'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan
292b5('bum): nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni yang dag par spong ba
292b6('bum): rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gi zhed bu rnams dang / dbang pa rnams dang slobs rnams dang / byang nub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lug brgyad pa 'byeng bar 'dod du dang do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 
292b7('bum): dran bu nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bo nyid ni khas gsum nas 'byung ba med de/ rnam pa thos cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ yang dag brda spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnamaso dang / dbang po rnams
292b8('bum): dang stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med de/ rab 'byo
293a1('bum): des phyir zhe na 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis spyong pa'i phyir ro// yang dag par snang ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams dang / 
293a2('bum): dbang ba rnams dang stabs rnams dang byang chub kyi yan rnams dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid ni 'phags pa'i lam yon lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan
293a3('bum): nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod du pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnaMs dang / bas tan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rjes dang ba rnam par thar pa
293a4('bum): brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / de stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa mang bu nyid 'gyu nga bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'o/ 
293a5('bum): khaden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// bsro ma gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang / rgyud med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang
293a6('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ngo bo nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan med pa dang / 
293a7('bum): smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'phags pa'i badren pa rjes kyi ngo bye nyid 'phags pa'i bden
293a8('bum): pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// bsam rten rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnaMs kyi ngo bo nyid dang / rnam par tha pa brgyad kyi
293b1('bum): nyid dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ngo bo nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / spen pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ rab rgya 'byor gang
293b2('bum): matsun ma med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod bu de ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'byung bar 'dod du da do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bo byor mngon par shes pa rnams
293b3('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// 
293b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do rna rab 'byor deci'i phyimi na na/ 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang bo nyid kyis song ba'i phyir ro/ ting nge 'dzin
293b5('bum): rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni gzungs/ kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byorar gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin
293b6('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs cu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang // so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chas ma 'dres pa bcwo rgyad 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
293b7('bum): 'byod de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs bcu'i ngo bo 'di ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med de/ rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ mi 'jigs pa po'itI nyid dang / so so yang dag pa ro ga pa
293b8('bum): 'ong bo nyid dang rdzasangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa ba rgyad gi da bo nyid de 'ams gsum nas 'byung ba med de/ rnam po thos cang mkhyen pa nyid du gnos pa med do// rab 'byor dpa'i phyir zhe na/ den 'di ltar dacan
294a1('bum): gshegs pa'i stabs rnams kyi ngo bye nyid ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi ngo bo nyid gis skabs pa'i phyir ra/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid dang / 
294a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni
294a3('bum): dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni// sangs rgya sre 'byung por 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor grang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams
294a4('bum): 'byung bar 'dod du zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' 'byung bar 'dod du mad ngo// rab 'byor gung mtshan nyid med pa'i chos 'byung bar 'dod pa de da ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
294a5('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'ded du 'dang / de ci'i phyir zhen rab dag bcom pa 'ug bzad pa ma mas gsum nas 'byung ba med de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dug
294a6('bum): ba med de/ rangasas rgyas dang 'grumasas dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dag bas pa sa nas par rdzogs pa'i sang rgyas sernams gsum nami 'byung ba med de/ rnam pa bams pa na / 
294a7('bum): du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dgra bcom pa yi ngo bo nyid ni dgra bcom pa'i dri bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gsheg pa
294a8('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid gis stong pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byer gang mtshan nyid med pa'i ces 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras rtswa 'byung bar 'dod du zad de/ 
294b1('bum): gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod du 'ang ni/ lan cig phyir 'ang ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang
294b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ khams gsum nas 'byung ba med de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas
294b3('bum): pa med deng / lan cig phyir 'ong bri'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mo 'ang ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom bya nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
294b4('bum): ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen padri nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid ni rgyun to zhugs
294b5('bum): pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid stong pa'i phyir ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bra sa bu dang // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lAm gyi rna pa shes pa nyid dang
294b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ga nga'i nyid ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnas 'byung por 'dod pa de ni/ mang 'thung bar 'dod du
294b7('bum): do/ rab 'byor gong mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ mtshan ma 'byung bar 'dod du bang do/ rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni
294b8('bum): 'byung bar 'dod pa na 'dade/ rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i ches nas 'byung bar 'dong ba de ni na/ khyi skad 'byung bar 'did du 'dang / rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i nas rjes 'byung ba/ 
295a1('bum): 'dod ba don / smra bdags pa 'byung bar 'dod du da du/ de ci'i phyi na/ rang 'byor ming stong pa nyid ni khams gsusu nas 'byung ba med do/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa me
295a2('bum): mtshan ma med pa'i stong pa nyid mi khas gsum nas 'byung ba med de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// brda stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhye
295a3('bum): pa ma nyid du gnas pa med do// tha snyad stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung bar 'dod med do// rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// bdags pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung bya
295a4('bum): med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming stong pa nyid ni ma stong pa nyid gos stong pa'i phyir ro// mtshan mu med pa stong pa nyid
295a5('bum): ni mtshan ma med pa stong pa nyid gis stong pa'i phyir ro// brda stong pa nyid ni brda stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// tha snyad stong pa nyid ni/ tha snyad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid gis stong pa'i phyir ro// 
295a6('bum): gdags pa stong pa nyid gi gdags pa stong po nyid gi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni skye ba med pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor
295a7('bum): gang mnan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rno bar byang ba med pa dang / mngon por 'du bya ba med pa 'byung bar 'dod du 'ang dro/ 
295a8('bum): de ci'i phyir na na/ rab 'byor skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khas gsum nas 'byung ba med de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med
295b1('bum): rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung bar 'di med de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med da/ rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
295b2('bum): skye ba med pa'i ngo ba nyid ni skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid gis stong pa'i phyir ro/ 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni/ mngon par
295b3('bum): 'du bya ba med pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid gso stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ zag pa chen po ni khams gsum nas 'byung bso// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas par shes
295b4('bum): bar bya ste/ gnas pa de ni skyod du med pa'o// shes rab// bam po// rab 'byor gzhan yang khyad gis gang 'di skad du theg pa chen po ga
295b5('bum): du gnas par 'gyur zhes smras bu ni/ theg pa chen po de gang du yang / gnas byar 'gyur ba med de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni gnas mo dmyigs pa'i phyir mi gnas pa sung
295b6('bum): rab 'byor desar de theg pachen po de ni mi gnas pa'i tshul gos gnas sa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa ye ngam yin mo gnas pa yang ma yin no/ rab 'byor ba na du thegs
295b7('bum): de mang gnas pa yang sa yin/ mi gnas pa yang mi yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsum shes mi khya ba'i dkri su ni gnas pa yang ma yi rlom
295b8('bum): kha yang ma yin/ rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na// rab 'byor khyod kyis chos go dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid lnga ni gnas pa tham ng+ge'i
296a1('bum): gnas pa med do// de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gris mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la gnas pa'i mi gnas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos
296a2('bum): kye dbyings chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid gos stong pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid gi ngo bo nyid gis steng pa'i phyir ro// yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid gis stong pa'i phyir ro// bsam gis
296a3('bum): mo khyab pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ na mkha'i dbyings ni gnas pa yang mya yin/ mi gnas pa
296a4('bum): yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lA ste/ dper na// rab tu byang ba'i dbyings dang / 'dod chags ma yin
296a5('bum): dang bral ba'i dbyings dang / 'gog pa'i dbyings ni gnas pa yang te ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de/ bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa
296a6('bum): yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nA mya mkha'i dbyis kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa med do/ 'dod chags zang po'i dbyings dang / rab tu byung ba'i dbyings dang / 'dod chags dang / bral ba'i/ 
296a7('bum): dbyings dang / 'gog pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar nam mkha'i dbyings ni namakho'i khrus kyi rang bzhin gis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'dod
296a8('bum): chags zad pa'i dbyings 'dod chags zad pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor tu byang ba'i dbyings rab tu byung ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dang
296b1('bum): 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'gog pa'i dbyings 'gag pa'i dbyings gi rang bzhin gis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs stong pa nyid ni gnas
296b2('bum): ba yang ma yin/ me gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor do bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin na/ rab 'byo 'di lta ste dren nor pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dugs
296b3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / 'du byed stong pa dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni/ gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas
296b4('bum): pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid la gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do// tshor dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid la
296b5('bum): gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do// rab 'byor da de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// cher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnaMs
296b6('bum): shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ myig stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang / 
296b7('bum): ma yin/ mi gnas ba yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rna ba stong pa nyid dang / sna stong po nyid dang / lce stong pa nyid dang / lus stong pa nyid dang / yid stong pa nyid ni/ gnas
296b8('bum): yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yong gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de gnyen ci'i phyir zhe na/ myig go
297a1('bum): la ni gnas pa 'am du myi gnas pa med do// rna ba dang / snga dang lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
297a2('bum): dri ni 'di ltar myigs myig stong pa'i phyir ro// rna ba dang sna dang / lce dang lus dang / yid yid gis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin
297a3('bum): mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas po ma yino// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgra stong pa nyid dang / dri stong pa nyid dang / ro stong pa
297a4('bum): nyid dang / reg stong pa nyid dang / chos stong pa nyid ni/ gnas sa pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang mi yin/ 
297a5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do// sgra dang dri dang / ro dang re go dang / chos kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa med do// de ci'i phyir
297a6('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang / chos chos kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ mig gi rnam par shes pa
297a7('bum): stong pa nyid ni/ gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin no// mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ 
297a8('bum): dper na/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yod ma yin
297b1('bum): myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa
297b2('bum): 'am myi gnas pa med do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas
297b3('bum): ba mod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa mgo gi rnam par shes pas stong pas phyir ro// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rna bar shes pa dang / lce'i rnam
297b4('bum): par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid gi rnam par shes pa yid gi rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni
297b5('bum): roganas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang mi yin mi gnos pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rnam pa'i
297b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni
297b7('bum): gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid lnga na gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
297b8('bum): dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
298a1('bum): de ni 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa myig gi 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rna ba'i 'dus te re ge bA dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lci'i 'dus te reg pa stong dang / lus kyi 'dus te
298a2('bum): reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pa de'i spong ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dpe ru na/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi
298a3('bum): gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang mo yin mi gnas pa yang mu yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper no/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang
298a4('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba snang pa nyid dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis cher ba snang ba nyid dang / lus kyis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi 'dus
298a5('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i snang ba nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang me yin no// rab 'byor de/ bzhin du thag pa chen po de yang gnas khang ma yin mi gnas kyi
298a6('bum): yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid la ni/ gnas pa' mi gnas pa med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i nge ga
298a7('bum): nyid dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bu'i ngo bo nyid dang / yid kyi 'dus
298a8('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid la gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
298b1('bum): rkyen kyis char bas stong pa'i phyir ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis char ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te
298b2('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bsu stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor
298b3('bum): 'di lta ste dpe ru na/ sgyu ma dang / smyig rgyu dang / sgra brnyan dang / myig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / sprul pa ni gnas pa yang mi yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du
298b4('bum): theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas de yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rmi lam gi ngo bo nyid la ni/ gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa med do// sgyu ma ni
298b5('bum): ngo bo nyid dang / smig rgyu'i ngo bo nyid dang / sgra brnyan gi ngo bo nyid dang / mig yor gyi ngo bo nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'a/ mi gnas pa med de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
298b6('bum): rab 'byor 'di ni 'di ltar rmyi lam ni rmyi lam gros stong pa'i phyir ro// sgyu ma sgyu mas snang ba'i phyir ro// smyig rgyu smig rgyus snang po'i phyir ro// sgra brnyan s+phA rnyan gis snang pa'i phyir ro// mig yer mi g.yo
298b7('bum): gis stong pa'i phyir ro// gzugs par no gzugs pa rnyan gis stong pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir ro// sprul pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dang / 
298b8('bum): na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa na gnas pa yang sa yin/ ma gnas pa yang ma yin no// bar byor de bzhin du thog bre chen pa de yang gnas pa yang ma yin rgyam gnas pa yong ma yin no// ra 'ar 'di sa
299a1('bum): dper na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nr-i gnas
299a2('bum): pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid la
299a3('bum): mi/ gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do// tshul khris kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi
299a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i de nyid la ni gnas pa 'amu mi gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong pa'i phyir
299a5('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bas rtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
299a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pos snang ba'i phyir re/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na nang stong pa nyid ni gnas pa 'ang mo yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas
299a7('bum): pa yang ma yin mi gnos pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni gnas par yung ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor
299a8('bum): de bzhin du theg pa chen pa de yang gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni gnas pa 'am myi gnas pa med de/ dngos po
299b1('bum): srid pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar nang snang pa nyid nang snang pa nyid gis stong ba'i phyir ra/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid so// 
299b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid gi bar du dngas med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang mtshon
299b3('bum): rung 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no/ rab 'byor 'ang lta ste dper na/ yang dag par spang ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang
299b4('bum): ba rnamaso dang / stobs nas dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni gnas pa ying ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du/ 
299b5('bum): theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de bzhin ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dran pa nye bar bzhagapa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa med
299b6('bum): de yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnaMs dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa/ 
299b7('bum): 'am myi gnas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na// rab 'byor dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams gis stong pa'i phyir ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnaMs dang / stobs
299b8('bum): rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rje dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag rgyad pas stong pa'i phyir ro/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa
300a1('bum): yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen pa de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper nas pas ma rtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs
300a2('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pargyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams
300a3('bum): dang ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sku rnams ni gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
300a4('bum): rab 'byor 'phags pa'i badren pa'i ngo bo nyid la gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa med do// bsam gtan dang / chud med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyos par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad
300a5('bum): dang / mthar gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzung
300a6('bum): gi sngo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// bsam
300a7('bum): gtan rnams dang / chad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnas dang / stong po nyid dang / mtshan ma
300a8('bum): med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgra rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs
300b1('bum): pa'i stongs bcu ni gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen pa de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no/ rab 'byor 'dis ste dper na/ mi 'dzig
300b2('bum): ba bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin na/ rab 'byor de bzhin du zag pa chen po de yang gnas pa
300b3('bum): yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med de/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag
300b4('bum): par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid la ni/ gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i
300b5('bum): stobs bcun de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sa stong ba'i phyir ro/ mi kyi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig po bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco chud sangs
300b6('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu rgyud gis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ dgra bcom pa zag bzang pa ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rang sangs rgyas ni gnas
300b7('bum): ba yang ma yin / mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin na// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dgra bcom pa'i ngo bo nyidi le
300b8('bum): gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do// rang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa yang med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor don 'di ltar dgra bcom pa'i ngo bo nyid dgra bco pa'i ngos
301a1('bum): nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid rang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po ni/ 
301a2('bum): gnas pa yang mi yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ 
301a3('bum): rab 'byor byang na pa sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid la ni/ gnas pa 'am/ myi gnas pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid la gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub
301a4('bum): sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid gis stong pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid gis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor
301a5('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ni gnas pa yang nga ma yon mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// lan cig phyir/ 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid ni gnas pa
301a6('bum): yang mu yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rang byang chub ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin temi gnas pa yang
301a7('bum): ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'i mi gnas pa med do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la
301a8('bum): ni gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa med de/ rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
301b1('bum): bri ngo bo nyid gis stong pa'i phyir ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa'i ngo bo nyid dgra bas pa'i ngo bo nyid gis stong pa'i phyir ro// rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid rang byang chub gi ngo bo nyid gis
301b2('bum): stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ lam gyi rna pa shes pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mu
301b3('bum): gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa med yin na// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni lamu gri rnam pa shes pa nyid gi ngo bo
301b4('bum): nyid la gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am/ myi gnas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zho na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltararu lam gi rnam pa/ 
301b5('bum): shes pa nyid lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid gi ngo bo nyid gis ste/ nga pa'i phyir ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gi de go nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gi ngo bo nyid kyis stong
301b6('bum): pa'i phyir ro/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ ming ni gnas yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de/ bzhin du theg pa rten pa de yang gnas pa yang ma yin du mi gan
301b7('bum): bla ma yin no// rab 'byor 'didra lta ste dper na/ mtshan ma dang / brda dang / tha snyad dang / gdags pa ni gnas pa yang mA yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no/ rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po
301b8('bum): de yang gnas pa yang ma yin mo gnas pa yang ma yin no/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin du mying ga ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa med do// mtshan ma dang / brda
302a1('bum): ga gras pa'i ngo bo nyid ma ni gnas ma 'am mi gnas pa med de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mying gI de b+he ni/ ming gyi ba nyid gis snang ba'i phyir ro/ mtshan ma'i ngo bo nyid mtshun maH
302a2('bum): ra ba nyid gis skyong ba'i phyir brda'i dbo nyi brda'i ngo bo nyid gris snang pa'i phyir ro// tha snyad gi ngo bo nyid tha snyad gi ngo bo nyid gis stong pa'i phyir ro// gdags pa'i ngo bo nyid gdagaso pa'i ngo ba nyi
302a3('bum): kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na skye ba med pa ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ myi gnas pa yang ma yin no/ rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yong ma gras
302a4('bum): mi gnas pa yang ma yin no/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa med po dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gnas pa 'am yang ma yin mi
302a5('bum): gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du tho ga pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa nga ma yin no/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid la
302a6('bum): gdus pa'o mi gnas pa med do/ bgag pa med du dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par bad ba mang pa'ingo bo nyid la ni/ gnas pa'om mi banas pa med phyi na nga
302a7('bum): de ni 'di ltar skye bsrud pa 'ong nyid smra ba med pa'i nyid kyi skye song pa byor ro// 'gag bu med pa'i di bo nyid 'gag sa skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid gis snang ba'i phyir ra kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i
302a8('bum): nyid ku ngas nyin mongs pa med pa'i bo nyid kyis steng pa'i phyir/ rdza bar byeng ba med pa'i nga bo nyid rnam par bya 'i mang pa'ang bo nyid kyis song pa'i phyir ro// 'ob 'byor 'di sa sa dper na/ mngon par dutu
302b1('bum): ba mang ba ni// gnas pa yang ma yin mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin// myi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na// rab 'byor mngon par mi
302b2('bum): bya ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am/ mi gnas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid gis stong pa'i phyir ro// 
302b3('bum): rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ theg pa chen po de myi gnas par gnas pa'i tshul dang / bskyod du med pa'i tshul gis gang du gnas par 'gyur ba med de// rab 'byor gang yang khyod gis 'di skad du theg po des su
302b4('bum): zhig 'byung bar 'gyur zhes smras pa ni/ theg pa des su yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni/ 'di ltar theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / gang 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang
302b5('bum): gang nas 'byung bar 'gyus ba'i chos de dag thos cadamed ning mi dmyigs pa'i phyir te/ da ltar chos thams cad med cing mi dmigs na/ chos gang zhig gang gis 'byung bar 'gyur/ de ci'i phyir
302b6('bum): nan rab 'byor don 'di ltar ba dge shin tu rnam par dag bre dang / sems can dang srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang dag dang / shed can dang / shong bdag dang / byed pa po drung / tshor
302b7('bum): dang shes pa pa dang / mtha rjod shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ mtha' las 'das byas bdag dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro// mtha' las 'das pas sems can dang / srag dang 'gro ba dang / glu sma du
302b8('bum): skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shid can+da da shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / char pa po dang / shes pa pa dang / mthong bya byor dmyig su med de/ shim tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings dmyigs
303a1('bum): ga med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyib po'i dbyings dmyigs su med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ phung po rnaMs dmigasu med
303a2('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ skye mched dang / khams rnams dmyigs med de/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyirakau rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dmigs su med de/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ sbyin du
303a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dmyigs su med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan ga pha rol
303a4('bum): tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med de/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
303a5('bum): nyid ge bar du dmig su med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnaMs dmigs su med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phru
303a6('bum): kyi rngog rkeng pa dang / dbang po dang stabs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigasu med do/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam
303a7('bum): groton dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med po'i sems par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthag gis gnas pa'i skams par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / 
303a8('bum): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmyigs su med do// shin tu rna par dag pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs
303b1('bum): pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco rgyad dmigasu pa med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dmigasu med de/ shin tu rnam par
303b2('bum): dag pa'i phyir/ len cig phyir 'ang ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas dmyigs su med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med do// shin tu
303b3('bum): rnam par dog pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dmigs su med de/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dmigs su med do/ 
303b4('bum): shin tu rna bar dag pa'i phyir/ khan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / da rang byang chub dmyigs su med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ 
303b5('bum): lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmyigs su med de/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ skye bo med pa dmigs su med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir
303b6('bum): 'gag pa med pa dang da/ nga kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dmigs myed do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ston gi mtha' dmigs su med do// shin
303b7('bum): nem bur dag pa'i phyir/ khyi ma'i mtha' dmigs su med do// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ da ltar byung ba dmig su med do/ shin tu rnam par dag pu'i byor/ 'di ba dang 'gro ba dang / gnas pa dang / 
303b8('bum): chi bgro ba dang / skyo ba dang 'grib pa dang / 'phel ba sogs su med do// gang mo dmigs pas thas cadang shes pa nyid dmig su med pa yin zhe na/ chos kyi dmyigos pas/ chos kyi dbyings dmyigs mo/ 
304a1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med pa de ni/ dmigs pa 'ang ma yin mi gi ni mi dmigs pa 'am ma yin no// de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs pas/ de bzhin nyid dmig su med do// 
304a2('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa yang ma yin/ mI dmyigs 'ang ma yin no/ yang dag pa'i mtha' myi dmyigs pos/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs mdo
304a3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pa ni dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ myi dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ bsam gis mi khyab pa'i dbyings mi dmyigs pas/ bas gis mi khyab
304a4('bum): pa'i dbyings dmyig su mod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab kyi'abyor bsam gas mi khyab pa'i dbyings dmigs su med pa ni dmigs pa 'ang ma yin/ mi dmyigs pa 'ang ma yin no// phung po dang / skye mad
304a5('bum): dang khams mi dmigs pas/ phung po dang ma skye mche dra dong / khams dmigos su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dmigs su med pa na
304a6('bum): dmigs pa yang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa 'ang ma yin no// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi dmyigs pas/ rten cing 'brel pa rwa 'byung dmigs su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rten cing 'brel par
304a7('bum): 'byung ba dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa yang ma yin no/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin ma dmigs pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
304a8('bum): 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmyigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa yang ma yin no// tshul khris kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bortson 'grus kyi
304b1('bum): parol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa me dmigs pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmyigs su med do/ de rje'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes ra
304b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa yang ma yin na/ myi dmigs pa yang ma yin no// nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa so// nang stong pa nyid dmig su med do// da sde'i phyim ne nu/ rab 'byor
304b3('bum): nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas dmigs pa 'am ma yin// dngos med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gi bar tu mi dmyigs pas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
304b4('bum): nyid dmigs su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmyigasasu med pa ni/ dmyigs nga pa yang ma yin myi dmigs pa yang ma yin no// dran pa nye bar bzhag
304b5('bum): pA rnaM sra mi dmigs pas/ dran pa nye bar bzhag po rnams dmigs su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dmyigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin
304b6('bum): mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin// yang dag par spang ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stangs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan
304b7('bum): lag brgyad pa myi dmigs pas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmyigs su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lom yan lag brgyad pa dmyigs su med pa ni/ dmyigs
304b8('bum): 'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnaMs dang tshad med po rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par
305a1('bum): thar ba rgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jugs pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs
305a2('bum): kyi sgo rnams myi dmigs pas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmigasu med da// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmigs su med pa ni/ dmyigs pa'ang ma yin mi dmigs pa
305a3('bum): ma yin na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stabs bcu dang / mi 'jig pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad mi dmigs pase/ sangs rgyas
305a4('bum): da kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dmigs su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chus ma 'dres pa rnams dmigs su med pa na da ni/ dmigs pa yang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa yang ma
305a5('bum): yin no// rgyun tu zhugs pa myi dmyigs pas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa dmi gas su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga rgyun tu/ zhugs pa dmyigs su med pa ni/ dmyigs pa 'ju
305a6('bum): ma yin myi dmigs pa 'dre ma yin no// man cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir ma 'ing ba dang / dgra bcu po myi dmyigs pas dgra bcom po dmyigs su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dag
305a7('bum): dmig su med pa ni/ dmigs pa yang ma yin/ myi dmyigs pa 'ang ma yin// rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs pas/ rang chub sangs dpa' rgyas dmig su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
305a8('bum): rang sangs rgyas dmigs su med pa ni/ dmyigs pa yang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs pas/ byang chub seMs dpa' dmyig su med de/ de ci'i phyir/ 
305b1('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' da migs su med pa ni/ dmigasu pa yang ma yin/ myi dmyigs pa 'ang ma yin na/ de bzhin gshes pa myi dmigs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dmyig du
305b2('bum): myed de de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dmig su med pa ni/ dmyigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pas
305b3('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dmigo su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa 'du ma yin/ mi dmigs pa 'ang ma yin no// na gyi
305b4('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang // dgra bcomadape nyid mi dmigs pas/ dgra bcom pa nyid dmigs su med do// da ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid
305b5('bum): dmigs su med do// dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no/ rang byang chub myi dmigs pas/ rang byang chub dmig su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rang byang
305b6('bum): chub dmigasu med pa ni/ dmigs pa yang ma yin/ mi dmyigs pa yang ma yin// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs pas la gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dmigs su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
305b7('bum): 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dmigs su med pa ni/ dmyigs pa 'ang ma yin/ mi dmyigs pa yang ma yin no// rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
305b8('bum): dmigs su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmyigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa yang ma yin mo dmigs pa yang ma yin no// skye ba med pa mi dmigs pas/ 
306a1('bum): sh+tsa/ skye ba med pa dmig su med do// de ci'i phyir na na/ rab 'byor skye ba med pa dmigasu mang pa ni khwa dmyigs pa yang ma yin myi dmigs pa yang ma yin na// 'gagu pa med du mi dmigs pas khazhan
306a2('bum): ba med pa dmigs su med do// deci'i phyi zhe na/ rab 'byor 'gag po med pa dmig su med pa ni/ dmigs po yang ma yin/ myi dmyigs pa'angam yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa mi dmyigs pa su/ kun
306a3('bum): nyon mongs pa mi dmig su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dmyigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no// rnam par byang ba'ang med pa
306a4('bum): myi dmigs pas/ rnam par byang ba med pa dmigs su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par byang ba dmyigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ myi dmigs pa yang ma yin no// mngon
306a5('bum): por 'du bya ba myed pa mi dmigs pas/ mngon par 'du bya bdamigs su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na// rab 'byor ma/ don par 'du bya ba med pa dmigs su med pa ni/ dmyigs pa 'ang
306a6('bum): ma yin mi dmigs pa 'ang ma yin// de ci'i phyir zhen bu sngon gi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / gnos pa dang / 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba dang / 'grib pa
306a7('bum): dang 'phel ba myi dmigs pas/ 'phel ba dmig su med do// rab 'byor 'phel ba dmig su med pa ni dmigs pa yang ma yin mi dmigs pa yin no// sa dang po mi dmigs pas/ sa dang po da mig su med de/ 
306a8('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sa dang po dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa yang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa 'ang ma yin/ sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsu pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dang / 
306b1('bum): sa bdun pa dang / brgyad pa dang / sarba pa dang sa bcu pa ma dmigs pas/ sa bcu pa dmigs su med de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga sa bcu pa dmig su med pa ni/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa
306b2('bum): 'ang ma yin no// de la sa dang po ni gang / sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang sa drug pa dang / sa bdun pa dang sa brgyad pa dang / sa dgu pa dang / sa bcu pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste
306b3('bum): kar po rnam par mtho' ba'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / khyas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi
306b4('bum): sde dang byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang / sangs rgyas kyis s+ho/ na/ stong pa 'id gro phy-ir/ sa drang po dmigs su med do// de po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi / sa dang po dmigs
306b5('bum): med do// nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sa dang bcu pa'i bar du dmyigs su med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gi bar gi phyir rdzas bcu pa'i bar du dmigs su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
306b6('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ sa dang po dmigs su med pa ni/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin sa bcu pa'i bar du dmigs su med pa ni/ dmyigs pa 'dra mA yono// shin tu
306b7('bum): rna bar dag pa'i bar bzung na/ nang stong pa nyid gi phyir/ sems can rnams yongasu smin par bya ba'i dmigs su med do// shin tu na par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ dngos pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gi bar
306b8('bum): gi phyir/ sems can mong su phyin par bya ba dmig su med do// shin canam par dran pa nyi ba ma 'dud/ rang stong pa nyid ni byor/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmig su med do/ shin
307a1('bum): par dag pa nye bar bzung na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gi bar gi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi bya zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dmigs su med do// shin tu rna bar dag pa nyo ba ru bzung na
307a2('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ myig lnga dmigs su med do ku shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung no// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gi bar gro phyir/ myig lnga dmig su med do// rab 'byor de ltar na khyod na
307a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ theg pa chen po rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'dadi la gnas par 'gyur ro/ 
307a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ le'u bcu pa'o// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bco ldan 'dra
307a5('bum): theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te/ 'byung bar 'gyur bas/ de'i slad du theg pa chen po zhes 'gyi
307a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das theg pa che de ni namakha' dang mnyam pa ste/ ji ltar namakha' ni sems can grangs dang / tshad ma mchis pa'i go 'byed// pa de bzhin du/ theg pa chen po 'di yang sems can grangs dang
307a7('bum): tshad ma mchis pa'i go 'byad byas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa ste/ theg pa chen po de yang 'gro ba 'am/ 'od zhes bgyi ba'am/ 
307a8('bum): gnas pa yang ma mchis so/ sngon gi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus zhes bgyi ba yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na ni mkha' la 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba zhes brgya
307b1('bum): ba ma mchis la/ gnas pa 'ang ma mchis pa de bzhin du theg pa chen pa de la yang 'gro ba mi dmigs/ 'ong ba mi dmyigs gnas pa mi dmyigs so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ na
307b2('bum): mkha' ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid gi slad du/ sngon gi mtha' mi dmigs na phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmyigs/ dbus mi dmigs so// / de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di yang dus gsum many+dzu pa
307b3('bum): nyid gi slad du stan gi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mthel mi dmigs/ dbus mo rA migs so// bcom ldan 'das 'dri lnga ste theg pa chen po 'di ni dus gsum mnya pa nyid gi theg pa ste
307b4('bum): dri'i srad du theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o// bcom/ ldan 'das gis bka' stsal po/ rab 'byor de de bzhin med de bzhin te/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni byang chu
307b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ste// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
307b6('bum): dang bas gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sos
307b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di lta ste/ gzungs gri sgo thas cad dang / ting nge 'dzin gi sku thams cad de/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / na mkha' lta nakris pa
307b8('bum): med pas rnam par grol zhing / gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gi bar du ste/ 'di ni byang chub sas dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yod byang chu
308a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di lta ste nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
308a2('bum): po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul
308a3('bum): gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stabs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bas gtan bzhi dang / ched med pa
308a4('bum): bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par ba brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyam/ nyes par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / mtshan
308a5('bum): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
308a6('bum): bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dag ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' seMs dbu chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// rab 'byor gang yang khyod gis 'di skad du theg pa chen po
308a7('bum): doni lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gis mnan te/ 'byung bar 'gyur ro// zhes smras pa ni/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i las
308a8('bum): dang gzugs yod pa'i khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams te/ rab 'byor gal te 'dod pa'i khams de bzhin/ mi nor ba dri bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci lag ma yin la/ bden pa
308b1('bum): yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing rten la/ ther zug pa 'gyur ba'i chos can gi dngos po zhig yin na ni theg pa chen po 'das kyang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gris
308b2('bum): banan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'dod pa'i khams de rnam par rtags pa/ rnam par skyed pa yongasu bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi rten la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po
308b3('bum): med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gis mnan te/ 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te gzugs kyi khams kyi de bzhin mu nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan
308b4('bum): mA yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la/ bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing rten la/ ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang sngalha dang
308b5('bum): mi dang lha ma yin bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gis mnan cing 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi khams/ dernam par brtags pa/ rnam par skyed pa/ yongasu sgrubs pa ste
308b6('bum): mi rtag cing mo brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chas can te/ dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gri mnan te 'byung ba yin rab 'phya
308b7('bum): gal te gzugs med pa'i snyoms khams de bzhin ta ma nar ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden la/ yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du brtag cing brtan la/ ther zug
308b8('bum): mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gi dngos po zhig yin na ni theg pa po chen po 'dis kyang lnga dang / mi dang lha mo yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing / 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor gzugs med par
309a1('bum): khams dang rnam par rtags pa/ rnam par skyed pa/ yongs su sgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cings rten la/ war zug sa na 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas/ de'i phyin/ theg
309a2('bum): 'dis lnga dang / me dang l+h+wa ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gis rgan to 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor galate gzugs de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhid/ gzhan ma thA de bzhin te/ byin ci log ma yin lo/ bden
309a3('bum): yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing can la ber zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gdangos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang / lha dang mi dang lha mo yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten rol gis/ na
309a4('bum): cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur dag rab 'byer gzugs de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par spyad pa yongs su sgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag myi tan lwan ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir thug
309a5('bum): chen po zla 'dis lha dang me dang / ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten/ zil gyis mnan cing 'byung ba yin no/ rab 'byor ba tshur/ khe dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa de bzhin tum nar
309a6('bum): bu de bzhin / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci lag ma yin lo/ bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtog cing brtan rtsol ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa
309a7('bum): chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gris mnon cing / 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rnam par shes pa de rna par brtags pa/ rnam par skyed pa/ yongs su
309a8('bum): bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mo rten mang ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas ngo bo nyi de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'das lnga dang mi dang mi/ lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dri la
309b1('bum): mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byar gal te mig de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin cing log ma yin la/ bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin rtag cing brtan la zer zug
309b2('bum): ma na 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ thog pa chen po 'dis kyang lnga dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcos pa'i 'jig rten zil gis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor sreg de rnam pa
309b3('bum): brtags pa/ rnam par skyed po yongasu sgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing / mi rten la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du
309b4('bum): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gis mnan te'i byung yan na/ rab 'byor gal tan ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang yid de bzhin/ ma nor ba dri bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin do/ 
309b5('bum): byin ci yig ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta bzhin du rtag cing rngan la ther zug mo 'gyur ba'i chos cad gi dong su zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang me dang lha ma yin
309b6('bum): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gis mnan te 'byung bar mi 'gyur te// rab 'byor yid de rna par rtags pa/ rnam par skyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs ste/ mi rtag cing mi rtan la ther zug ma yin/ 'gyur ba'i
309b7('bum): chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcusa'i 'jig rten zil gris mnan te 'byung ba yin no rab 'byor gal te gzugs de bzhin
309b8('bum): ma de banas/ gan du yin pa ba byin ci logs yin ma/ 'don pa yang dag pa ste yang dag su ma kun du gdu rnas da zug sa rgya ba'i ma na gangasu ldana'i
310a1('bum): \u0f7f// theg pa chen po 'dis kyang / lha dang ma dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing / 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor gzugs de rnam par sartags pa/ rnam par skyes
310a2('bum): yongs su sgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi rten la/ ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos med pas de'i phyir/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gis

310a7('bum): lag ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing rten la/ zer zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du btsan
310a8('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil gis mnan cing 'byung bar ma 'gyur te/ rab 'byor mig gi rno par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing ma rten la thar tshug
310b1('bum): ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcos pa'i 'jig rten zil gis mnan te 'byung ba yin no// rab 'byor gal te rna ba'i rnam par
310b2('bum): shes pa dang sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci lag ma yin/

310b5('bum): ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can de/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcasapa'i 'jig rten zil gis mnan te/ 'byung ba yin no//

310b7('bum): ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la mngon pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing rten la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gi dngos po nag yon na ni// theg pa chen po 'das kyu
310b8('bum): lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gis mnan te/ 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnaM par rtags pa/ rnam par skyed pa yongs su sgrubs pa ste/ 
311a1('bum): mtshag tsangs banan pa med thug pa yis rgya ma sa te/ dngos po med pas da byur thog pa chen po 'das su dang / midas la yod du bcas pa'i 'dzin na mi rdzasas sa

311a3('bum): ma yin pa de bzhin/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing rten la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang /

311a8('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba de rnaM par brtags pa/ rnam par skyed pa yongs su sgrubs pa ste/ mi rtagacong ma rten la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir/ 
311b1('bum): the pa chen po 'dis lha dang po dang / lA ma medan du mas pa'i 'jig rten rim gis mnan te 'byung bzhin no// rang 'byor ga / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i byin gyis chos dang / 'i 'dus te rteg po rkyen kyis / 
311b2('bum): dang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gis nor ba dang / yid gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba de bzhin/ mnor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin to// phyin ci lo/
